column6: My first iPhone purchase and I am loving it!
column7:
The fastest superb and the most elegant smartphone is here. Display is the most gorgeous ips lcd panel you would find on any phone. Battery life is simply too good with just 20% of it getting consumed for 3  hours of continuous surfing and downloads...more on battery later as I use it...well what can I say about camera..this was one of the key reasons I bought this phone for and it doesn't disappoint..the details are too good and so is the telephoto lens which gives amazing clarity even with 2x zoom...shall upload the photos shortly...taptic home button is simply mind blowing..works as good as the earlier physical button...yet to test the audio and video capabilities...but guys I am  just blown over by this device in the first 5-6 hours...this is my first iPhone purchase and I hope it serves me well for the next few years to come...just go for it guys...

column6: Super honest review(afterall 55 hazaar bahut hote hai)
column7:
Iphone is awesome as u all know but i am more concerned about weather i should buy it from offline retail store or online, i am not assure about online, but trust  me guys flipkart sells the genuine iphone.
  
  I had purchased it from the seller called "IPrime" and Ekart delivered it in 8 days as expected.
  
  some pros and cons that i experienced in one month:-
  
  (stars out of 5)
  
  1-Battery life------------------4.5 stars.
  
  2-Camera quality------------5 stars(best in class)####### The new portrait mode and 4k video recording is amazing.(Dual lens----WOWW)
  
  3-Charging----------------------3 stars(takes 2.5 hours form 0 to 100)####### Samsung s8 plus provides rapid charging.
  
  4-Speakers----------------------5 stars(best in class)####### Stereo speakers(first time in iphone, trust me its loud).
  
  5-Processor--------------------------------5 stars( A 10 fusion)######Extreme fast , can play ultra hd games very smoothly like---UNKILLED & MC-5
  
  6-OS-------------------------------------------4.8 stars(IOS 10.3.3)##### User friendly some of the apps might not work in India like--Maps.
  
  7-Accessories:-
  
  7(a)-Earphones------connect in lightning jack as u know 3.5mm gone, sound quality awesome (You can switch to wireless like sony BS)
  
  7(b)-Connector------Iam not using it as i tried to connect it with my samsung earphone, it says accessory not supported by apple.
  

  Some vital advice:-
  
  1-Purchase good quality tempered glass(like---Spigen).As u dont want to spend 30k in ur screen if its broken.
  
  2-Purchase good quality cover.(like-spigen).
  

  And last but not least "Siri" is amazing(first time Iphone users can find out when they purchase it, and for those who already has iphone would know what i am talking about).
  

  Thank you.
 
 

   READ MORE

I used this phone for 6 months and then sold it for a Galaxy s7 . So here are the pros and cons -
  
  Pros-
  
  Good build
  
  Responsive fingerprint scanner
  
  iPhone brand value
  
  iOS ecosystem is very simplistic and easy to use and also very dependable with barely any crashes and bugs.
  
  Front camera is really good and offers great amount of detail
  
  Ram management and speed is top notch. Phone never lags and never fails to not keep apps in memory.
  
  Audio via headphone jack is one of the best and yes it has a headphone jack.
  
  Very frequent updates.
  
  CONS-
  
  Rear camera produces very dim pictures and makes the sky look very unrealistic with poor dynamic range.
  
  Display resolution is only 720P . though this won't affect your day to day usage but forget about using it with VR.
  
  IPS LCD display is not even close to the vivid and very good looking colors provided by AMOLED displays which most phones in this price segment use.
  
  iOS lacks practicality in some cases . Lack of proper shortcuts etc etc
  
  3D touch is really a waste and you will barely even use it . It's only compatible with a very limited number of apps and also functionality is quite low.
  
  Rear camera very bad at taking low light shots due to a f2.2 aperture.
  
  REASONS NOT TO BUY THIS PHONE-
  
  Phones in this price have AMOLED displays which is far more superior to IPS LCD found in iPhone.
  
  Other phones offer 1080p and above resolutions making them good to view in VR.
  
  Other phones have way better cameras such as the s7, one plus 3T , LG V20 ,HTC 10 etc
  
  Some other phones come with water resistance such as the s7 which is very useful.
  
  S7 also comes with wireless charging.
 
 

   READ MORE

I have got my iphone 6s 32 gb gold right on scheduled delivery date 16th October 2017.
  

  Cost me : Rs 27249/-
  
  Ordered on 14th october 2017 within one hour when BIG DIWALI sale started
  
  Offers : extra 1750 instant cashback on HDFC card
  

  I have been using this phone since 3 days now and it is working absolutely fine. I have found no issues yet. I have been very conscious and nervous while ordering from flipkart because of the negative reviews that i saw for this product. However, this special price offer pushed me to order it.
  

  I have got the iphone with ios 11.0.3 installed . And it is working butter smooth. Ios 11 has many good features like we can now do recording of our iphone screen, customise control center, power saver for battery and many more.
  

  Yes battery is not for heavy game users otherwise it does not disappoints you.
  

  My reviews is five star for the Flipkart special price deal and the great product.
  

  Thank you flipkart and seller for making my Diwali more special.
  


  Well done and keep up the good work.

Don't get confused in the specs,just go for it
  
  The quality of iPhones don't depend on numbers. Following are my opinion for the iPhone 6s
  
  :Camera-not the best but the camera is very good, good enough to impress you for this price
  
  :Battery- before buying this even I was confused about the battery,I thought it has a smaller battery but now I'm happy with it
  
  It gives me a nice backup of 1 day in moderate use with 4G
  
  :Charging-takes about 2 hours to get charged from 20% to 100%
  
  :Ram-iPhones don't depend on how much ram it has but still if u r worried, then don't be,it is sufficient
  
  :Design-simply fantastic feels very good
  
  So that's it
  
  And if I've left something then u still need not to worry, IPhone 6s is very good phone
  
  Just go for it and have one
  
  And enjoy your new iPhone 6s

The phone is authentic and brand new. Gud performance. I've ordered 32gb configuration, and it has 22 gb usable space with ios 10. Can be upgradable to ios11.
  

  The only concern is iphone battery. Previosly I was using lenovo phn which has 3000mA battery. It was last longs upto 2 days for my usage. With the same usage, iphone 6s last long for one day only. Ofcourse iphone 6s battery configuration is 1900mA only.
  

  After all iphone is iphone. Gud speed, gud performance, Very smooth functions, Gud camera and most importantly retina display.
  

  It's been 10 days since I bought this phone. This phone is very thin and slightly slippery. I've dropped this phone 3 times(without case) and there is no impact / damage. Totally, amazing phone.

Writing review after using four days.First Flipkart service is good,delivered one day before stipulated,packing was also ok.It is my first I phone.Now regarding I phone 6s: Pros :                                                 1)Inbuilt OS version was iOS 10 but updated to iOS 11 after a day.Processor and ram management is better,works fast.2)Apps are properly managed.Only required permissions are given to apps.You can also delete any preinstalled app if you dont like it.                                                                3)Fingerprint sensor works very good upto five fingers.                                                   4)Camera front and main resolution is also satisfactory and upto mark.                           Cons:                                                          1)Battery capacity is slightly low.Requires once in a day for normal routine use.          2)Apple maps preinstalled app shows only current location,directions and navigation are not available in India.I have to download google maps iOS app which works as good as that of android app.         3)Adding media files from your PC to phone is not as easy as android.It is tedious process requires iTunes and iCloud download in PC.                                            4)You cant call just by right swipe from contacts name.You have to open contact and then call him.No default number facility like android.                                                   Till now I am learning iOS system and trying to get acclimatised.

First of all the delivery was so fast, I can't imagine. My mobile number was wrong, still I got the product in 2 days. Thank you Flipkart for this super fast delivery.
  
  Then coming to the product- iPhone 6s 32gb. I was using an iPhone 6 for last 2 years. Comparing both products after using 6s for 5 days- let me jot down my findings.
  
  Pros
  
  1. Display- really stunning. It can give tough competition to any super amoled display by its super vivid colours
  
  2. Touch ID- it's lightening faster than iPhone 6. Just casual putting ur finger unlocks the machine. Also the raise to wake is an additional nice and helpful feature which is like icing on the cake.
  
  3. Processor speed- super duper fast. No lagging in multi tasking. The 2 gb RAM is stimulating the iPhone 6s to its ultimate performance.
  
  4. Camera- both front and main camera have seen significant improvements compared to iPhone 6. That gets reflected in the pics. It's awesome. Can beat any new models available now in the market.
  
  5. Live Photos- it's a cool feature added in 6s which I am sure, other manufacturers will implement soon.
  
  6. Battery- this is an area which could have been improved. But with moderate use, it takes 1 day for me before I look for the charger.
  
  I feel, overall it's the nice product from apple after iphone7.
 
 

   READ MORE

  3. It is getting hanged.
  

  I am facing these issues from the day one. I have asked to FLIPKART for replacement. They are telling that it is defect but not damage, they will provide only replacement for damaged products but not for defected products.
  

  There is a  clear cut meaning that FLIPKART will send defective products and will not give replacement for defective products even if the defect exists from the day one of its usage.
  

  Every time i purchase any product from FLIPKART there exists atleast a problem and FLIPKART will never resolve the issue.
 
 

   READ MORE

Sir/ Madam
  

  I am extremely unhappy with Flipkart's response on my order. I ordered an I ordered iPhone 6s from Flipkart on 26th April. I received the product on 28th April Friday but when I tried to switch it ON but the device is not getting booted up. I contacted customer care on  29th April Saturday night to request for the return / replacement of the product. But he said the replacement/ return is not possible for the apple products and you have to go to any nearby apple service center to make your phone work In addition he also provided me with the apple customer care center nearby my location which is already available in google.
  
  While ordering the product online it was not mentioned anywhere that the return or replacement is not possible for the apple products. Infact it was shown as 10 days replacement in the webpage for the iphone I ordered. This is not the way to answer the customer after getting the money from them.
  
  If  I can go to the apple service center / customer support directly why I am ordering my phone online.  The amount Rs. 40,000  for the iphone is paid to the flipkart and you are answerable for that. I need not run to the the apple showroom to get my job done.
  
  In this case I need to get either a replacement or return of the product. After all these efforts I don't want a replacement. Kindly cancel the order get the product returned and refund the amount to my account at the earliest And otherwise I'll be in a position to take a legal action against flipkart.
  
  I need to cancel this product. It is not necessary for me to run to the service center to service this mobile working. In this case I'm constrained to  take legal action against Flipkart. The policy is made for customer's benefit not for your sake. Why should I pay the money to flipkart and get my job done from the apple service center. Cancel my order and return the amount
  
  The mobile is not in the working condition. I need to return this mobile. I'm not satisfied with the product. The 10 days replacement policy is mentioned in the website that's y I ordered the phone online. But when I called the customer care the told like it not possible for the return or replacement of Apple products. In that case it should be mentioned clearly while ordering the item. How can I take the new mobile to the customer service center before the initial use itself. Flipkart is responsible for answering me. I just need my money back. I'm constrained to take legal action if the product is not taken back. Already registered an online complaint. Try to rectify it at the earliest
 
 

   READ MORE

column7:

Average phone
 
 

   READ MORE

It was a difficult decision to choose between Android Flagship and iOS. For long, I've been using Sony Xperia. Used my Xperia Z2 for almost four years (August 2014 to October 2017). It was time to buy a new phone and I was sceptical about buying another Xperia or any other Android Flagship. Finally I've decided to buy an iPhone 7 during the Flipkart Big Billion Day Sale. I've received the product for INR 38,999 with instant discount through HDFC Credit Card.
  

  I must say, I'd blown away by the performance of the iPhone. Coming from Android, it took little time to get accustomed with the interface. With just 2 GB RAM, an iPhone can perform like a Flagship Powered by Android containing 4GB RAM. Camera is top notch. Speaker is outstanding. Display is great too. Talking about battery, with medium to little heavy usage, I've managed to save 30% to 35% power at the end of the day. Low power mode is useful.
  

  Frankly speaking, using a mobile phone completely depends on the user. Especially user's technical soundness. For me, it was an easy switch over from Android to iOS. Many people complain that they are not being able to share things, use the phone as Android offers ease. I must say, you can. You can share almost anything via Shareit. Even if you have not installed iTunes, you can transfer data, pictures, videos via Shareit. So, it's not a problem at all.
  

  Most importantly, an iPhone might receive at least 4 to 5 updates. Remember, iPhone 5S which came with iOS 7, received iOS 11.1. Android Flagships can give you maximum 3 years of update if you are using Google Pixel for example. My Xperia Z2 (On Android 4 During Purchase) received Android 6 as the last Major Update.
  

  The fingerprint sensor is lightning fast. So the other operations too. User interface is pretty smooth. Running on iOS 11.0.3 right now. iPhone's hardware software integration is unmatched. Above all, the security. iOS is the most secure platform undoubtedly.
  

  Go for it if you can afford it. You will cherish your decision for sure. If you can't afford the 7, you can buy the 6S or 6S Plus though you'll miss the water resistance and stereo speakers and a bit upgraded camera.
  

  Delivery Was Perfect. Got it within 48 Hours. Verified the product through apple India. Absolutely genuine product.

column6: FLIPKART GAVE ME FAULTY & USED iPHONE 7
column7:
I received my new iPhone 7 today(17th-May'17) at 11:30 AM, when i tried to turn it on it wasn't turning on i tried everything possible like press & hold the power key for 2 to 5 secs, also Press and hold the Volume Down button and the Power key together for 15 to 20 seconds but noting worked out. I called the Flipkart customer service immediately and they informed me as the iPhone 7 new & might not be charged hence they suggested me to put it on charge for couple of hours & try to turn it on after that. I charged it for more than 2 hours 30 mins & tried to switch it on using the same way but it didn't, once again i called Flipkart customer server & this time they suggested me to visit the near by Authorized Apple store & get it checked. I visited Apex Apple store which is at Paradise Secunderabad near to Parklane hotel & informed them about the problem with my brand new iPhone 7, they tested it & confirmed that my brand new iPhone 7 is faulty hence suggested to inform the same to Flipkart immediately. While leaving from Apex Apple store i requested them to check for the warranty once, they removed the sim slot & entered numbers on it to the Apple website after that i was in big shock when they informed me that my new iPhone 7 is showing that its under warranty only for 307 days. They(Apex) said when the brand new iPhone 7 isn't turn on & activated yet then why its showing that warranty as 307 days & if its showing like that then it means its used one. I had to call Flipkart once again & informed them about it.
  

  I just can't believe that such a electronic commerce company called Flipkart who is celebrating its 10th anniversary can deliver such faulty & used products to their customers. Now all i want Flipkart to do is return back the amount & my old iPhone & take away their BRAND NEW FAULTY USED iPHONE 7.
  

  I believe if apple will get to know about this then they'll not allow Flipkart to sell their products at all.
 
 

   READ MORE

All apple devices will last a few years, so it's better than buying a new android phone every year. Overall I recommend the IPhone 7 however the galaxy s7 edge is just as good but 10k cheaper.
 
 

   READ MORE

The iPhone 7 is legitimately among the most interesting, opinionated, powerful phones Apple has ever shipped, and the most confident expressions of the companys vision in a long time. iOS 10 is excellent, the cameras are better, and the performance is phenomenal. And the batteries last longer. These are terrific phones.
  

  Good Stuff
  
  * Water resistance
  
  * Improved cameras
  
  * Better battery life
  
  * Great display
  
  * Taptic engine feedback is neat
  
  Bad Stuff
  
  * Lack of headphone jack is inconvenient
  
  * Looks just like an iPhone 6 in a case
  
  * Wireless audio ecosystem is immature
  
  * #donglelife
 
 

   READ MORE

Pros:
  
  Product Design (4 Stars)
  
  Though Apple have really come back with a nice sleek design (by removing the 3.5 jack), the body in its entirety looks sturdy as well.
  
  The stereo speakers at the bottom make a superior audio quality, though not that loud
  
  Shifting from an iPhone 5S, the force technology comes into play and the home button built inside helps, as the same was prone to damage earlier
  
  Clarity of pictures is enhanced, with the improved retina display
  

  Features & Functionalities (5 Stars)
  
  The 12 MP Camera is good and captures good picture quality even in dim light
  
  The front facing camera (usually for FaceTime) has improved drastically
  
  The new Home button needs to be setup properly
  
  iOS10 deserves some nice credit to bring with it nice features like widgets (though available in other OS)
  

  Logistics & Handling (5 Stars)
  
  Flipkart deserves kudos as the one of the iPhone was delivered to me the next day of the launch whereas the other took a week to deliver
  
  Packaging was good which ensured the delivery of the phone intact
  

  Cons:
  
  Apple needs to seriously rethink its strategy for headphones.
  
  Moving to lightning connector should mean that the audio headphone should have the same
  
  It is not desirable to connect via the converter always
  
  Also these headphones should be provided as per the colour of the iPhone (suggestions to improve)
  

  The iPhone is definitely recommended for everyone, who wants to have nothing, but the best.
 
 

   READ MORE

First off a big shout out to Flipkart logistics and the prompt delivery guy who made this happen despite of heavy delivery rains!
  
  Got this delivered the next day after ordering. Impressive (applause)
  
  About the phone:
  
  I shifted from my OnePlus 3T, which was an equally good phone. Things that I miss:
  
  - dash charge
  
  - got a walnut case which is of no longer use to me
  
  - dual SIM (using Jio data)
  

  Certainly feels good to comeback to iOS on my phone. Apps are stable and usable again. Well almost, minus the nuances of iOS 11.
  
  Huge pluses for me include:
  
  - iMessage: way better than WhatsApp, Messenger
  
  - FaceTime: my go to video call app
  
  - Apple Music: loving it
  
  - Bluetooth connectivity is far superior
  
  - true colour reproduction in my images and amazing low light performance
  

  Didnt have enough budget to go for iPhone  10. Glad that I got 7 (cue Thunderstruck by AC/DC \,,/ )

column6: Misleading ads, All hype not worth it
column7:
Have seen ads about iphone7 coming with wireless earphones. "What are earpods" I'm not a tech savvy person, when I saw earpods in product description I thought earpods are cordless earphones. When I received the delivery to my surprise there are normal earphones, moreover the earphones do not connect to phone directly it requires another connecting cord. Now we have to carry this additional dingy cable all along with it. Also, the packaging of the accessories is lousy - didn't expect this from apple for a product at such a price tag.
  

  It seems there is a problem with sound volume also not certain yet.
  

  All hype not worth it. Think once again before buying iphone6 could be better value for the price.

column6: Amazing 7 if you Don't own a 6/6S.
column7:
Amazing product. To me the Gold looks much more amazing than Black. Though the phone is quite similar to its predecessor, the camera is better. Won't comment too much on performance as even 6 was great for me and 7 looks amazing to. Haven't utilised it in a way where I can comment on performance but it's pretty smooth to function. The new speakers and much better. If you play music simultaneously on 6S and 7, you won't even hear what's being played on 6S. The lack of 3.5mm jack is noticeable as I use Bose Earphones instead of EarPods and it's tedious to use the connecter in between plus also hampers sound quality (The Air Pods aren't available yet).
  
  Lastly, summing it up, if you have a 6S, don't upgrade to this. It might be worth skipping this variant in between. If you have a 6 and don't like the 3D Touch, skip this model. Else just grab it whenever you can get your hands on it.
  

  P.S. Amazing delivery from Flipkart. Had the phone with me at 7:20 PM, on October 7, when it was released  at 7:00 PM. The black box package from Flipkart has already done enough no of rounds on Social Media, but sincerely felt nice.
 
 

   READ MORE

This is coming after 4 months most probably and the reason to write a review is to just warn the customers regarding the free offers that Flipkart promises. I purchased an iPhone 7 on 15th of May and was eligible for the Make My Trip offer of 2500/-. I got a confirmation mail from Flipkart post delivery of my iPhone that you are successfully eligible for the offer and I should receive a MMT code to redeem the coupon. I just recently realised when we wanted to use MMT services that I have not yet received 2 of my MMT codes for my 2 purchases. I got a confirmation for both, but no coupon till date. Contacted customer care regarding the same and they say they have already mailed the coupon codes, but il damn sure no mail received. I asked them to just send snapshot of the email or time stamp when you forwarded me the code and they are clueless about it. So now just today they gave me a coupon code stating we are re-issuing the code, but I'm damn sure no code was issued earlier too. And the validity of the code they have given me till September 30th 2017. I'm saying what is the use of that code for me. They never issued any code till this time and when I wanted it was not there and now the code validity for 10 days. I really feel cheated by Flipkart for the 1st time and this time I really experienced a pathetic customer service calls. They were closing my case stating that they tried contacting me and twice they couldn't connect me and hence closing the case. After searching the escalation email and writing them back, all calls starting getting connected to me to my surprise. Flipkart is no more the same as before, they have grown big now ( sarcasm). Thanks.
 
 

   READ MORE

The iPhone 7's new home button will elicit instant reaction from people; it's much more different than you might think. The button no longer moves at all   it's totally solid, just like newer MacBook trackpads. A linear vibration unit that Apple calls the Taptic Engine jolts when you apply pressure to the button, tricking your brain into feeling a click. It's nothing like the clumsy haptic feedback on other phones,   it really does feel like a click.
  
  Over all awesome phone

column6: A good phone but choose before u get them
column7:
First of all I would like to thank Flipkart who made an amazing tie up with Citibank and Apple so I got it cheaper.
  
  Pros
  
  I shifted from iPhone 5S to iPhone 7.
  
  Size wise there was a big change and it was slimmer than I expected
  
  I love the 3D Touch and the new home button because as time passed my home button started to make some sounds as I press in 5S
  
  And both the cameras r really good
  
  Cons
  
  Headphone jack removal has been a problem and now I am looking for wireless earphones
  
  I felt that apple should have either included the fast charging or wireless charging
  
  Other than that the phone is smooth
  
  In a line if u r using iPhone 6S then don't shift wait till next year and then get the Apple's 10th anniversary phone
  
  Else using older models then u can get them
 
 

   READ MORE

column6: Iphone 7 at my doorstep on oct 7 at 7 pm
column7:
It was a lovely surprise by EKART folks to deliver the Iphone 7 at my doorstep although I had given them the shipping address as Office address which was supposed to come on OCT 8.
  

  There was a chocolate also provided with the package which was icing on thecake. Thanks Flipkart...
  

  Regarding the product, at first feel, it looks good but getting used to home button may take a while as there is no back button and we need to do everything using home button.
  

  I could not get hold on the matt black one , so ordered the gold which looks ok with front panel being white.
  

  Positives
  

  - Good speed
  
  - excellent camera
  
  - IOS 10 has additional features
  
  - screen interface is excellent
  


  Negatives

column6: 1st Apple, Super Awesome iPhone, thanks Flipkart
column7:
This is my first Apple Product and now i understand why its totally worth to own one. I totally love this phone and haven't had an iota of doubt about spending money on this. Thanks Apple for this amazing product!
 
 

   READ MORE

First the great delivery experience - I ordered the Iphone 7 late night on Tuesday the 4th of October. I wanted to place the order earlier to receive the phone on launch day but due to my busy schedule I could not do this and was provided a delivery date of 14th October. To my surprise I received an SMS on the 7th of October at 7:00 PM stating my phone will be delivered today. I was in office and thought the phone would come tomorrow, since it was already end of day. However to my surprise when I reached home at 9:00 PM the delivery person was already there. My wife said the person was waiting patiently since 20 minutes even though he had several deliveries to do. Rakesh and Hitesh the delivery boys were constantly getting calls from other people to speed up their delivery but they waiting patiently for another ten minutes while I received the phone.
  
  Kudos to Flipkart delivery. A very positive surprise, something only Flipkart can do.
  

  Now for the phone - I already have an Iphone 6 Plus and 5S. While the OS looks the same, the first thing that will surprise you is the haptic feedback. The haptic  engine makes this phone completely new. The home button is not a regular press button but a fixed button that reacts to touch with a low vibration. The implementation is amazing and gives an awesome experience. The phone is fast and gives a wonderful experience that only Iphone can deliver. Restoring my backup from iphone 5S took a little over 9 minutes. This is much faster than earlier Iphones. There are several new features that are well implemented in the new OS and work very fast on the Iphone 7. Like the nearby transit options in Google that show up on the notification widget. This shows buses arriving at nearby stops. The news articles also load up faster on the new widget. All in all a great Iphone experience which is noticeably faster than the iphone 6. The fingerprint sensor speed and camera leave the Samsung phones far behind. I also own a Samsung Galaxy note 5 and there is a marked difference in the how applications perform on both the platforms. The stability of banking applications and other applications which need a sign in, like money control is great. Even the network performance for these applications is very quick on the Iphone 7. Stock rates and bank logins are smoother and quicker. Games work smoothly and the colours on the new panel seem richer than on earlier Iphones.
 
 

   READ MORE

column6: Personal Hotspot not working in USB mode.
column7:
I could not connect to internet on my laptop or any other device with tether option using USB cable. Only wifi and Bluetooth were working.
  
  I placed a request for return and flipkart arranged a technician for check up. This guy didn't have a knowledge about how to use iPhones , checked for sometime and called another guy and asked me to install iTunes , I was wondering what iTunes has to do with USB hotspot connection. I said I tunes is already installed . He checked and said me to check with iPhone customer care and demanded me to accept the problem is resolved,  when I refused he said "I will communicate flipkart that the problem is solved and the customer is unhappy.".
  
  After that I got mail from flipkart "We trust that the Technician Visit of your Apple iPhone 7 (Gold, 32 GB) was successfully done! " and cancelled my refund request. this happened within the 10 days replacement policy.
 
 

   READ MORE

I ordered the product on 4th Oct 2016 as part of the preorder scheme with the promised delivery date of 14th Oct 2016.
  

  Since there was no update from Flipkart regarding shipping of product, I called in the Customer support line to check on the status of the product. I was assured that the delivery time lines would be adhered. On 14th Oct i received an update from Flipkart with the delivery date pushed to 10th Dec 2016. Contacted customer care again to get in touch with the senior most escalation manger. It appears they are available only 9am-9pm.(Not sure why the banner says 24x7 Customer Care) Though they didn't bother to attend me even during their work timings. Without even hearing me out and providing an update on the order, the other representative's keep on saying i have provided all the information and even disconnected calls. The case was closed without any update.
  

  With all the lying and shenanigans the product was delivered to me on 18th Oct.
  

  P.S: Flipkart offered me 1000 Rs to accept delayed delivery rather than sticking to their commitments. In case wondering, this review isn't from my new phone so you can keep the other 1000 Rs as well.
 
 

   READ MORE

column6: The Best device with an Outstanding OS !!!
column7:
I Ordered this phone on big billion sale for Rs.18499 by Monday midnight and the price was dropped to Rs. 17,799 by morning.
  

  But the seller has gifted the difference 700rs to my wallet , so i have placed an another order in it.
  

  Thank you Flipkart and Supercom.net seller.
  

  Now coming to the phone.
  

  I was using android for over 7 years and Trust me guys after using iOS, i understand that we should not compare android with iPhone.
  

  iPhone is an iPhone - Cant compare it with others. (Please use it to feel)
  

  Camera - It was amazing, with the 8mp you can get the DSLR charities.
  

  iOS - Very smooth and user friendly, and the best secure based OS. (You don't need to worry about your data even if you lost the phone, everything will be synced with icloud and no one can access it without the pass code)
  

  Battery backup  is good, we can manage it for a day use. (Social networking, Games, Calls and chats)
  

  You'll addicted to iOS when you start using it.
  

  And now it comes with a deal price in Flipkart, so go for it without hesitation.
  

  Apple iPhone 5s - Classy looks with the Best OS.
  

  Personally i feel why i missed this for this long!!!
  

  Cheers,
  
  Jonam
 
 

   READ MORE

Nice Phone in nice range @ 16050/-
  

  Got in time.
  
  Was properly packed.
  
  Got it at only Rs. 16050/- in a deal.
  

  Handy as it is of 4 inch screen.
  
  NO LAG as expected from iPhone.
  
  Awesome touch response.
  
  Display is really nice.
  

  CAMERA quality is so nice though the rear camera is 8MP. Image originality is just perfect. The image quality is as u see in bare eyes and no 8MP camera of any android can provide that.
  
  Good optical image stabilization.
  
  Nice slow motion camera.
  
  Specially the FRONT CAMERA is only 1.2 MP but I can assure everyone that its better than 5 MP of android and windows.
  

  The battery is nice for me as I use it moderately. Easily last for 1day. No android phone's battery will last for 1day after using internet connection, WiFi, games and other usage when the battery capacity is only 1500mah.
  

  Its a nice experience to switch from android from iOS.
 
 

   READ MORE

I got this phone on 13 Nov 2015 and till now it is better to give a review. I got this at 26200/-. I brought this iphone 5s(space grey) as i got the manufactured october 2015 version and inbuilt ios 9.0 which is fluidic and superb performance.
  
  Gaming is superb and battery lasts a day long for average users.
  
  Camera is 8 MP is the best part in iphone 5s. stunning photos and front camera is as equivalent to 5MP compared with other phones.
  
  I upgraded to ios 9.1 and its still working fast and fluidic.
  
  Touch ID feature is unique and can give you a different way of security and privacy.
  
  Music in headphones are clearly fantastic. Overall fantastic performance and should buy this definitely. the price is also down now.

Hi Flipkart.
  

  I had a while/silver iPhone 5S before this which I sold last month and got this space grey one and intend to keep the same till iPhone 6 is back in all awe & glory. I always liked how uniform the screen looked when the phone is switched off and lying beside me when I'm busy with some actual work, far from any distraction due to contrasting white and black.
  

  The one piece I received had two issues and it prompted me to return-
  

  1) Two tiny black spots were visible against a white background in apps like "notes"; possibly some dust particles had found their way into the screen
  
  2) The phone's aluminium frame was bent, starting from the (-) volume button and upwards. It literally threw me off and I was damn pissed. It is also bizarre how it left the assembly line and the final check!!
  

  Anyway, the Flipkart guys were very helpful, I got a call back the same day and they did arrange the replacement. In two days I got a new one free of defects. I hope Apple does improve its in-process quality control.
  

  I was this close in snapping buying electronics from Flipkart; but their through professionalism in addressing the issue and making good of the problem surely speaks of their character. Tell you what, I will stick to them.
  

  Thanks guys.
  

  About the phone, you know it, I know it; it's the best out there...
  

  Cheers,
  
  Jagannath.

column6: Iphone No longer worth the money
column7:
Apple was once known to be an innovating company in terms of design and tech in their products.That name is now all but gone now a days.
  
  Iphone 5S is yet another eg of the company who can no longer really innovate.What does this have for it to be priced at Rs.53K that too for the 16GB verson (32 GB is 62K).Lets take each feature and component of the phone and do a comparison with the competition.
  

  Camera
  
  This is one of the most used part of a smart phone.Apple itself has prided in its cameras and advertised it well but the fact remains Iphone camera has NEVER been the best in Market and this is espeacialy visible in this current gen.Smartphone cameras of other phones esp Nokia Lumia 1020 are MILES ahead of iPHONE 5s camera in almost every aspect.This includes Optical Image Stabilization,Losseless Zoom,Over sampeling,focusing after photo has been taken,RAW digital negatives are some of the features iPhone 5S doesn't have and Lumia 1020 has and these features amount to a lot in normal everyday use.iphone camera's night or low light performance is poor when compared with the 41MP monster sitting on Lumia 1020.
  
  Microphones
  
  Sorry Apple Nokia beat you again in this area. Search online for HAAC Microphones by Nokia and you will what an amazing piece of technology and  innovation its.
  

  Navigation Software,Map application.
  
  The default map application in IOS 7 is the Apple's Own Apple Maps.If you don't know this remains the worst Map software among its competition which includes Google Maps(default in Android),Here(Nokia)Maps(default in all Nokia smartphones,Jolla and Kindle Android also used by 4 out of 5 cars with GPS) bing Maps ( default in non lumia Win Phones).Apple Maps has been notorious for its innacurate data which has lead people to drive straight to Airport runways.You will however get Google Maps and Here Maps in App store but Apple maps will remain as your default map app.
  

  Design
  
  Nothing much has change from Iphone 5 and 4S.Its allmost  same itself.
  

  Screen
  
  Apple screen is one of the best in Market but it remains a bit small.I am not a Fan of big screen but the screen can be bumped to 4.3 which is sweet spot.
  

  Processor.
  
  Processor is Apple's proprietery A7 which gives fast performance thanks to good OS optimisation.This  is a plus when compared with Android but not so much when comparing Win Phone whose low end phones like  Lumia 520 is comparable with Galaxy S3.Being 64 bit doesn't serve any purpose as no apps are now made for 64 bit.By the time they make you will be throwing away this phone after long use.
  

  Overall
  
  Buying this makes little practical sense esp at this price. There are amazing products from other manufacturers which offer better phones at cheaper price. Phones like Lumia 1020,HTC One,LG G2 each of which has innovating features and DOUBLE the memory.Only truly ignorant people buys Iphones by their choice.This fact is high lighted by the high market share iPhone  enjoys in US and we know the level of ignorance  Americans have (not all Americans I mean).
 
 

   READ MORE

  I been using this iphone for last 20 days with no issues. Charger I got along with this iPhone is good,it charges the iphone to 100% in 1 hour. And I use phone moderately whole day to play music, watch videos, messaging,calling and other stuff. So battery backup comes for about 10 -11 hour. So I believe its fair and nice battery backup. Earphones of this iPhone 5s are Awesome , I am sure for every music lover it gives TOP NOTCH BEATS as in like you are inside Sound composing studio..!!. I do have have On-Ear Bose headphones and I been using Bose headphones for 2 years from now, I wanted to know you that iPhone5S  headphones are equally Superb like Bose. I know you cannot compare Bose headphone with iPHONE earphone, but I experienced beats to some extent.. like BOSE..! headphone. iPhone5S is complete product, I am completely satisfied.iPhone 5S screen is small, But Im not big fan of large screen. I believe smart phone should like perfectly handheld Smartphone So iPhone 5S serve its purpose with 5 star.. Video I shooted with this device is really good with crisp and clear 1080P HD motion picture. This smartphone has 8MP lens, Still Pics are nice with good details.As I use DSLR, I am not fan of smartphone camera since all smartphones except iPhone6S have small sensor motor which cannot capture details. Finally as you know Use and Feel of Iphones are always great. IPhone5S has Siri(Voice recognition) feature which lets you read your E-mail ,play music , navigate places and many stuffs with handsfree, and this phone takes your thumb impression to unlock ,all these features makes phone  a smartphone..!! My last word.. to all buyers that, Buying iPhone from Flipkart online, I made NO MISTAKE..!! and I'm truely Satisfied. Even if you go to Apple store and buy,you get same product by spending 3K or 4K more..!! . I was really looking forward to own an iPhone for last 2-3 years & Flipkart helped me to make that dream to a reality in the form of an iPhone 5S Spac-e Grey 16 GB  (Model A-1530).
  

  This is really a stunning piece of creation & I was amazed by the kind of discounts offered by Flipkart & WS Retail for such a flagship product from Apple.
  

  The product was safely delivered as "manufacturer box packed iPhone" double packed inside Flipkart's own box along with Credit Card swiping facility while taking the delivery at my doorstep (COD).
  

  As indicated by their website, the product was 100% new & genuine &  Apple India's domestic service warranty (1Year) has started as soon as I activated my phone. Since apple products need activation using a SIM, you can make out the status by checking the activation status of its IMEI with Apple website, immediately after Flipkart prepares the invoice.
  

  The new iCloud storage of 5GB (free with iPhone) helped me to seamlessly transfer all my contacts from my old Android phone to the new iPhone.
  

  My overall experience for the shopping experience with Flipkart, their back end partner WS Retail & the logistics partner Ekart Logistics are Simply Superb... Please keep it up guys...

I got this phone from WS Retail on flipkart for a price of 18.5k. When I check the price today, it is 22k. I ask myself whether I would buy the product today for 22k and the answer is yes.
  

  I bought this phone as an upgrade to my Moto G first edition. Now that I am using an Apple product and iOS, I doubt whether I will ever go back to android. The UI is absolutely amazing and I have nothing but praise for the performance of this device.
  

  A lot of people had discouraged me from going for this product with 16 GB storage as they felt that it was insufficient. I thought otherwise as I had been using a Moto G 16GB without expandable storage and had never suffered from a lack of storage.
  

  So far, I am using 32 extra applications over and above the ones that came pre-installed. the OS has also upgraded to version 9.3.1 and I have around 7.5 gb of free space. Have around 120 odd images on the device currently. No songs though but will be loading them on the device soon. Even then, I doubt whether I will ever have any space issues.
  

  The best part about this phone is the camera. The i-sight camera is 8mp but the output is really superb. Even the front camera is brilliant for taking selfies. Way better than what one will get at this price range at the very least. Now it will be unfair to compare the device with the more recent apple products.
  

  I am extremely happy that I purchased this device at this price-range and I would recommend everyone to go for this if they want an apple product.
 
 

   READ MORE

column6: A Decent Phone at a Decent Price
column7:
While i have been using this piece for over 2 weeks, I am more than satisfies with its performance. I believe I have just got it at the right price of 18500/- and awesome delivery experience in 24 hours from the time of order.
  

  It was COD so I anticipated to have a look and feel of the product before I would pay. I had to pay before I could touch or feel my product. However, the deliver guy was patient enough to wait till the time I opened the Packet, opened the Box and and saw the piece in a fine working condition. Mind you these phones do not have a Hologram Seal or Sticker to the Box. These are sealed in a transparent plastic wrapper.
  

  Have a Look at the Pros and Cons
  
  Pros :
  
  1) Its a Babe to hold in your hand. Has that Paisa-wasool feel when you hold her in hand for the first time
  
  2) Display works fine
  
  3) iTunes and other stuff work as comitted
  
  4) Its a Grab at this price point. Was expecting SE to be cheaper but even the predicted price for SE was 39000 so jumped to grab a 5s.
  

  Cons :
  
  1) Buy it if you are a small phone fan. Android to iPhone transition would be difficult as the cheapest of Android phones is 5 inches which ergonomically fits an adult hand. This phone is a bit smaller. Texting becomes difficult at times. No complaints, I love the size though.
  
  2) Heats up while charging, so hot that one cannot use it at charge. Even at a regular use when the battery falls below 40%, the phone starts warming up. Tried everything from putting off the Data and Location Services to limiting data connection to Apps. Still fighting to find a solution for this.
 
 

   READ MORE

column6: Awesome design and feel with great camera
column7:
I had been jumping between Asus Zenfone to Nexus 5 to Iphone 5c and finally this 5s since Aug 2015. Once I was on iOS it is very difficult to even consider another OS such is the way they make their products. The iPhone 5s is perhaps the best design Apple has ever made. With its metal body, camphered edges and small size and light weight. The phone looks awesome when you hold especially the Space gray with its understated looks.
  

  I just upgraded to iOS 9.3 and seems like battery life has improved slightly. Only one gripe I have with the phone is heating issues. Sometimes with some applications the phone tends to get warm very quickly Partly because of the metal body which radiates heat very fast. Other than this there is no issues with the phone. Battery wise the small 1500ah battery gives brilliant standby. Overnight with wifi on the charge drops by only 2-3%. With my light to moderate use for a day the battery once unplugged at 9am lasts nearly 12hrs.
  

  Would I still recommend this phone in 2016? Yes if you love small screen size and are a fan of mobile photography.
 
 

   READ MORE

Firstly I thank flipkart for delivering the product within 48 hours and that too on Sunday!! That was extremely fast and punctual.
  
  Now back to the device. Guys flipkart does not sell 2nd hand goods. Just check for the seller ratings and the number of days for return. For instance i trusted WS Retail on this. The page on flipkart says it to be ios 7, but indeed it came with the ios 9.2 (upgraded to ios 9.2.1, expected ios 9.3 on march'2016). And the manufacturing of the device is on January'2016. So it is a new device.
  
  I wont mention any device or ios features as there are a bundle on the internet. But it is a beautiful device. Display looks great. Does not heat up at all, unless any heavy game is played using a lot of the GUI. The battery lasts more than a day if games are not played and you turn on the battery saver mode in settings (provided with ios 9). And the ios 9 works fluidly on the device. No lag.
  
  Inbuild apps install or show upon the region settings you configure on the device.
  
  The only con I faced switching from an android device is that the app sizes inflates in size and there isn't any way to clear up the cache on just a click. Hope apple comes up with this soon in any ios release. Anyways this issue is only faced for people buying the 16GB variant (11.8 GB available).
  
  I would heavily recommend this device. Just if you need a greater screen size, apple pay, A8/M8, NFC, sleeker model then go for the iphone 6. Else all are the same, even the screen resolution. But you may have to pay more for it (+15k~).

-The A7 Processor is fastest chip taking full advantage of 64-bit processing.

Yo silly android fans! I'm a pre existing note 2 user and I'll break it down for you, a 1.5ghz quad core processor can be faster, slower or equally fast as that of a single core 1.5ghz processor! I'm sure you didn't know that( hint?? Its optimisation)! We use benchmark applications for finding it and the ordinary 1.3ghz dual core chipset of iPhone 5s could beat the 2.3ghz quad core processor of note 3 despite of note 3 using a special code for increasing its benchmark results by upto 20 percent ( reported by ars technica). Megapixels don't matter its size and quality of sensor and aperture that does ! Differentiating between full hd and hd resolution on a nearly 4 inch screen ain't possible unless you're up close! And having premium looks is what matters the most! I felt really bad when someone thought of my note 2 as a grand! After getting the 4.3 update on my note 2 it freezes randomly and I'm supposed to remove the battery and start over again and it's been four months and Samsung hasn't done anything that's y i switched to apple....now that I've bought an iPhone 5s I can rest! column6: Great phone if you dont want too many customization
column7:
As a first user of IOS, I am still adjusting the constraints which were absent in Android.
  
  The phone is a great phone but you have to live with the IOS. I personally feel high end Android phones have left iPhones behind wrto the features, compatibility and variety of applications on PlayStore at a comparable prices.
  

  Pros:
  
  Less customization to bang your head with
  
  Great earphones - Unique and comfortable design and a plus for bass lovers.
  
  A decently loud ringtone and speaker volume.
  
  Great front/back camera if you are not a megapixel freak. It really does not matter. Very clear photos in both night and day with desirable focus at the tap of camera screen, manual exposure adjustments and variety of in-built chrome filters.
  
  Google account synced easily.
  
  Fingerprint sensor makes it super easy to unlock screen in the hands of the authentic user
  

  Cons:
  
  Battery life could be better. 1 day of battery life with medium-light heavy usage.
  
  Expensive accessories
  
  Lot of apps have limited interoperability in terms of sharing data with other apps. Ex: From Facebook you cannot "Share External" to another app.
  
  Default Mail Application does not open a mail if there is no internet connectivity and if you have never opened that mail's content on the phone.
 
 

   READ MORE

Look great, excellent built quality, very fast and smooth no lag, excellent camera, sound quality of speaker and the headphone is great, battery is ok - charging is very fast and lasts one day after avg use, touch ID works great, iOs is easily upgradable - updated to 9.2 on the very first day. I am very much satisfied by 5s.
  
  I waited for a long time to buy my first iphone because of many apprehensions. But now after using it for 6 months i can say i have made the right choice. It suits really well for my needs. Good battery backup with just 1560mah which lasts around 40hrs for me on an average.
  
  It has heating issue when the network is down + on charge or when using 4g continuously(this also drains charge faster).
  

  I am not much into bigger phones so this 4.7" is my perfect daily gadget. No need to say anything about the iOS because its awesomeness is a known thing( of course with its share of cons like not an open piece of software.
  

  Operating the phone as is smooth as butter. I would love to continue with apple phone in the future only if it is priced below 25k. Because i feel its not worth to spend more than that for a Phone!!!!

column6: Frustrated with Buggy iPhone. Service care pushes replacing.
column7:
Apple Customer Service is is horrible. Never invest your money on iPhone. It is not even 1 year since I have bought iPhone & only 2 months after buying I have used it properly. Rest of the times, it always gives problems. Heating problem, unexpected shut down, ghostly behavior, automatic on/off silent button, only home button heating up problem.. I can't explain how much frustrated with this.
  
  During the ghostly behavior also they did not replace the phone considering other issues along with it, they just replaced the display & other issues were never resolved. Horrible people ask me to go to service center as soon as the problem occurs, but service is open only from 11 A.M to 6:30 P.M.
  
  Only one lady from the technical adviser's was following up well during ghostly behavior of the phone. Recently, for heating up & silent button ghost behavior issue was observed, I got contacted to another technical Adviser Basit &he promised to resolved & explain the problem to service center, this guy made me wait in center for 1hr45mins & never called up even after continuous voice calls. Neither service center people were ready to take the phone for service as Case was raised. When Basit never called up, I had to fight with the center for checking the issue. Overall, very bad experience with iPhone. Please don't buy this phone. Instead, you will get multiple best phones in less price.

There is something a prospective buyer should understand before even looking to buy an iphone 5s.
  
  I'm no apple fanboy, trust me, but it IS the best phone available on market right now.
  
  Not the most value for money, but the ultimate best. The Primera.
  

  Looks wise, I'd say its not a bad job. The same signature look that it has carried on since long. The gold and gray look fantastic, and feels nice in hand as well. But looks aren't even the intro to the whole story.
  

  The A7 chip inside is the best processor available on market for mobile devices, even better than the top of the line SnapDragon 800 which is the best any android/windows phone can offer.
  
  The performance gains are not significant enough to matter to a casual user, or any user unless you were really looking for it. Its like saying ones a lockhead blackbird and others a falcon htv2. FYI, they're both insanely fast aircrafts. For people like us, its insignificant which is really faster. The 64bit architecture wouldnt matter much to the normal user as long as the applications dont make use of it. Its just apple being paranoid as usual about being future proof.
  
  In addition to the processor capabilities, a major plus of Apple devices is that iOS7 was optimized for A7, while android(kitkat or jbean or whatever) is not. Android runs on a vm which leeches out a bit of the potency.
  
  The GPU performance is commendable, and the motion processor m7 is also a unique characteristic, though if its full potential can be used in normal scenario remains to be seen. Yet.
  
  The fingerprint scanner is a new innovation, and seems to work pretty good unless your hands are too sweaty. Currently its use is limited though in time in-app authentication as well as credit card/bank acc/wallet authentication could also be done using it. Lots to look forward to.
  

  Downsides are also there, iOS7 needs more optimization to be better. And some might prefer a bigger screen to utilize all that juice inside. Though IMO the size seems optimum, not too big for a phone, and not too small to be disappointed. The battery could be a bit improved too, to last more than a day. A7/M7/PowerVR6 does drink a lot of power.
  

  All in all, I5s is not your casual whip-it-out-of-the-pocket-and-throw-it-to-the-bed smartphone, its a carefully constructed marvel. Powerful, future proof upto maybe 2+years, which is not something any other phone can boast about. Only two things stand in the way of it being the optimum phone, 1st being on the higher side of the food chain, and 2nd the more important one, we dont need that much power or performance. Yet. The app ecosystem, however large and varied it is, still doesnt have any applications that make use of the a7/m7 processors inside, or the 64bit architecture for that matter. And without it, its just a lamborghini on indian roads. Still, It IS the most expensive phone on the market. And again, it IS better than any, and you don't get to be the best without beating the best, and it costs to do that, like, a LOT.

column6: Steep on the price but a fantastic phone otherwise.
column7:
Build Quality: Unmatched (The closest competitor would be the HTC One)
  

  Display: Many people complain that this 4-inch retina display offering is joke when compared to what other manufacturers offer these days. But this is not a phablet; it's comparatively much easier to use with one hand and the color tone of the 5S is much better than the overly saturated displays on the Galaxy S4 and Galaxy Note 3.
  

  Processor and RAM: The 5S has only 1GB RAM and a Dual Core processor which seemingly pales in comparison to what other flagship phones have to offer. But if you are a serious buyer, don't be fooled by these specs because the iPhone 5S is actually "The Fastest Phone ever tested" till date. The reason why the iPhone 5S blows away the competition is because it's processor is made specifically for the phone and it utilizes and squeezes processing power in the most efficient way unlike other phones whose processors are generic and used across various manufacturers without really utilizing available power to it's full extent.
  

  Camera: The 5S has a excellent camera but it is not the best in the market.
  

  Call Quality: Normal calls are just as good as any other phone. But not many people are aware of the new facetime audio HD calling feature across iOS 7 users, the clarity is almost too much! You can even hear a person swallow or smack his/her lips. Little too intimate if you ask me :-)
  

  Special Feature: Fingerprint Scan and unlock your phone. People may argue over the pros and cons of such a feature but I would personally prefer such a feature which I will certainly make use of; instead of an almost useless fancy feature which I rarely use. (Eg: Touch to share)
  


  Price: Considering that the manufacturing cost of the iPhone 5S is just one dollar more than that of the iPhone 5 whose manufacturing cost is around INR 13,000; I would have liked the 5S to be priced at 40,000. It is without doubt EXPENSIVE!
 
 

   READ MORE

!!! I am Using this Phone Since May 2014 as Primary Phone !!!
  
  I have iphone 6 & 6s , but this is my Personal Favorite.
  
  ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  
  Please Read Complete Review, it will Help You to take a Decision if you are Planning to Buy it in 2017.
  
  ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  
  Pros:
  
  1) Screen Size is Optimum for One Hand use.
  
  2) Light Weight and Very Compact.
  
  3) Super Durable as till date I have Not needed Anything to Repair.
  
  NOTE: I am a Rough User( ex-Nokia User) and have Dropped it Many times from various Heights and it has got just few Scratches.
  
  4) Considerably Fast compared to its Android Counterparts.
  
  5) Handles Huge Games like NOVA , MC 5, Asphalt 8 Flawlessly.
  
  6) Camera Quality is Unbeatable even today.
  
  7) Touch ID is still Properly Working.
  
  8) Still Gets Latest iOS Updates.
  
  9) Lot of Accessories still Available.
  
  10) Charger and Ear-phones are still Working.
  
  -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  
  Cons:
  
  1) Heats a Lot after 30 Mins of Literally Any App, Camera, etc Use.
  
  2) Back is Scratch Magnet. ( I have Installed Decal to hide Scratches )
  
  3) Very Less Memory Available. You need to Keep on Deleting stuffs Regularly.
  
  4) Updates are Regular, but Consumes Lots of Storage.
  
  5) Battery Life is Weak Point. Initially it had 7-8 Backup. Now its Max. 4-5 Hrs.
  
  NOTE: I am Using Internet 24x7, either Wifi or Mobile Data.
  
  6) Wake Button is Over-Pressed and Ringer Button is Not Working Properly. Now the Repair is Needed.
  
  NOTE: This happened recently when I accidentally Dropped my phone from 1st Floor in the Mall.
  
  7) itune sync is Very Hectic Process.
  
  ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  
  Should You Buy it in 2017:
  
  If you want Apple Product for Normal Use including Net Surfing and have NO Issue dealing with itunes, then Trust Me, GO FOR IT.
  
  If you want Highly Rated Specs which Literally have No Meaning or Any new Features like NFC,etc then Instead go for New Companies like MI or 1 Plus, etc.
  
  ----------------------------------------------------
  
  Thank You for reading this Review.

column6: The best of Apple in a phone
column7:
I had a iPhone 4 for last 3.5 years and used it without a single problem. Although it had no issues started to feel the urge to upgrade. Was trying to wait for iPhone 6, but took the plunge and got myself this. I have read reviews that the touch ID has problems, but i have not had any issues with one week of usage. It works like a charm. It is how you set it up. Zero lag and super snappy. I dont go with amount of RAM of how many cores a phone has. After a short stint with Scamsung (typo was intentional :p) galaxy, i really thought how people spend upwards on 40K for their phones.
  
  Moving from iPhone 4 to 5s surely felt like a upgrade and transferring apps, contacts and settings was a breeze using iTunes.

Best phone from Apple.
  

  bought the phone for 13k in flipkart big billion days. While i could see the same phone in amazon, snapdeal for 20k to 21k. Have been using it for 1 month and here is my full review.
  

  Pros:
  

  1. Never hangs.
  
  2. High level games can be played flawlessly
  
  3. Both cameras are perfect and it allows you to take a professional photos.
  
  4. Fast charging.Within 50 mins, it gets charged from 5% to 75%.
  
  5. Fingerprint Scan works perfectly
  

  Cons;
  

  1. Battery capacity is low. But if you are an average user this wont bother you much.
  
  2. Storage capacity. 16gb fills faster. But if you have a laptop then it wont be a much problem as u can store all your photos there.
  
  3. Heats when u are using it while charging
  

  Final rating: 4.5 star out of 5
  

  recommended: Yes. highly recommended

column6: fabulous phone within this price range !!
column7:

It's my first ios and even after one and half months it feels new and classy as well. This review for those also who blames flipkart that they provide duplicate product i would like to say that it is totally wrong.

  2)fab camera
  
  3)ios 9.3 is awesome

I have used a Windows, Android, Blackberry, Symbian and iPhone in last 24 months.
  
  And I am very much satisfied with my iPhone 5S.
  

  I moved from Symbian for the lack of smartness in the smartphone.
  
  I moved from Android for the lack of speed and lag and bad UI and battery life and looks and everything else under the stars.
  
  I moved from Windows because of the lack of app support.
  
  I moved from Blackberry because, well it was a blackberry.
  
  My iPhone 5S has so far been satisfactory in all the above shortcomings of a smartphone. I know is BLOODY EXPENSIVE for a phone. But you get what you pay for. Just don't let it drop, its a fragile phone.

column6: Sold my Note 2 and came to Iphone 5s after 1 year
column7:
its a fact that android is not optimised so it will hangs in a phone like Quad core .. yes thats true android will android in Quad core also .. if it is stock android then its ok but you wont find better Quality on stock android devices like nexus so I choose samsung who maintain Quality
  

  Frankly m' highly disappointed with my note 2 they launch free update for 1 year of gap after google launching it for free of cost ..
  

  anyways coming to Iphone 5s .. its very smooth , every app build with Quality no doubt app store is filtered and it is also having Good Quality apps only not like android
  

  Battery backup is uncompromised m' getting it for 2-3 days easily on wifi 24hrs connected to it ..
  

  This phone original price is 35k but indians are selling it for 50k thats a very bad part ..
  

  I finally agree with others who said apple is always apple .. its incomparable and no one can beat its Quality
  

  100 stars for apple on making the phone for handy .. I am able to put this phone in any jeans and I can carry to anyplace not like note 2 or note 3 .. so finally m' 100% satisfied with this phone
 
 

   READ MORE

I've been using an iPhone for 7 years now and always been a great fan of Apple's flagship product since 2007. I don't find much difference between the iPhone 5 vs iPhone 5S, there is a significant improvement in camera and hardware on the 5S and you would experience when you are a heavy gamer. The slo-mo feature on iPhone 5S has been my favorite so far and the touch to purchase/unlock is great add-on though at times it doesn't recognise your finger if they are wet or not kept at right angle.
 
 

   READ MORE

Flipkart delivers right on time, I used 90 Rupees, they promise to deliver next to next day and they did it. It was very well packed in bubble wrapped, the phone condition is top notched not used, that you can check from phone since last charge setting which was showing none.
  
  About iPhone, there are many reviews, and I have been in apple eco system for two years, in  first 10 mins, all my contacts, email and password settings are there pretty cool. In an hour after synching to iTunes, all my apps and games are there.
  
  Touch Id work flawless, and you wish it to be integrated more.
  
  Speed of phone is awesome.
  
  Camera is no brainer, launch, click, best point and shoot with minimum fuss. Slow motion is super cool.
  
  Looks like iOS7 and iPhone 5s are made for each other. I was using iOS7 in iPhone 4s and you can clearly see the difference, it was running smooth in 4s but with 5s its like made for each other.
  
  And apple has best in class after sale service, I had very good experience with them.
 
 

   READ MORE

Apple has been crazy but didn't think this bad....
  
  At this price i would get much much better phone like the note 3.... even the galaxy s4 is better than this even though it is older, All flagship models of android OEMs are better than this....
  

  At this price what do they offer???
  

  First of all no sd card slot! I cant even increase the memory, if i want more memory i need to pay more like some 9k for 32gb n 18k for 64gb... lol thats crazy.
  
  Then the camera, it is just 8mp with the aperture big at f/2.2, seriously what can u get by just increasing the aperture, now other companies are offering 13mp for their flagships
  
  Then is their closed OS.. i agree that it cannot be infected by virus but still that doesnt mean u keep it that closed no customization
  

  Talking about the hardware it is too old u just hv a dualcore processor n just 1gb ram
  
  The screen resolution- 640 x 1136 pixels, it is very less, today the highest screen resolution in smartphones is 2k resolution n then FullHD, they arent even giving 720p resolution... n the retina display is just a marketing gimmick nothing good about it, it is just a lcd display with a name given to it!! Whom r u fooling apple?
  
  This phone doesnt have much features as compared to android
  
  There r many flaws in the product in fact all iphones..
  

  Rather i would suggest that people willing to buy at this price should buy Flagships from other companies like the Note 3, LG G2, HTC One, Sony xperia Z1, etc
  
  This phone is not worth buying
  

  there is no -5 option so i selected 1 star :p

I am a professional Photographer. And for last many years I have used several apple products.
  

  Previously I used to use Moto G. But what I came across is android does not have pro quality apps that I can use while I am at work. I neither wanted my phone to be blazing fast gaming console nor as big as a UHD TV.
  
  Apple has an array of very well designed and well maintained apps like LUMU, Photographer's Ephemeris, Easy Release, ClickMeeting. Although they are mostly paid apps but they are flawless. I am using these apps for years never faced an issue like hang or system crush.
  

  So I can't say about gaming or other high end usage. But if you need a phone that you can rely on; Moreover if you need a phone that is productive then you should not think of anything else.
  

  Though I have seen many negative feedback from many customers regarding product delivery by flipkart. But I have received and original and new phone from flipkart. No issues yet.

I was using Samsung Galaxy Note for past 1.5 years. Yeah, for the first 2 weeks its was difficult to adjust from the big screen in galaxy to the small in Iphone. Having said that its an awesome phone you have to admit it.
  
  1. Small small things in Iphone which you will see only in Iphone like short letters in typing, immediate sync to other email accounts from phone to mails, quick access apps from any screen, etc)
  
  2. Touch: You cant beat apple when comes to touch sensitivity. you can judge when you play games like temple run and all. What i feel is touch sensitivity is 100% more that other phones.
  
  3. Call quality: Same as other phones.
  
  4. Camera: Same as Samsung but, the response time from one pic to other is very minimum and i bet you like that. In burst mode, you wont believe the rate at which it snaps the photo... i was shocked when i tried first. In one second you can click 5 photos, maybe more :)....
  
  5. Music: No need to explain the music when comes to apple. The speaker is louder and its far better than other smartphones.
  
  6. You can charge battery in 1.5 hrs and its quite fast
  

  Drawback:
  
  1. Wifi connectivity between apple to other products
  
  2. You cant charge your phone in any other cable except apple cable.(safety wise its very good in this case)
  

  So my mark out of 10 is 8. You can go for it...
 
 

   READ MORE

column6: Product is amazing ,but surprised by Flipkart.
column7:
I have been buying many product from Flipkart form past many years. But am surprised by the seller associated and the contact center response from Flipkart. Last week I ordered Apple 5s and received it on time.Today I was trying to buy the same phone for my father as his birthday gift.but I was unfortunate, I placed a order via App and got error in placing order and received sms that we will review your order but not confirmed.Inthis attempt payment was not made. After 15-20 mins I tried to place the order from website,this time everything was good and payment was successfully made and order confirmed,After few second I got another sms that your order cancelled due to high volume order and refund fallows.
  
  I called to customer care and received sorry from Flipkart guy and was not sure about the reason. Then he said the same story mentioned in sms received and took feedback.
  
  My concern.. buying 1 or 2 same product is high volume purchase??..if it is..then you need to mentioned it with product discription that only 1 piece per ID.like wise you have mentioned on other products.
  
  If my order has to canceled then why you allowed me to place.my money is blocked for 3 working days.
  
  highly disappointed ! :(
  

  Customer care guy told me to try with different ID,I tried and had same thing again,My 42k rupees blocked for 5 working days.

column6: Flipkart and their hands in Fraud.
column7:
Ipone. Great phone at Great price. Nothing more nothing less.
  
  But let me highlight here how flipkart and their sellers are involved in cheating loyal customers like me. I would like to highlight their seller SuperComNet which is the main culprit here. I bought Iphone 6s Plus during the October sale and everything was perfectly fine including the delivery. But once i unboxed my iPhone, I realized that i got a phone manufactured in May 2015. It wouldn't have made a difference if it was all the same. But Apple had updated their charger and a compact version was available in 2016. Flipkart customer care really sucks. I think they are sitting in some remote village where they do not have good reception to make sure we don't  here a word what they say and they simply refuse to do anything that we request. I did not get a refund or a replacement for the old product and plus they have ruined the experience for me. I doubt I'd ever buy from Flipkart again.
  
  PS: Please be aware of the seller SuperComNet, cos i have heard many complaints about their fraudulent methods.

column6: My First iPhone and I am loving it.
column7:
I was not a hardcore fan of iPhone. But my last android experience was not so good. I had a descent mid range android (15k-20K) device with latest OS, but I never got that lightning fast response. Sometimes my phone got crashed while receiving extremely important calls.
  
  So I was looking for better options. I came across Nexus 6P, extremely gorgeous phone and iPhone6s Plus. It was a tough decision both phones are gorgeous and premium but the price difference was quite less (8-10k). So I gave it a try, and now I am in love with this beauty.
  

  I am writing some of the best things I like about my iPhone 6s Plus :
  

  - The "Plus" matters : I was very clear about getting a plus model (or the latest one). Apart from other technical advantages over 6s, one of the most practical advantages is the battery life. I use my phone on 4G all the time and I have to charge my phone once in 24 hours (sometimes twice if I have nothing else to do than playing high graphics games on my phone :P). It may sound unbelievable but the standby time is extraordinary e.g. if I charge my phone to 100% and go to sleep, I wake up with 99-98%.
  

  - is 16GB enough? : This question was bugging me most before buying this model. I did a lot of research about 16 GB model and found out no one will ever suggest you to buy 16gb model. But guess what I bought a 16GB model and I am more than happy with it. I have music of around 1GB of space, 1-2 high graphics games, all the necessary apps (social media, shopping, travel etc) and obviously lots of pics (but no pirated movie videos) and after all that I have left with a descent more than 5GB of free space. It all depends on how you use your phone. So analyze your needs, if you are planning for 16GB model. It's been more than a month and I have no issues with the space whatsoever. If you are a busy person (like me :P) and spends more time coding on your laptop in office than using your phone all the time and you have smart practices like taking backup and using iCloud then 16GB would be sufficient. And the price difference is huge between 16 and 64GB. So it all depends on your needs and personal preference.
  

  - Lighting fast and Reliable : The two primary things I was looking in my next phone were - Performance and Reliability. I mean even if you are spending a good 15k-20k, you deserve performance but I was very disappointed with my previous android devices in this matter (specially phones of mid range). But my iPhone 6s Plus works just fine. Its lighting fast. And when I am saying lighting fast it really is. Mind blowing performance. No lag, hang or any kind of problem what so ever.
  

  - Beauty : I have the black-grey variant which looks fabulous.
  

  - Accessories : I got a charging cum data cable, a wall charger and ear phones with this model. The earphones are descent but I already have sennheiser (quality difference is obvious) so I barely use iphone's earphones.
  
  Though I like my phone without any flashy back cover or any other accessories I do prefer to use a screen protector but I am having a bad time finding it. Its very difficult to find a quality screen guard, I tried apple stores, even they sell cheap screen guards which you can also find online. 6S Plus has 3D touch so careful with the choice of screen protector, most of the usual tempered glasses will break or won't work properly.
  

  Overall, I am in love with my phone. I was looking for performance and peace of mind and after using my iPhone 6s plus for around a month I can say that my choice couldn't be better than this.
  

  So if you like hi performance gadgets, appreciate quality and if you have a descent budget then go for this phone.
 
 

   READ MORE

Pros:
  
  1) Bigger Screen (Excellent size for watching youtube or other videos and playing games)
  
  2) Battery - lasts almost 1 and half day with regular use (browsing - 5 hrs, listening songs - 1 hr, playing games - 3 hrs, other web-based applications like whatsapp, hangouts etc. - 7 hours, Mail - fetches new data every 15 min)
  
  3) 3D touch (I use it very rarely, but it's good to have)
  
  4) TouchID - One of the best fingerprint scanners I have seen so far (nexus 6P is the other one, but i like the fingerprint placement on iphone)
  
  5) Syncing between Macbook and iPhone
  
  6) Awesome Design (I switched from iPhone 5 to iPhone 6s plus and I am loving the new design)
  

  Cons:
  
  1) Bigger Screen (yes I know.. I listed the same in the Pros section. While it's is good to have big screen size, it is very difficult to operate the phone using single hand. Reachability saves my A** sometimes though)
  
  2) Design - good looking design but very slippery in the hand. A case is must.
 
 

   READ MORE

Let's start with the bottom line. This piece of art is exceptional, matchless, unsurpassable and inimitable till date. Have it to witness perfect integration of technology, simplicity and aesthetics. Don't buy if you feel satisfaction in numbers (like ram, storage, ppi, processors cores, mAh, megapixels etc) which are irrelevant if hardware-hardware and hardware-software interactions are not done wisely. Although it is overpriced and offers limited access to users and developers, but it remains "The Chosen One" for me this time.

column6: Good phone but Flipkart Assured seems a scam
column7:
I like the phone and no issues there but I have a concern with what Flipkart Assured is all about.  You buy an iPhone which is an expensive devise and it goes through the Flipkart Assured quality check and you end up getting a phone which was manufactured in September 2015 in September 2016.  What is this?  I am stuck because I had exchanged my phone so I can't even seek replacement because I cannot do without a phone till the time they take the phone and then send a replacement.  Also, what is to say that the next one wouldn't be a year old phone.  I have had sizeable purchases from Flipkart but guess this would be my last.  I prefer to spend money elsewhere where the company works with dignity
