This is my 1st Apple product. I am an android user from the beginning and like many others, I also had that myth that IOS is nothing but a show off and wastage of money, that IOS supports nothing and all. I was a bit confused before buying this but Thank God that I did. I want to confess that I was wrong. IOS is awesome, no lagging, easy to use and navigate, and almost all the apps are supported.
  
  Now, about this handset. All I can say that it is a little beast. I prefer small IPhones over those universal sizes. This serves all my purposes.
  
  Battery-Powerfull..10/10
  
  Display-For me, great..10/10
  
  Camera-I love the front flash from retina display, but could have been better for rear cam..8.5/10
  
  Processor-Beast inside..10/10
  
  Sound- And I love apple headphone <3 I am very fond of bass and they give me that 9.5/10
  

  Summery..
  
  If you too have the myth about IPhones that they are waste of money, try and test it.

The phone is great for 27K INR When i first saw the phone in my hand i was not sure if i will be able to use the tiny 4 inch display cause I'm well suited towards 5.5 inch displays but after using it for about a week i am now used to the smaller screen the review is divided into pros and cons but bear in mind that things listed below is written based on my experience only.
  

  Pros-
  

  Compact display is very comfortable while using it with one hand
  

  The speaker quality is good
  

  The performance of the device is top notch
  

  Camera is the same as the one in 6s
  

  And the phone feels premium in hand
  

  Surprisingly the battery lasts with a full day of usage
  

  Cons-
  

  The small display is not suitable for watching videos or playing games
  

  The display is the same from 5s
  

  Design is also from 5s
  

  Same goes for touch id, it is accurate but takes   to 1 second to acually read fingerprint
  

  Lack of 3d touch
  

  Front camera is not that great
  

  iOS is a closed os which often restricts me for doing things that i normally did on Android phones.
  

  So that's all i want to say now don't spend much time on pros and cons cause that was my experience and yours may be different however this thing is a blast for the amount of money i paid... I am satisfied with this product

I am using this product since April 10th when it was delivered to me and I think its reasonable time to present a BALANCED and UNBIASED review of the product.
  

  Pros:
  
   	Exterior design similar as iphone 5s resulting into flexibility and choice of accessories at VERY competitive prices.
  
   	4-inch display still packs a punch and is GOOD when viewed in bright sunlight (set to auto brightness) and under various viewing angles.
  
   	The statement  SINGLE HANDED OPERATION  cannot be TRUER.
  
   	Finger print sensor performance is ACCEPTABLE and does not let you down.
  
   	WiFi, Bluetooth, on screen display and Mobile data (4G and 3G/2G) performance is GOOD and does NOT have heavy impact on the battery.
  
   	The lightning charge (fast charge) is truly LIGHTNING. In about 30 mins charges the phone to over 60%.
  
   	Battery life is AMAZING and last full day (24 hrs) under normal operations (calls, video playback, email, web browsing etc.)
  
   	AssistiveTouch is BOON and saves time and effort.
  
   	Clear VOICE QUALITY and the PHONE (CALLING) feature works as it should.
  
   	APP STORE is reliable and has enough APPS for regular use.
  
   	MUSIC is one of the key strengths of the iPhone and works like a CHARM. The s			stock headphone are truly GOOD.
  
   	CAMERA is OUTSTNDING and makes the tag like every bit worth,  Shot on iPhoneX . 4K videos are amazing.
  

  Cons:
  
   	No WAKE feature which means every time to need to PRESS the POWER OR the menu button to wake the phone.
  
   	NEEDs the iPhone charging cable AND hence no convenience of using other charging cables (unlike Android phones).
  
   	No clear ALL feature to remove the background APPS, need to kill them one at a time.
  
   	Of course, it's expensive in INDIA compared to US even after currency conversion.
  
   	Customer Care  experience at the iCenter store in Bangalore NOT GOOD however the customer care experience using the APPLE website is BRILLIANT.
  



  Overall:  A STAR PERFORMER, ALL THE WAY !!
 
 

   READ MORE

column6: Flipkart do not sell the original product
column7:
Sorry to say but this was our first and might be the last time that we are shopping through flipkart as after so many discussions ultimately you are not picking up the product as IMEI is not matching which is not our fault. As IMEI on the product as well as on the bill is same but the number given to the courier boy is different.
  
  The product given by you is second hand product. You are neither replacing it nor returning back our money. Talk to courier agency to pickup the product and give our money back. Give them the IMEI number of the product which is supplied to us. Solve this problem as early as possible otherwise we will file case in consumer forum.
  
  You will be responsible for all the expenses.
  
  THANK YOU

Finally, after a gap of 3years i thought to change my iPhone. Looking at all the phones with huge screens I couldn't makeup my mind to change the phone. But when I saw iPhone SE. I was so happy to see a 4-inch screen phone in the market again.
  
  People complaint about battery backup of iPhone.
  
  Trust me on this, the battery backup of iPhone SE is superb.
  
  On 3G with continuous browsing, music, online gaming the battery backup is around 9-11hrs that varies.
  
  On 4G the backup is fine around 6-8hrs with gaming.
  
  The voice quality of SE is awesome.
  
  Talking about the camera 12MP takes such beautiful pictures that people will have a doubt that you took it from a DSLR.
  
  Yeah, I'm an Apple Fanboy but trust me.
  
  If you're looking for a phone with small screen with perfect camera, sound quality, smooth performance then go for iPhone SE.
 
 

   READ MORE

First of all, most of the people who have given this phone one star have not bought or even used it. They did it just because it is priced so high in India. I do agree it is overpriced, but it is not bad enough to be rated one star.
  

  I got this phone as I needed a small and reliable phone which would not give me any trouble every now and then. This is the strongest plus point for iPhones. They perform consistently and you will experience no lag at all. The camera is great and I was surprised by the speakers too. Surely iOS is quite restricted if compared to Android, but that is one of the reasons that it hardly ever fails. But, I would like to say that get this phone only if you want a small phone.

column6: Small & Powerful works like 7 series but looks like 5 series
column7:
If you are looking for small size screen which fits in your hand and still not compromise on performance then this is it.
  
  Initially, though "rose gold" wasn't my first choice but then its uniqueness actually is very easily accepted by people and has its own liking.
  

  Its a really good iPhone considering size and performance as factors.
  
  Being avid android user, switching to iOS might be little painful as some of the major apps don't really work and the whole UI personification does work with it.
  


  Pros:
  
  Ideal size for someone looking for avg screen size phone, good form factor.
  
  Great performance - no lags/hangs, great multitasking, smooth workflow
  
  Decent Display considering Apple Brand name.
  
  Really nice camera, even low light is fine
  
  Touch ID is good
  
  Battery life ~1day (4g/Wifi + 1hour talk time + chats + 1hr geo maps + surfing + mail)
  
  Ok audio quality form speakers.
  

  Cons:
  
  16GB is enough space if you use cloud services and you don't want to install too many apps (i have about 25-30 apps i use majorly still got 8GB).
  
  For rest the space is soon going to disappear.
  
  There are bugs from application perspective itself (like apps switching from lock screen notification to main screen) but i think Apple and developers will work it out
  


  Apple could have done more than just special "rose gold", like little more current design for whole SE series but then its individuals choice.
 
 

   READ MORE

Dont believe on rumours
  
  It is small beast and small 6s
  
  I love it
 
 

   READ MORE

The good Packs nearly every worthwhile feature (processor, great camera, Apple Pay, always-on Siri) from iPhone 6S into a smaller, more affordable 4-inch phone. Compatible with all iPhone 5/5S cases and accessories.
  

  The bad Selfie cam doesn't get a megapixel upgrade, and there's no 3D Touch. Older design, while still good-looking, is exactly like the older iPhone 5S.
  

  The bottom line While the rest of us wait for the iPhone 7s later this year, the iPhone SE is a great choice for small phone fans looking for an 'iPhone 6S Mini.'
 
 

   READ MORE

Got the phone too early than delivery date-thanks flipkart.
  
  Now the phone -since I was previously an android user I was actually hesitating to buy it but I ordered it with that hesitation . The phone came in excellent packing condition with all the things and a lovely rose gold color.
  
  I switched on the phone the apple logo came , still I was worried ,but after completing the setup I kinda felt secure like more than android (I don't know why) well that was that , the phone features are already on flipkart so I won't say anything but apples 2gb ram is equivalent to android's high end phone's ram and same with graphics ,so it wasn't any issue overall the phone is cool
  
  But now to the negative points- it's my 3rd day and still I haven't figured out a way to directly download MP3 or videos to my phone ,(that sucks), but you can use online music apps like Wynk also you can't download torrents! (The only 2 things I hate about the phone ) also I forgot to mention camera - both front and back camera are awesome also the slow motion camera is the coolest feature I've used in a camera , I don't know why many people have issues with "MegaPixels" for them it's only a 12mp camera but believe me apple's 12mp is way more than that . So if you download stuffs on computer and want a handy phone,go for it or else if you "only" use your phone for download and stuffs  and want a very big phone ,go for the one plus 3t 128gb (I have one plus 3 64gb also) (sorry I just wrote things without any order)

Got the best deal ever...best exchange value for my old phone... The iphone se is as powerful as the iPhone 6s but more cheaper than the iPhone 6...got this for 23k after exchange for my iPhone 5 during the big billion day sale
  

  There r notably 3 differences compared to the iphone 6s
  
  Front camera is just 1.2 megapixel compared to 5 megapixel in 6s so a bit disappointing for selfie users for face time I guess it's fine
  
  The screen size and built are different which is very much a personal choice but I believe the 6s does look premium but a lesser screen size would mean better one hand usage and a marginally better battery back up.
  
  And 3d touch feature is not present in the se which I personally feel hardly matters and you might not be using it
  


  But ya also remember it's 7-8k more cheaper than the iphone 6s
  

  If u r not buying iphone 7 and looking for less expensive options then either decide between  the SE or the 6s.... Avoid the more expensive and less powerful iphone 6...also remember this phone was just released few months back so the firmware updates will go hand in hand with the iphone 6s.

Hi all,
  
  I am writing this review after using the phone for 6 days. Trust me guys if you want to buy an iPhone then start from here. Before buying this phone I was using Redmi note 3.i am still using the note 3 one along with this phone. Below are the detailed info about the phone.
  

  1- the phone looks awesome and you can easily use it one handedly. Bit small but doesn't matter. It's really powerful from inside.
  

  2- once the battery is fully charged, UT depends upon you how you are using the phone. For me I use it for call, Facebook, Internet surfing, whatsaap, and all. I can guarantee you that it will last for 30 hours for sure if you are using the phone under 4G all the time.
  

  3- I have seen in some comments People say that the phone has some heating issues. I actually laugh at them. This is iphone, you shouldn't ask micromax kind of questions. No heating issues at all. I simultaneously use music, 4G,facebook,whatsapp,but still no heating. Trust me I have bought this phone after hell lot of investigation.
  

  4- the display is really good. It is not full HD but you can't find the difference from any angle. Touch is flawless. Screen is small but still you can feel the magic when you type something. Here one thing I want to mention. If you are planning to buy this phone then be careful. You shouldn't break the display. They will charge 15500 to change only the display. So I will suggest you to buy one good back cover which will protect the corner as well as the screen.
  

  5- coming to the camera. I am not a photographer but I can blindly say the 1. 2 MP front camera will give you some photos which you will not find from a 5 or even 8 MP camera in any other phone.
  

  6-processing is completely smooth. Far far far better than an android processor. Never you will find any lagging or any slowness.
  

  Finally I will say this is an awesome phone. Previously people used to say that Apple charges too much extra for all these, for those kind of people I will say, there is a word called class which you will feel from your heart. If you are coming from Android to ios then for first two days you will feel like inside a jail. But after that you will feel safe and happy.
  

  If this comment is useful for you then please share your feedback.
 
 

   READ MORE

column6: Not just a Phone, its a powerful Gadget !
column7:
I always wished to have an apple product and this one is the best for a beginner to have an experience on iOS. Though it has 5s design , the chip(a9) configs. are exactly wad u see in 6s and 6sPlus models. And this is the current moving model which is on the official apple store(check the official website for reference). Excellent 12mpx rear cam and the 1.2mpx front (not much a selfie lover so am satisfied with that). Design wise this is the best in iPhone models (than the 7 7Plus models which is very big and spoils d look of an iPhone i.e not a handy design). If u can afford another 10k go for 6s which gives u 5mpx front cam and comes with 3D touch with a slightly bigger display than the SE.
  

  Battery backup is very good for this mighty phone. 4k recording which is a highlighted feature.(but consumes more memory space, wont be a prob if u have 64gb)
  

  I bought this 32gb for 22k (real deal) from supercomnet (genuine seller) and most of my frnds bought iGadgets from this seller only. 100% trustworthy and delivers genuine product before the estimated delivery(thanks to E-Kart).
  

  till now I din face any problem with this mobile but u will hav more people around u saying "hey why u bought this small phone yer..u cud hav got higher specs at this price and they compare urs with Redmi and OnePlus and all." My advice is IGNORE THOSE PEOPLE..BECAUSE ITS APPLE. They just give opinions and reviews about this without even experiencing it(and they just vomit wad others say) :P LOL
  

  Go for it , if you want a true iOS experience, U wont get disappointed  !
  

  note: launched in march 2016 and if u r small phone lover, get it soon before the offer ends !

Amazing mobile!
  
  Pros: 1. Compact size (One hand usability)
  
  2. Excellent display quality (IPS LCD)
  
  3. Excellent battery life considering it's size.
  
  4. Excellent camera (12MP with 4k recording)
  
  5. A9 chip with 2gb Ram (Buttery smooth performance...no lags at all)
  
  6. 4G with Volte capability (For Jio users)
  
  7. DESIGN. The best looking smartphone ever!
  
  8. iOS. The best OS for mobile devices. No non sense OS with excellent functionality.
  
  Cons:
  
  1. Screen size is small but still 4 inch is the optimal size for a phone.
  
  2. Could have made some improvements in display resolution and front design
  
  3. Slow charger in box. To charge your mobile faster, use the iPad's charger.
  
  4. 1.2MP front camera which is not best for this price.
  
  Overall a great smartphone to buy under 25k. I personally loved the 32gb variant over 128gb one considering its cost. For an average user 32gb is more than enough.
  
  If you're planning to buy a PERFECT SMARTPHONE under 25k...Go for this without any thought. You'll not be disappointed.
 
 

   READ MORE

SE - Truly a special edition.
  

  It was bit confusing to move from android to iOS after using android for nearly 6 years. It was even tougher after having used higher configuration phone like one plus 2. But finally made up mind to give a try. And all I can say is this is unbelievable experience and I don't regret at all.
  

  Camera - 12 megapixel is like 23 megapixel of Sony phone. 1.2 megapixel front camera does take decent selfies. 4K recording and Live Photos just awesome.
  
  Battery - 1624 mAH battery lasts more than 3300 mAH battery of android.
  
  Storage - The only thing to worry is the storage only 24gb usable out of 32gb but for professional usage and medium gaming that is more than enough.
  

  Final verdict - The best smartphone you get if you have a budget around 25k. JUST GO FOR IT WITHOUT ANY SECOND THOUGHT.

column6: Review after using for a week
column7:
Earlier i was using redmi note 3 but it's screen and front camera stopped working. I got iphone se on 27 june and the phone is really snappy it rarely slows down. I will list cons only.
  
  1- u will need a computer which has itunes installed to backup or copy music to your Iphone
  
  2- in youtube u can't change the video quality. I installed buzztube app which let's me change quality
  
  3- if  u recieve songs or videos from shareit it will not be moved to music and videos app directly. U will again need pc or mac.only photos get moved to photos app directly.
  


  Overall I will recommend u to buy this small beast especially if you want apple phone.
  
  *and don't worry about screen size much cause when u get used to it u will not feel that the screen is very small.

Bought it primarily for its form factor and apt screen size. I am not a big screen fan . Solid feel while in hand with the Bar structure, unlike the new generation iPhones. Take some time to get used to, had been using a 5' phone till now, but I am not missing anything with a smaller screen.
  

  1) Apt size for daily use and feels snugly in pocket.
  
  2) Very nice and bright display, I have kept it at low resolution and still feels very vibrant.
  
  3) Battery life is very good, last upto 2 days on normal usage ( moderate mix of Facebook, whataspp usage)
  
  4) Camera is very good, even low light performance was good, can't compare to s8 or newer iPhones but still ticks all boxes for a good snap.
  
  5) Good addition to have if you already own a IOS ecosystem, and that to at fraction of cost to newer IPhones.
  
  6) Does all the multitasking with breeze and would say performance has got better with the IOS 11 update.
  

  Overall very much satisfied with the purchase, got it at a very good price during recent sale. To all prospective buyers, if you are looking for a very intuitive IOS ecosystem experience without burning a big hole into your pocket, and if you can withstand a bit of IOS rigidness (unlike Android) go for it without second thought. I haven't regretted taking the plunge.
 
 

   READ MORE

column6: My first iPhone. N Im happy. Met the expectations.
column7:
Coming from android n that too a 5.5 inch I was really in doubt. Saw that its just available at 16500 by paying with SBI card. Thats why went for my 1st iPhone. But 4inch was what making me little apprehensive. But now after using 2days let me say one thing theres a reason its called iPhone. Of course 4 inch screen took some time to adjust mainly in keyboard typing. But then this is a pocket size beauty with performance of a beast. The battery life is good. Back camera is just so good with slow mo n 4K recording. N 32 gb is ok. Yes its not for people who dont like small phones. If u want a handy phone that gives you out of world experience go for it. Try your 1st iPhone. And yes it came with iOS 10.3.3 n asked for iOS 11 update as it came out of box.
 
 

   READ MORE

32gb for 20k is a great deal. Except for going to the pros, let's just enlist what all it misses out on from the iPhone 6s:
  
  1. 12mp camera. But not optically stabilized. Hence shakier videos.
  
  2. Lower resolution front camera.
  
  3. Touch ID 1.0 feels really slow sometimes. It's fine as long as you quickly rest your finger on it as the display lights up.
  

  However, not even the flagships are free from cons. All miss out on 1 thing or the other. I'll conclude this by saying it's a top notch phone quality wise if you're looking for a small pocketable phone especially under 20k. Just use it with the SwiftKey keyboard if you want to use swipe. Watch out for the SAR levels though!
 
 

   READ MORE

Late delivery by ekart but it is always a fantastic feeling when you have apple iPhone in your hand. Great and absolutely powerful product. The features and quality of camera is very good. Smooth, fast and smart product. Very happy with it. Thank you Flipkart. Just go for it guys.

column6: Absolutely the best in its class.
column7:
This is my first iPhone. I have used several Android phones such as the Moto X, Xiaomi Mi 4i, Samsung Galaxy Note, etc.
  
  The biggest challenge was shifting from a 5.5" phone to a 4" one. The compact size allows for single handed use and is blazing fast. Battery life is also very good with great standby and screen on times. Camera quality is great but it lacks optical image stabilisation. Panoramas are stunning. It works great with other Apple devices. I can receive calls on my MacBook Pro or iPad if they are connected on the same Wi-Fi network and everything syncs across beautifully.
  
  It's exactly what Apple says "A big step for small."
 
 

   READ MORE

Go for it if you need iOS but are on budget and can live with a 4-inch screen smartphone.
  
  Good Delivery from Flipkart Assured, I was so impatient that I picked up my phone from their distribution hub the third day from my date of order.
  
  Phone is working just fine and iOS is really addictive, if you think apple products are overpriced due to lower specs than other flagships, you are wrong big time as I was until I bought this phone.
  
  Since this was my first iOS device, I had a lot of expectations from it, and i am glad to say that the product is fabulous.
  
  .
  
  Pros :
  
  Very Premium and top-notch build quality, A very powerful processor, excellent 12 MP primary camera with all the 6s features, latest iOS updates- iOS being its biggest advantage and All-day battery life.
  

  Cons :
  
  1. A bit slow fingerprint scanner but you can live with it in my opinion.
  
  2. 1.2 MP primary camera but its sufficient with features like screen flash and OS optimization.
  
  3. Looks a lot like 5s, but I don't really care coz I know what a magnificent pocket-beast it is, and is far-far better than 5s :D With the new feature-rich iOS 11 update coming very soon, I know it will be butter-smooth on SE but will lag like hell on 5s.

column6: iphone se 32 gb space grey  from supercommnet review
column7:
flipkart is the authorised online merchant for apple iphone as per apples website however do buy only flipkart assured products to avoid complications from fraudulent sellers .
  

  Product received was an authentic  and original product,smooth activation and the cherry on the top is the phone is assembled in india .
  
  few notes about the product:
  
  1)hearing from the phone is low , this is a manufacturers problem and all iphone se have the same issue.
  
  2)the warranty gets activated when u register your simcard and can be verified on apples website
  
  3)there are  iphone se assembled in china and india so based on availability one gets a phone .
  
  4)always make sure the phone box is factory sealed and check the serial number for warranty before opening . if any issues i suggest returning the product.
  
  5)I am switching from a  samsung note 3 which is large i have big hands and i don't find the screen too small.its perfect for 1 hand typing
  

  Honestly i was very afraid while ordering (bad past experience with fraudulent non assured seller on flipkart)and the phone delivery got delayed by a week but in the end it was worth the wait.
  

  Also  i strongly recommend buying only with flipkart assured as there is no money back policy only replacement .
  

  The flipkart team constantly updated me on delays on assured products which i appreciate.
 
 

   READ MORE

   READ MORE

The Logo Says Everything - Apple is Awesome
 
 

   READ MORE

Perfect!
  
  Phones getting bigger and bigger, but the iPhone SE totally bucks the trend. This is a phone that's easy to use with one hand. Yes the the Samsung Galaxy S8 and HTC 11 are great handsets, but for many of us they're simply too large.
  

  How can a phone with a three year old design do it? Apple has given people a choice with the iPhone SE. The compact body is rare these days, but even though it's small it packs a mighty punch. This is a very powerful and capable phone. It can boast the same top-notch internals as the iPhone 6S and support for Apple Pay. Normally small phones are hamstrung, the iPhone SE isn't.
  

  A surprising amount of people I speak to say they want a small phone that packs all the features of a full-fat flagship. Sony is the only manufacturer to have previously attempted anything like this, but even its Xperia Z5 Compact has a not-so-tiny 4.6-inch screen and it's quite thick. The iPhone SE is much smaller and much easier to handle.
  

  Anyone who's used an iPhone 5 or iPhone 5S will feel at ease with the iPhone SE   it looks and feels almost identical, except now you can get it in a fetching rose-gold colour and its cut edges are matte rather than shiny chrome.
  


  Those phones have an iconic design and I have no problem with Apple reusing it, especially if it means they can keep costs down and pass the savings on. The best thing about the design of the iPhone SE is that it still feels quality. The brushed aluminium back is both hard and cool to touch, the buttons are solid, and it's easily small enough to use one-handed, regardless of the size of your hands.

As the model name  iPhone SE  suggest it is a special edition device from Apple targeting midrange buyers. Now coming to the technical, albeit this has only 1.2 MP front facing camera, but the pictures clicked by this camera is still better than other brand high MP front cameras, Retina Flash still manage to provide ample lighting for subject even it low light. As rear camera of this phone is equivalent to iPhone 6s there is no need to say anything further. Talking about the processor, it is also the same which is present in 6s. Although absence of 3D Touch may lower its accessibility  but for those moving from mid range android device will not notice any difference as they have never used 3D Touch before. Talking about the smaller screen size , i would like to mention it as pros because it is due to 4inch screen that it gives good battery life.
  
  Lastly I would say that if u want to shift to iOS and want to be economical then thia phone is for you just go for it

I have been looking for iPhone SE at better price and thanks to Flipkart for BBD offer. The offer was too good and delivered on time. This is my first iOS experience and it is too good. I would suggest those customers who are thinking for iPhone, then please try iPhone SE first because its handy, good looking, better than iPhone 6, have almost similar specs of iPhone 6s and will not hit your pocket if you don't like iOS applications later. Its resell value will surely not depress you. Customer can decide RAM as per their usage but 32gb is quite enough to start with. Also, it charges phone fast but not very fast.
  
  First time user, please show your patience while interacting with iOS application, as it does not have back button but the options are available in different ways. No doubt picture quality from both cameras are superb and had a very good experience. I use phone for calling, messaging, mailing and very less for games, hence phone gives me a day battery backup and sufficient for me. You will also feel premium because many of the apps are differently designed for iOS nd better than android apps. I did not face any lagging issue till now.
  
  Its ear phone never hurt ear and sound output quality is way ahead from other phones.

column6: beautiful n beast at the same time
column7:
i got the iphone on 7th , love the delivery by flipkart  and this is my review for the product
  
  coming from an iphone 6 to 7 plus is not that easy , i was use to the smaller form factor of iphone 6 n 7 plus is a big phone not for people with small hands
  
  i have real big hands n still getting use to the 7 plus.
  
  * the 5.5 inch screen is super bright n stunning
  
  * battery life is awesome , wayyyyyyyyyyy better than smaller iphone like 6 6s or even 7 , iam a heavy user n use 4g alot n still at the end of the day i have 30-40%   charge left.
  
  * the camera is the best i've seen till now , n trust me i've seen alot of them , specially the optical zoom feature in camera is sooo cool , n if you use your camera in dark then the 4 led flash comes in real handy n gives you nice n bright pic.
  
  * people say they don't like the new still home button with haptic feedback , from my personal experience i can say i like it better than the physical home button.
  
  * touch id still the fastest , n works great
  
  * i love the matt black colour
  

  overall iam happy with my purchase n i definitely recommend it to everyone looking to buy an iphone 7 plus , go for it n you wont regret it :)
 
 

   READ MORE

The Apple iPhone 7 Plus 256 GB, I had purchased on March 9, 2017 in India from Flipkart was already purchased prior to me on February 10, 2017 in UK and is activated which means it's not a fresh piece I had received. Also the earphones that came along with the phone is the duplicate product of Apple bought in India. This was confirmed to me at Apple service center, Apex at Parklane in Secunderabad, Hyderabad. Hence it's advisable to not to purchase any electronics from Flipkart.  The return and refund request of mine is also being delayed. I really do not appreciate this sort of action and I am very disappointed with the service provided by Flipkart.

column6: I am in love with iPhone 7 :)
column7:
Amazing phone :D I received iPhone 7 within 24 hours of it's launch in India :) Thanks a lot to Flipkart's courier service for that :)) completely in love with this phone :) <3 I loved the design and it is super fast (128gb) .. camera quality is amazing .. I have bought silver phone and its perfect :) extremely happy with iPhone 7 :)
 
 

   READ MORE

Started with iOS and now back to it!
  

  The iPhone 7 is a wondrous device with slick animations, gorgeous design, and compelling hardware - but it does come with its niggles - especially for people coming from Android. The first nick is the lack of convenient transitioning software (the move to iOS feature kept crashing on me for some reason) - so you have to start off by manually doing everything again - the same way you've been doing for the last 15 years or so. So say anything you want about technology but some things aren't changing here either. Now that we know that we have to feed all contacts manually to avoid complex data inconsistencies, you think of leaving that for last and install the super handy Trucaller app in the meantime - ONLY TO REALIZE MOMENTS LATER THAT TRUCALLER ON iOS DOES NOT SHOW A LIVE CALLER ID THE WAY IT DOES ON ANDROID - which essentially means you're left feeling completely embarrassed for the first few moments of any call you take if not the entirety of the call - AFTER which you can check the number MANUALLY and lament your lack of better judgment during a call.
  

  But, a few more nicks later, you will most certainly come out overwhelmingly satisfied with your decision to switch to an iDevice! Long live Apple!
  

  A big thumbs up to Flipkart for convening our purchases - big or small - in such little time and with so little trouble!
 
 

   READ MORE

After years of torture using Android, symbian and windows phone ( galaxy , lumia )
  
  finally I got what every phone user deserves in the first place.
  

  it's not just a phone , but a peace of mind. Such a smooth and fast user experience that is unmatched with any of it's rival companies.
  

  Also at the current price it's just a killer. I wouldn't have purchased it when it was 35 -40 k plus , not because of quality but only because the price was too much for me.
  

  Currently have more then 18 apps installed and the phone works just as awesome as a phone works on day one you get it new. Had this been an android , with a gb ram and quad core processor , it will just start dying within first 2 months of purchase.
  

  Dont listen to all the critics, I have come a long way using most expensive android and windows phone and I can guarantee you that you cant get this sort of experience in any other OS
 
 

   READ MORE

The iPhone i received from WS Retail was 100 % genuine with proper bill and was delivered in good packing. I have checked phone's serial no on apple website and it does show up as genuine with full one year warranty.
  

  I am no apple fan boy and always used Nokias and androids but trust me guys even though iPhone 4S is a three generation old phone with the recent announcement of iPhone 6 but it still holds its charm, looks very premium. In terms of everyday performance it is definitely fluid and on par with current generation phones. I had a Sony Xperia Z1(later sold out) with 21 Mp camera besides this phone. After getting iPhone 4S I use to avoid using my Z1 which seemed to be so huge and bulky and definitely not faster UI than my iPhone 4S. Even the camera on Z1 was slower than iPhone 4S. Also transferring data to/from my iphone 4S does not seem to be such a problem as others have made a hype of it. And ofcourse who uses bluetooth nowadays to transfer data after the introduction of whatsapp.
  

  8 GB memory and a small screen of 3.5" does seem to be a bit of limitation but not a deal breaker, at least not for me. Playing 3D games will indeed remind you of the age of he phone. Game play is somewhat jerky. The camera is fast and good. As a moderate user its definitely worth it. Prefer buying it to those cheap looking plastic and laggy android phones in this price range. However, if you are a mainstream heavy user and can stretch your budget get an iphone 5s or 6. Avoid updating iPhone 4S to iOS 8 as it does take a performance hit. I have not updated mine but user experiences on various websites say so.
 
 

   READ MORE

Earlier I was using a windows phone & was quite satisfied with that until one day there was a small problem with touch & I had to visit the Nokia Care for getting it repaired. The Nokia guys kept my phone for good 25 days & finally when they returned my phone after replacing the touch(at least they claimed to have done it) the phone was all covered with scratches. I didnt accept that & requested for a replacement. Finally I got the phone replaced & later the problem with touch started again. This time I gave up & switched to Iphone as I could not afford to remain away from my emails for another 25 days. IPhone has got many good features. It doesnt have a good battery backup though . you may have to charge it twice a day with moderate usage (emails/facebook/watsapp/Browsing) the screen resolution & camera is quite good & also there are a good number of apps available in the app store. The email client in the windows phone is much better as compared to iPhone.You wont want to go back to android/ windows once you have used this phone. the only two phone that can compete with Iphone 4s in this price range are Nokia Lumia 925 & Moto X. If you really want to go for windows/ android then either one of the two phones mentioned above will be a good choice.

I purchased this phone after a lot of review as usual and now I am sooo happy with my decision. This phone is amazing even after 4 years of its launch and It looks damn cool and stunning with its glass and steel combination.
  
  The best things about this phone --
  
  At the price of 13k, it is a treat for the buyer. I just love its looks and no other phone can match it at this price range.
  
  This phone is for people who don't like jumbo screen phones.It is small, it is cute, it fits well in hand and the screen size is perfect
  
  It is for people who don't just go with the numbers (2/3/4 GB RAM, quad/octa/hexa core processors)
  
  It is for people who want to use a phone as a phone and not as a gaming machine or a chatting machine
  
  It is for people who love taking pictures because its camera is wonderful. People who take 5-10 selfies everyday, please avoid this phone.
  
  It is for people with moderate usage of all the features. For low-moderate usage, the battery stands for 22-24 hrs and for moderate-high usage, the battery stands for 8-12 hrs
  

  If you fall in the above category, just go for this phone blindly. You will love it.
  
  I purchased it just for its looks but after using it now, i feel the performance is also very good.
  
  Thanks to WS Retail, they have given me a new phone as I was worried about getting a refurbished phone after reading so many negative reviews any time you can checkout serial no on Apple website under support option.
  

  CHEERS TO MY iPHONE :D

If you are not a silver spoon holder, you might want to not burn a hole in your pocket and yet have a fully functional smartphone.

column6: Awesome Phone. Better than other phone in this price range.
column7:
Nothing to say about iPhone 4s, as it's a premium phone in the market. I never used iPhone but after receiving the product and after using it I must say that "iPhone toh iPhone hai :p".
  

  I already used almost all kind of mobiles from Symbian-Bada, Android-Windows-RIM, but from my personal experience, IOS7 is just awesome. Android is also good even better than other operating systems.
  

  I must say that if u never used iPhone then please use it once, if you are planning to but a phone in the range of 21-24K.
  

  The only problem is BATTERY, it drains very fast, if u used 3G whole day, I am charging it twice in day even I am not using calling sim, only data consuming the battery too fast. But I must say that charging is super fast. After plugging my iPhone in charge its becoming full in next 50-60 min.
  

  At last I say that I am enjoying it as I m not a that kind of user who love to listen songs, play with cameras/photos etc, I love multitasking, i love easy navigation, I love internet surfing, i love to handle premium phone. and all these I am getting in this phone.

column6: Superb deal on a special phone
column7:
Flipkart has surely got an admirer in me.After much research I finalised the deal for iphone 4s and am very happy to bag it.The phone n case combo added further joy in the purchase.After much search (and bargain),flipkart was the one to offer lowest price and highest discount.The order was tracable all the time and time to time alerts were received.As expected the product arrived 2 days earlier than promised without paying any extra money and it was in best condition.No complaints regarding any issue.However I wont recommend one day guarantee to prospective customers.The only problem is the go green initiative due to which hard copies of the bills are not sent.However you get it on ur email after delivery which can be an issue if replacement is required.
  
  I read many reviews about faulty pieces and bad after sale servicd but I did NOT experience any such things.Cheers to flipkart for EXCELLENT SERVICE!!!
  
  P.S.The price of the phone was increased just minutes after placing the order...which was interesting...!!!
  

  PART 2 (13/03/2015)
  
  This is the update for my review...The phone which I purchased started having an issue with the cellular data connection and got me worried(Earlier it was working nicely for almost 6 months).I got in touch with the APPLE AUTHORIZED SERVICE CENTRE and submitted the phone to them.After 1 week I got the phone REPLACED with NO QUESTIONS ASKED!That itself proves the originality of the product,despite the option of checking the warranty online is a standing option!
  
  so People....dont worry just go for online purchase from flipkart!Its cheap,profitable and reliable!!!

My requirements -
  
  > Compact size
  
  > Frequent usage of WhatsApp, Flipkart app, PaytmApp & rare usage of other apps
  
  > Good & excellent screen touch performance
  
  > Finally, Good Brand
  

  All the above requirements are met by this phone.
  

  If you are looking for a mobile to play games, continuous browsing, bigger screen and good battery life then it is better not to select this mobile. Please remember it is 2011 model. However, you can run with the latest iOS 8.4 software. Apple has promised iOS9 for this iPhone 4S. One good thing about Apple is, it provides updates at least 3 or 4 versions.
  

  WS Retail delivered the right product and on right time. I checked & registered in Apple site on the next following day.
  

  Regarding battery life, I moderately use and keep charging once a day. However, I always keep power bank. Remember it is 1400 mAh battery.
  

  My personal suggestions, whoever want to buy this mobile are -
  
  > Be clarify on your requirements (Screen size, battery)
  
  > It is 2011 model & with the latest iOS 8.4 and iOS9 is also promised (Probably, iOS9 would be the last update for this mobile)
  
  > Should know the usage iTunes & Sharing of data to other mobiles is bit complex
  

  This review is after the usage of 2 months.
  

  Final word, Apple is Apple & very a good brand ( but have to pull out more money from our packets)

Purchased this product from WS Retail @14231 on 7th June. Received sealed pack manufactured & Imported- March 2015. Fast delivery and good packaging.
  
  Here are some facts that i want to share so it may help some people in deciding..
  
  1) Warranty cover: my phone had some camera issue and i took it to Apple service center, they replaced it with new one in just two days, no question asked.
  

  2) Antivirus: You don't need an antivirus for iPhone unless you jailbreak your precious device.
  
  3) Speaker: Only one speaker is working because only one speaker is in there. The other one is microphone.
  
  4) Heating: Heating while charging is very usual with smartphones, it is advised by the Apple to remove any kind of cover (back cover or leather pouch) while charging the device. You can also place the device on something with a gap in it (Ex- cup) so the back of the device will get some Air and won't heat much.
  
  5) In box accessories: Yes, you will get earphone in the box :)
  
  Without wasting anymore time, own it now and be a proud iPhone owner.

One thing with Android that people often seem to be unaware of is that it allows multitasking - somethimes people inadvertantly end up with many apps or services running simultaneously on their Android phones.  So, you may just need to do as Meg suggests, and then be very diligent about setting things up again.
  

  An iPhone is limited in that way, in that very few apps can actually actively run as background tasks (they get suspended, so re-open faster, but they only actually run when open in the foreground).  Still, even a heavy iPhone user can find it hard to go more than 6-8 hours on a battery charge.  If you get a lot of push mail, set up tons of notifications (especially location based notifications) and make a lot of voice calls, you basically end up with a device that is active much of the time and the battery is going to drain pretty rapidly.
  

  Pros
  
  Still the slickest smartphone experience
  
  New camera features are great
  

  Cons
  
  Smaller screen than the competition
  
  Still no Flash support (Damn sure Apple will never include anyways :P )
 
 

   READ MORE

Flipkart experience - in one word, nice! Not the best in terms of price, but still good. Ordering was smooth. What's interesting is that I received the package in 30 hrs - sooner than I expected! The box was secure. I had ordered the iPhone 4s and a case for it. Both items were joined together with tape (not so good due to adhesive and distortion to the items' packing). The whole thing was bubble-wrapped and then put into the Flipkart brown-board box.
  

  About iPhone 4s - excellent product! I have used a Blackberry 9700 before, then Android and a Windows phone. Had not got iPhone earlier because it did not seem like vfm. The 4s came with 7.1.1 - latest OS version. Interface is simple, vivid and pleasant. Learning is easy. Arguably, the form factor is just right. I keep the phone in my trouser pocket and the length of 4s fits the width of the pocket. It isn't too wide too and that helps me sit with the 4s still in the pocket. Physical buttons are so precise that each one presents itself like an engg marvel. Of course, I have used the 4s only for 3 days; I would like to see how it stands the test of continuous use. Emailing, browsing, chatting is simple/ easy. Actually, the touch is not as sensitive as I've been used to before and that seems to be good in avoiding accidental key presses and dial-outs.
  

  It was ultra easy to insert sim (sim tray is a piece of precision engg), configure wifi, bt, email accounts (exchange, gmail, yahoo, hotmail), instal chat and social media (hangouts, whatsapp, fb, linkedin, twitter), instal vlc, keepass and finally connect the 4s to PC for moving books, songs and 1 movie - it was all smooth and quick! Camera is great with incredible shutter speed!
  

  Negatives - sluggish/ unresponsive at times. 8gb is not enough space; I couldn't just copy from previous phones. Gets hot. Battery drains too fast
  

  Extra buys - had bought a case but it just did not match the class of the iPhone. I have discarded the case. Another item I purchased is a 30-pin to micro-usb adapter. This came in couple of days later; I bought this to use micro-usb cable for charging and for PC connection rather than carrying around the proprietary cable
 
 

   READ MORE

This phone has brand name of Apple but Nexus and Samsung Galaxy series has better ease of use then this. No doubt they have hardware, quality best in industry like brilliant Retina display, consistent smoother performance, crispy animated navigation. But lack basics functionality that we use in general tasks. Let's say if I want to check date of today, I can't on top of the notification bar that shows time only, I must go to Calendar to see them where as normal Android phones do the job, ridiculous. In Photo album, there is not way at all to have information about photo/video like date taken, its size etc. Like Android, you can't directly share photo/video to WhatsApp/Viber right from image gallery, you must copy photo/video and paste in WhatsApp/Viber or go to those app and locate photo/video. Apart from that, touchscreen is not as soft as Galaxy or Nexus, you need to touch or swipe hard to do anything on first attempt. I would say, instead of going for a phone of 2011 generation, it's far better to go for latest Nexus 5 at the same price with bigger screen, NFC, 16 GB and expandable, wireless charging and lot more new functionality and features.

column6: The Best Phone by Apple, but slightly outdated
column7:
This phone should be kept in a museum. Not just because it is outdated, but also because it was a technological marvel of it's time. The form factor, build quality and above all, synergy of hardware and software is something you just don't get in today's electronics markets.
  

  There is nothing not to love about this device except that it hangs sometimes on the hefty iOS 8. Also, there is the thing with the space, iOS 8 will chomp away at around 3.5 GB leaving little more than 4GB at your disposal. I am on the hedge about the use of glass for the front and back surfaces. The back surface on my iphone broke one month after I bought it. This wouldn't have happened on an android or the iphone 6. Nevertheless, the glass surface offers smooth touch and feather light interaction which I respect.
  

  If you don't use a lot of apps and have something else to listen to music on, this phone is the best and cheapest thing you can get. Otherwise, you will lose out on space and things will hang even more. If you are not a fan of waiting for things to load, DON'T BUY THIS PHONE. Go for iPhone 5S.
  

  But in case none of those things bother you... grab a piece of this technological marvel!
 
 

   READ MORE

column6: The Phone is awesone at awesome price and the delivery was flaw less!!!
column7:
I ordered this phone with a lot of apprehension in mind.Like any other buyer even I was worried about following things:
  
  1. The phone itself (as this is my first IPhone)
  
  2. The product that I will get will be genuine or not.
  
  3. The product I will received will be new or not and what bout it's warranty terms & conditions etc.
  
  So solve a few of these issues I ordered this product under Cash on delivery mode.
  
  I was informed that the product will be delivered to my location in 20 days from the date of booking of the phone. Which initially got be a bit worried. But then my phone was delivered on the 6th day itself. The parcel was tamper proof and was intact. The phone I received was fresh & genuine one as was confirmed in due course of registering the same on the Apple Site. The product  is also duly covered under the apple's warranty scheme. So no loss there either! So well done Flipkart and the retailer WS Retail! I am an old online buyer from your site. With this you just enhanced my faith on your services.
  
  Now about the phone:
  
  The phone and its interface is just awesome. Being a first time I Phone user I was blown away by what the interface itself has to offer. Even the smallest of things have been taken care of in the IOS. This phone makes other Smart Phone (used by me earlier) look like not so smart.  The phone is working just fine. The camera of the phone is a class apart and is one of the main attractions of the same. The screen quality and the speed of the phone is also awesome. Browsing is just awesome. Last but not the least the SIRI is also there. So over all an extremely awesome and great  value for money. Thanks Flipkart once again........will be back with the detailed  performance review of the phone later!
 
 

   READ MORE

'Some' Features ( There is a lot more which you can experience on your own )
  

  -Smoothest User Interface
  
  -Amazing Display
  
  -Excellent Brightness (Set the brightness to 'Auto' )
  
  -Very Good overall performance ( incomparable with any other brand )
  
  -DSLR quality Camera ( I'm into photography and own DSLR with additional lenses )
  
  -Fantastic graphics
  
  -Internet works like a charm ( even in 2G )
  
  -Clean Multitasking
  

  I was using iphone 4 in 2011 and then lost the phone. Afterwards i started using other ( Android, Symbian and windows ) phones in almost all top brands. What i've learnt in these years and after using nearly 7 phones from June 2011 till Aug 2014 is that nothing will ever come close to the "Performance" or "Feel" or "Looks" of an iPhone.
  

  The worst of all is that i bought 2GB RAM/multi core phone recently and within a week of using it i realised that all these numbers are only there to attract Tech Bugs like us to buy them. Honestly there is not much difference between them whether it is single, Dual, Quad or Octa or even a million cores as long as they are not co-ordinating with the Apps.
  

  There is a perfect Harmony between the App and the Hardware . That is the "secret" of Lag free performance of an iPhone.
  

  My cousin is using an iPhone 4 and another using iPhone 3Gs. They are still working flawless and smooth !!!
  


  Now the complaints about iPhones.
  
  ( I did so much research to find the following details and they are all available online,  feel free to google them and you can find them [including Apple's official site] )
  

  - Limited Apps - Yes, they are because every App is Optimized for iPhone, so apple does not allow any Apps that bothers the performance or smoothness of the iPhone. Most of the Apps we need are all there.
  

  - Battery Drain - Yes, on 3G it drains battery faster. This is common to all models of iPhone, that is because the receivers are very powerful in iPhone which gives us the good signal and reception all the time.
  
  Solution: Turn off 3G whenever you not using it. This battery drain does not happen with Wifi, so the sooner you enter a wifi spot don't forget to turn off 3G. I've noticed that even when in wifi and there is a small drop in connection it automatically switches to 3G even for a few seconds. So the sooner you are in Wifi spot "Turn Off" mobile data.
  

  - Heating - Yes, It does get heated up. This happens due to Apple's Smoothness thriving device ( iPhone ). To provide smoothness all the time the Hardware keeps working always at it's best that generates heat.
  
  Solution:  During charge keep a small object below and keep the phone on a slope where it allows some Air flow underneath the phone. Do the same even when at home or office while charging and other times as well. When there is Air flow underneath the phone it does not heat up.
  

  - Limited Storage - Well that is one's own choice and usage. To me 8GB is more than enough because i do not keep things my phone and keeps transferring  things to system.
  
  Solution : Atleast once in a week check the apps and games that you don't use and remove them. Spend time to organise the music folder and move the songs that you don't listen to. So it is totally up to us when it comes to memory. 5 GB of space is usable in a 8GB model.
  

  - Apple sells an Old model for a higher price when i can buy Hexa core phone with 4gb RAM android phone for the same price - Please compare the Hexacore/ multi GB RAM phone with an iPhone "3Gs" and share us your 'honest' opinion. I'm saying this only after doing the above and my mutli core phone is sleeping in my cupboard after one week's usage.
  

  Please take your iPhone to the Apple store nearer to you no matter what the problem is. They will fix or replace with a new one depending upon the fault and as per the warranty terms.
  

  I can keep going on and on but want to stop here with a few final things.
  
  iPhone is your phone,
  
  - If you want a Smooth Performing, Perfect PDA, Music player, Game Device, DSLR Camera and which is also a Phone.
  

  People who are interested in photography this is the best phone and also please download the following App. ( one of the reviewer was asking for a camera solution )
  
  - Camera+ ( not camera plus but camera+ with the + symbol ). It will turn your iphone camera into something that is stunningly amazing camera. It costs INR.120.
  

  iPhone photography and the bestness of iPhone camera is a whole Big topic. Please google them to find more because it is way too huge information.
  

  At last about our Dear Flipkart.
  
  Flipkart is my Home Shopping site and 99.9% of the time i shop only on Flipkart.
  
  Do not have any doubts to purchase from Flipkart. It is the BEST.
  
  Thanks to Flipkart and Team for your ever Fastest and delivery of 'Genuine' products.
  

  ( Friends all the above is my own experience and i am not favouring or disfavouring any brand. I'm just an ordinary consumer who like to receive what i pay for.)
  

  Happy Shopping :-)
 
 

   READ MORE

column6: Stay away from online purchase...learnt it the hardway
column7:
I ordered an Iphone 4S. Paid extra for next day delivery. The phone arrived after 8 days. And the was just the beginning of my lesson abt what not to do online. So the much awaited phone arrived, and though i was not using it, in 4 days i realized the phone battery drains out even without using. Just stays for half a day and even data was not switched on nor did i make a call. Gave it another day and the phone just died. Not sure the how what when it happened. in a week of buying the phone it just died. I asked flipkart for replacement after waiting another 8 days i get a replacement phone which is worse than the first phone. It doesn't get activated. I called Apple customer care who says i shouldnt have bought online there is nothing they can do. Visit the nearest store. Never felt so cheated in my life. Flip kart u suck. Please stay away from these fraudsters selling fake products.
 
 

   READ MORE

Apple just know how to create brand & sell products. But when it comes to service, its a Big zero.
  
  From the beginning the phone is giving problem. Its getting heated a lot as well as it gets hanged. Since this model has a very complicated process of inserting the sim, there are chances that your sim gets stuck. That happened with me. When I went to visit their service centre I had to face the nightmare. The customer care executives said that they will consider this as physical damage and will not give warranty. Even after fighting a lot, sending emails to its India CEO, I didn't get any response. Now I am trying to get rid of the phone.
  
  Also, IOS hardly has any free app. I will go back to Android. Hope you guys dont get lured by their look and feel(thats what is Apple's USP)
 
 

   READ MORE

column6: WSRetail Fail to keep their word
column7:
I had ordered this product on 9th April 2015 and selected the Rs90 1 day delivery.
  
  The notification cameup that i will receive the product by 10th April 2015 maximum by 9PM on 10th April 2015.
  

  The status of the tracking of product was last updated on  10th April 2015 @ 04:16AM that it was expected to reach the local HUB for delivery.
  
  It stayed like that for a day,
  

  I did multiple followups for the same. All they said that i will get the product by 9PM on 10th.
  
  Nothing showed up.
  
  I send an email to cs@flipkart.com for the same. They said that the product will reach me on 11th aApril 2015 by maximum 8PM. and gave me an incident number.
  

  I was done with this. I requested a call back with the status of the delivery, that where the product was,
  
  I got a call from bangalore (flipkart) and they said that they have not yet received any update from the courier. The person on phone from bangalore suspected that the courier dept might have misplaced the product. Then he said he will ring me back for further update.
  

  I went to iWorld store ( apple retail store ) and without any hassle got my self the iphone 4s.
  
  later the guy from bangalore called again to provide me a replacement, but i denied for the same.
  
  On 12th APril i got the third notification that the product will be delivered to me on that day by 8PM....
  


  So far this was the experience i had with Flipkart for the iphone 4s.
  
  WSRetail was selling it for Rs 17999 and other sellers were selling 4s @ 15,600/-
  

  Still i went for WSRetail just because of the fact that they are trustworthy and their delivery and return process is always to the mark and on time.
  
  I also went for the 1 day delivery however they failed to meet the expectation.
  

  No conclusions on this, that was just my experience....
 
 

   READ MORE

What makes a good review
  
  Have you used this product?
  

  It's always better to review a product you have personally experienced.
  
  Educate your readers
  

  Provide a relevant, unbiased overview of the product. Readers are interested in the pros and the cons of the product.
  
  Be yourself, be informative
  

  Let your personality shine through, but it's equally important to provide facts to back up your opinion.
  
  Get your facts right!
  

  Nothing is worse than inaccurate information. If you're not really sure, research always helps.
  
  Stay concise
  

  Be creative but also remember to stay on topic. A catchy title will always get attention!
  
  Easy to read, easy on the eyes
  

  A quick edit and spell check will work wonders for your credibility. Also, break reviews into small, digestible paragraphs

column6: Apple iPhone 5- Best Gadget A Man Can Get!
column7:
I'm reviewing this coz people need education about the iOS & other specs.
  
  Other people (Windows & Android user esp.) keeps bragging about iPhone being a costly phone as compared to others brands.
  
  I myself am a gadget freak & I've used almost every other Smart phone available in the subcontinent & the US. But I gotta tell you, if I've a Weighing-scale, I would keep all the other smart phones on one side and Apple iPhone 5 on the other.
  
  Yes I'm dead serious! This phone is the most amazing creation of Human since the inception of the gadgetry world. Be it the strong sturdy body, the Aluminum mirror finish or the display screen, it pounds my heart every time I see it!
  

  This isn't all, like the Substance Hardware, it has the Awesome Software i.e. iOS 7. Which according to me, is the most secured OS in the smart phone OS category, also a 'smack on the face' for those who keep whining about iOS being less-featured.
  

  This is the reason, I never recommend it to the common people. This is the Premium Handset & it should remain in the hands who actually appreciates the Beauty.
  

  Ther's a lot to talk abt this amazing Phone, I have done a lotta debates over the Android & iOS wars on Fb or twitter, it'll give me immense pleasure to clarify doubts regarding the misconception people have over the iOS & the iPhones particularly.
  

  Apart from that Flipkart's Excellent service has helped it to get delivered the product almost 2 days before the actual delivery date.
  
  Very Happy to order it from Flipkart (as I've received the promised 10% cash-back too) :)

Every one knows the specifications and capabilities of an iPhone. But let me share some the hard facts about iPhone and Apple that I experienced. This is my 3rd iPhone and I have it all.
  

  1. THIS IS NOT A GORILLA GLASS.
  
  For a long time, I used to believe that Apple started the use of Gorilla glass until I broke my Black iPhone 5's front glass from a height of 2 feet. In fact, Apple hasn't introduced gorilla glass to iPhone yet.
  

  2. SCREEN REPLACEMENT IS NOT EASY
  
  After breaking just the top glass with the touch and actual display working absolutely fine, when you think to replace the top glass as in iPhone 4's, you get to know that the 3 elements: Glass, Touch and Display are glued together, and if any 1 dies, you need to replace the 1 single expensive thing which Apple don't manufacture. You need to find China made replacements which lacks quality. And if display is not original, then its not an iPhone.
  

  3. REPLACEMENT POLICY
  
  If you are lucky enough that this thing happens in the warrantee period, then Apple replaces with iPhone with a new one BUT, Apple charges around 19000 to give you a 'new' iPhone. And the 'new' iPhone is not 'new'. Its a refurbished replacement. This was the heart breaker.
  

  4. THE DISPLAY TINT TERROR
  
  If you think that you can get away with the damaged one and get a new iPhone so that you get a genuine Apple product, your date of purchase is very crucial. Apple manufactures their iPhones with 2 or 3 different manufacturers. Samsung, LG and maybe one more, and these companies have their own Quality Check and not Apple's singular QC. If you purchase an early iPhone than a late one, you can easily differentiate the quality of display in terms of color reproduction. The early displays are perfectly saturated with a natural white tint/tinge. The late lots are more towards yellow tint and the saturation is also low compared to the early one. You have to be born with great luck to get the iPhone of the quality that Apple presents to their conference or the very first shipment. And the worst of all, Apple has no setting to change the tint where there are apps for jailbroken platform. So there is no problem in display, you just can't calibrate.
  

  I really think iPhone is absolutely not a value for money product due to Apple's policy.
 
 

   READ MORE

There's a very simple way to describe the Apple iPhone 5: thinner, lighter and a bit taller than the iPhone 4S. While that gets across the general look of the phone, it rather underestimates what's gone into the design to achieve this.
  
  First impression was "Nice!". The black looked good.
  
  The I picked it up and went "Huh?". Note I use a Galaxy Nexus as my main device. The i5 reminded me of the old fashioned cabdy bar phones - like the Moto KRZR and other. It was nice but felt scrawny. Compared to my legacy i4, it was a good update in looks, compared to a Nexus..... let's see.
  

  Next was the display. It was taller. Taller. Other than that not much else was a change. about a third of an ich taller than my i4. Side by side to the Nexus, is was ...... small.
  

  Now for the real stuff; how well would this work and what was new.
  
  Setup went well. Activated the phone and set it up as a copy of my i4 via iTunes. Only real issue was it exploded all my folders so I had to spend a few recreating on the i5.

Hyped Like No Other Phone, This Is Less Of A Phone And More Of A Status Symbol Or A Style Statement To Many...Priced At The Highest End Of The Mobile Spectrum...Yet Totally An F- For the Price : Performance Ratio...But Its Not All Bad..Is It ?....Designed very Beautifully And Crafted From Premium materials (Aluminium And Glass)...The Phone Does look The Part Of a flagship Device....The Screen Estate is Small Compared To The Industry giants...yet The Display Is A capable one....The Camera (Manufactured by Sony) Is One Of The Best To Be Installed On A Mobile Device..The Audio Quality is Top Class...Application Performance Is Great Too..Coz You Know, Its APPLE....They Optimize Everything For There Devices.....And The Wealth Of Apps On The Apple Apps Store Can Only Be Matched By a Few...(But Then again, most Of Them Are Paid Apps)...Plus Their Updates Are more Timely..
  

  But 45K For A Phone With A Mere 4" Screen Is A little Disappointing....No Expandable Memory... This Is A Big Issue Coz 16 GB (Usable Memory Is Less than 16GB) Is not Enough Especially For A Phone That Can Play HD Games and record 1080p Videos And Play Them As Well...Well You Do Have 32GB And 64GB Versions...But Wait...You Have To Shell Out Extra Few grands For That....Why Should You....45K Is Already A Premium Price To Pay...Then...No USB Mass Storage...Not being Able To use your phone as a portable flash Drive... Disappointing....No Bluetooth file transfers...No FM Radio ...With Some Of The (BIG) Limitations Of The Apple Ecosystem IOS Is Never Going To Evolve Into A Real Mature, Customizable, Usable And Feature Rich OS Like Android...Even The Windows Phone OS Has Become More Productive In Some Ways Than This baby OS From Apple...I don't Think The Non-User Replaceable battery Is A drawback...But The Battery Capacity Is A little Short of Good..Let Alone Spectacular....No NFC..Apple OS Updates hardly Bring Anything New To the Devices.. Seriously Apple Are You Listening...
  

  So Should You Buy it? Yeah Why Not if You :
  

  1. Have Tons Of Money To Spend And Don't Mind getting A phone That is Super hyped and Bound To Draw Eyeballs Towards It..
  

  2. Are An Apple Fanboy
  

  3. Wanna Use A smartphone But Wanna Skip All the Complexities And Want A (Very) Simple interface..(Basically if You Are A kiddo or and Old Person Who gets Intimidated by Smartphones)
  

  But, Should You be The Kind Who Wants A Good bang For Their buck And A Smartphone Which Truly Does Justice To The Word Flagship ....Well Then A Big NO...You Will Get Almost All Of iPhone 5's Capabilities In Devices That Are Priced Upto 15 Grands Cheaper....
 
 

   READ MORE

column6: Cheated by Flipkart - Used Apple IPhone 5 sold to us.
column7:
I had purchased two Apple I Phone 5 from your website and my order numbers
  
  are as under:
  


  We had placed orders for Apple IPhone 5 (Order No's OD302943206156657700  & OD302923253653617100.
  

  As one of the phone purchased had a touch screen problem, we requested
  
  a replacement for the said phone to Flipkart.
  

  We were assured by your customer service representative that we could also go to the local Apple Service Provider and get the phone changed. Accordingly, we took the phone to the local Apple Service Provider. The Apple personnel checked the IMEI Number of the phone and we were shocked at what we discovered.
  

  1. The Phone was a used phone.
  
  2. It was not eligible for the one year Manufacturers warranty which Flipkart had mentioned on the website.
  

  I then got the other Phone checked too and here too learnt the following:
  

  1. My phone too was a used phone. It was purchased in China on 02/01/2014.
  
  2. It was not eligible for the one year Manufacturers guarantee which Flipkart had mentioned on the website.
  

  I have taken a written report from the Apple Service Provider which clearly
  
  states the above mentioned facts.
  

  There has been no feedback from Flipkart as yet.
  

  I wonder how many thousand customers have been cheated by Flipkart.
 
 

   READ MORE

I bought iPhone 5 from this buyer.I had a problem with the iPhone. The moment I connected it with the charing cable, the iPhone displayed - "This accessory may not be supported". column6: Fully power packed beast in this small size!!
column7:
This phone is really beautiful. I have tried both Android and Windows Phone phones having screens of at least 5". I was a little afraid of going back to a 4" phone. Yes, it takes a little time to get familiar with typing (You may enter wrong passwords several times :P), but the experience that follows is really great!!.
  

  Pros:
  
  1. 16GB version is more cheaper in retail stores, many of them are offering Rs5000 cashback on credit and debit cards making effective price of about 21-22k.
  
  2. Camera is brilliant! Yes, 12MP Apple Sensor really does wonders. 4K and Slo-Mo recording work very nicely.
  
  3. The hardware is superb! I worked on it for 2 hours on the 3rd day, with WiFi on, apps downloading on the store, songs streaming live from Saavn and playing CoC, and everything coordinates in a perfect harmony. And guess what, all this for just 25% battery power!! (Here Android phones would surely start heating)
  
  4. No heating issues experienced till now.
  
  5. Earpods are really cool! You gonna love your songs.
  
  6. Free 5GB iCloud drive storage.
  
  7. Sure iOS updates (at least till iOS 12), because the device was upgraded this month only to 32 and 128 GB, so it will surely remain on the upgrade roadmaps of Apple. (5S released with iOS 7 lost support after iOS 10.2, SE was released with 9.3.2)
  
  Cons:
  
  1. 16GB storage might become issue for some people. Especially with 4K videos, it would fill up very fast. (Around 12 gigs is available out of box)
  
  2. The apps on iOS are quite heavy in size, every major app would take more than 100mb.
  
  3. No 3D touch like the elder siblings, but won't be a issue if using iOS for first time.
  

  All in all, its a very good option for those who want to enter the iDevices world with minimum investment and get maximum out of it.
 
 

   READ MORE

Best phone

I had been told that the price of this phone will go down by several friends and many websites also substantiated this claim. The price though never went down and I finally decided to buy this phone on a bajaj emi scheme. Now even the iPhone 7 has released and the price still remains stagnant. The lesson you should draw from my experience is - don't wait for the prices to drop. Maybe they will not.
  

  Now speaking about the phone. This phone is a beast. The camera is superb, the battery life is fantastic and the apple interface is awesome. This phone is actually the iPhone 6s in the size of a 5S. Also this phone doesn't have the 3D thing that 6S has, but the 3D thing, in my opinion is just a fancy feature. This phone is much cheaper and it is worth the money.
  

  I was and am an android user. Obviously I was a little sceptical about switching to iPhone. But Apple is a great platform. My transition was smooth and I am loving it.
  

  I should commend flipkart for their before time delivery all the time.
  

  Keep up the good work guys!

Hello there! 1st things first, beep off to those who are giving this iphone bad ratings because of its small size.
  
  This iphone was made completely for those who have smaller palm size and love the onehand usage. NOW THEN...
  
  PROS:
  
  1) FORM FACTOR. due to its small size u can reach all the corners of ur phone without shifting ur grip. You can text       singlehandedly.
  
  2) HARDWARE. the phone powered by A9chip set and M9 co-processor  ( i have compared it galaxy note5, and SE was always the first whether it be browsing opening games or taking pictures... you name it!!!)
  
  3) BATTERY LIFE. First of i wud like to let u know that when it comes to battery management (and RAM management) no one even gets closer to apple. Don't be disguisd by larger mAh batteries, those android shits need huuuge battery to run there OS.If  you are not DATA and are using normally (no games) thn it would last nearly 3-4 days, if ur using date (normal usage) thn 1.5 days and if playing games then 3-4 hours (max)
  

  CONS:
  
  1)FRNT FACING CAMERA: If u r a megapixel junkie thn this WILL upset u... 1.2 megapixel does great i really mean GREAT Job!! The only time u will miss those more megapixels is when u r zooming in.
  
  2) FINGERPRINT SENSOR : ITS SLOWER than compared to 6s and iphone7. but its not than u cant live with it. Its neither to slow nor too fast.
  

  VERDICT: : If u r someone who want a smaller phone yet would like to give a nice fight to all other flagship smartphones and have no problem with apple eco system... thn THIS THING is just made for you.
  
  BUT!!!! If u likes to play games a lot, are accustomed with bigger screens and mod versions and watchesa lot videos then it might upset you

Perfect sized, pocket friendly and hardcore hardware. Got it for 31k from Flipkart. Awesome delivery by them and love the packaging - simply premium. Makes U feel special. Chose the SE over Motorola Z Play and One+3 and Samsung Galaxy A9 Pro simply because I was tired of Android, the 5.5 screens and cheap feeling. Got the iOS 10.1 update and have to say that the OS is definitely polished. Owning this phone changes your mindset all together and puts you in a different leauge. I am avoiding playing any games on this phone as I wanted to mature out of gaming and use the phone for more productivity. Camera is good but not excellent. Having Slo-Mo video is amazing. The Touch ID is super convinient. Siri is dumb and I rate Cortana the highest, Google Now at 2nd place and Siri Last. Crisp display amazing battery life (be sure to do a complete 100% drain & charge cycle). Phone does not heat up. All apps are available. Syncs with your Google account. Need a good scratch guard and back cover. Sound is awesome from external speakers and yet to use the Apple pods. Now I can upgrade to apple products step by steps.
  
  Shortfalls: Small screen hence keyboard takes time to adjust. Lotta typos in the 1st week. Limited storage of 16gb (that's what I could afford) hence need wifi to sync up to icloud. iOS needs getting used to if coming from Android and Windows and the lack of a back button seems frustrating at first. Selecting text is also is big pain.
  
  But its all about experiencing a new OS. Am happy to get my hands on a phone launched this year itself and thanks to Flipkart for allowing a lovely 12 month EMI option on my Bajaj Finserve card. Never thought I could ever buy and iphone this good so easily and affordable.
 
 

   READ MORE

column6: A Awesome Apple Through Flipkart.. Loved it
column7:
superb product by Apple & Flipkart... delivered very fasy.... sealed pack mobile.. excellent camera,battery is superb with all day backup.. Excellent performance all around... thanks Flipkart..
 
 

   READ MORE

I have been using the iphone SE space grey 16gb for 2 weeks now. I wanted a compact mobile that has good call clarity, camera and good performance. This one ticks all the right boxes. Got it at 29k from flipkart. And iOS has been a refreshing experience having been an android user for 3 years and windows for about an year. There is some fluidity in using this mobile that I didn't find with any of the mobiles I have used so far. But for the major time, I had been using Xperia z2. Performance was good. But call clarity and tower reception were poor. Also camera was a huge let down. So then all I did was carry around a huge chunk of rock, that does nothing more than play games well and no log performance. First I thought, yeah large screen, I could watch videos, play games etc. But practically, I didn't find much situations where I had to watch videos or play games in the public. You watch videos while travelling, it is going to heavily strain your eyes. And it was heating like hell as well. I travel around in car most times, so I guess I didn't find the need for a media centric phone. But I listen to songs, and boy does iphone does a great job with this. Its just far better than my old mobile. So overall, I am very happy with this purchase, although I can't recommend this mobile as my basic constraint is the size of the phone, which may not be the case for several others. What I would have tried out if it wasn't for the size could be Xperia XZ,  for its inbuilt hi res dac, htc 10 or the google pixel. These phones have it all especially the google pixel for its low light photography. and Xperia XZ's audio quality. So here's the summary
  

  Pros:
  
  -Smaller form factor(That helps in one handed use)
  
  -Excellent camera in daylight(Natural images, like in dslr)
  
  -Fluidic experience
  
  -Lovely display
  
  -Great front camera given its only 1.2mp
  
  -Amazing audio quality
  
  -Excellent call clarity
  
  -Beautiful design
  
  -Great sound quality of speakers( You will hear all the sounds)
  
  -Great security features
  

  Cons:
  
  -Low light camera
  
  -iOS paid apps
  
  -Back button( Need to use assisstive touch)
 
 

   READ MORE
