column6: iPhone with the iconic form factor
column7:
I know, 7 is the latest & greatest right now but I just couldn't stop cussing apple, when they announced their 6, for moving away from their iPhone 4 form factor. I know people want bigger screens, that everyone else in the market is out with 5" or bigger screens. When SE was announced, it was quite a pleasant surprise till I heard its price in India (specially after their mis-announcement snafu) - for ~30k INR, me thinks it was an ok phone - but then if it's available for $400, it better be for the same price here too - this ~30k was unacceptable with that knowledge now.
  

  So when I saw this with offer on credit card & exchange offer and it came to around 24k for me, it was a good offer for me to go get it. Of course, the phone is great and I absolutely love it. 16gb is less, but then that keeps me in check to not have unnecessary digital junk. Screen size is good enough for me - and reliability of iOS is quite high, relatively speaking.
  

  For around 25k price point, I think it is great deal to go for. As always, Flipkart's delivery was fast & delightful
 
 

   READ MORE

column6: Expensive, poor software but good build quality
column7:
Apple used to be famous for its hardware quality, and software. Things are changing...
  

  I use iOS devices for 7+ years. When Steve Jobs was there, they had very detailed interface. No one was able to match it. That created a revolution.
  

  But now, apple started to copy things from android. For example, look at their user interface.
  

  Wake up people, they increase the processor speed and slow down the software.
  
  Eventually you'll be forced to upgrade. You can't go back to older version. Ofcourse they won't allow you. Because if they do, you won't buy their new device. Think before buying apple devices, its your money.

column6: Amzing, beautiful piece in my hand!
column7:
This iphone 7 plus is much more than mere smart phone.Instead it's an experience!  It's worth spending every single Rs on this.
  
  This is my short review, i will come back and update once i have enough experience on this.
  

  Apart from good specifications others would have explained in detail, my quick pros and cons are below:
  

  Pros:
  
  1) Beautiful display, sometimes you would just like to keep looking at it :)
  
  2) Good battery life. Once you charge 100%, it will last for almost a day. Also charges 100% in almost 3.5 hrs.
  
  3) Camera: Amazing picture quality and depth. No question about dual camera.
  
  4) Performance: Very quick response time, with app opening, unlocking the phone etc.
  


  Cons:
  
  Not anything major. I get blurred images if subjects move. Not sure how to get max out of OIS yet.
 
 

   READ MORE

column6: Excellent phone and good service from Flipkart as well
column7:
Flipkart delivered the phone one day before the scheduled date. So, first of all, kudos for that. I got a pretty decent exchange offer(for my BB Z10) along with a very good price for the 64 GB version, the reason why I ordered it in the first place, coz there was a difference of almost 10K between the retail store. Now about the phone, the iOS experience is absolutely superb. All the apps are so optimized that they run as smooth as they can. The screen & camera quality are also superb. Don't go for the 6S , unless spending 15K more(for the 64GB) means nothing to you. Also don't go for the 16GB version of either as well. You'll regret it later. But what really stands out is the earpod. The effect, sound clarity, bass, everything is superb. The touch id works like a charm. Overall, a very good phone.

column6: DO NOT BUY IF YOU HAVE STICKY FINGERS
column7:
This review is for Indian buyers.  I won't go into the pros and cons of the device. However, as someone whose iPhone fell down, resulting in a broken screen - Beware !  Apple India does not allow part repair for screens - guess why?  Because the Indian technicians are not trained enough !! Yes - that is the reason I got from the Apple Care Helpline.
  

  As a result while the rest of the world pays 109 dollars - about 7K from a new screen - Indians have to pay a whopping 25K minimum - no other options.  Why minimum - because of phone has any other damage- the price goes up.  However, on my insistence, the Apple care lady admitted that you could try having it serviced in another country where they do part repair - but no guarantees.  There is no option to courier the device and have it repaired abroad either.
  

  To be forced to pay more than 50% of the cost of the phone for something than happens frequently with kids and slips from car dashboards, and especially considering the slippery iPhone screen and protruding camera slot in the back is nothing short of robbery. I would not have bought the phone had I seen this information.
 
 

   READ MORE

column6: Story of An user who moved from Android to iOS
column7:
Guys, if you have been using android for quite sometime now and feel that you are bored and want to try iOS, I would suggest not to try. This is based on real life experience. I have bought ip6 64gb from Flipkart. The iOS is so restrictive that day to day work becomes tough. To  quote a few - you cannot save any music received from Whatsapp to your playlist. there is a long procedure for this which I am not explaining here. You cannot attach documents in your email reply from its native email app. These are just to name a few. All these are very basic feature in android which we are so used to. To tell you more, iOS doesn't even have tactile feedback in keyboard, so there are so many typing errors in the messages. All in all, I am not enjoying my iOS experience and sometime feel to sell the phone at discount.
 
 

   READ MORE

column6: Very Very poor delivery service from Flipkart
column7:
For iPhone 5 start & for Flip kart delivery service negative mark (-100).
  
  Because when call to delivery guy, he provided me fake/bluff information also provide fake/bluff update/status on delivery.
  
  Here is the communication what i had with him.
  
  i called & ask him how much time will it get deliver? Delivery guy responded right now i am 45 KM away from your location & now almost 5:30 PM so toady it will be not possible to deliver your product. I will try tomorrow. So upon his comment i replied please let me know your location i will come to you to receive my product even if you are 45 KM away from my location i don't have any issues if you are 200 KM away from location then also please let me know because today at any cost i want my iPhone. By this comment delivery Boy scared & said in 10 mins i will get back to you. After 18 mins i get call from him, that i am coming to your home.  i waited for 20 mins but he didn't arrived at same time my friend call me informed me that from last 45 mins delivery guy in my area and my friend's house just 2 Km away from home, so at that instance i start my home & catch flip kart delivery person.
  

  We as customer are not expecting such kind of delivery service. So my suggestion for Flip kart please work on your services & provide excellent quality service other wise you will out  from this business.
  

  Thanks,
  
  Bhushan

column6: If you don't have an iPhone, well you don't have an iPhone
column7:
Its been more than year and its working flawlessly.
  
  Physically,
  
  No signs of Age on Body or whatsoever. Still Shines Like a New.
  
  Well i am not going to compare iOS to Android.
  

  The iOS itself is experience. With Digital Computers, Processor and RAM should be complimentary to each other, Where Operating System is Manager of Both, together working as a team.
  
  Here, The team mates are from APPLE from Seedling to Full Size Grown Tree. Unlike others, with Different Manufacturers of Hardware and Software.
  
  Hence, A great Experience.
  

  But
  
  My Recent update to iOS 7 diminished my Love. There is bit of Lag compare to iOS six.
  
  However, the same i observed in my friend's Iphone 5S too.
  
  May be Design of Heavy OS.
  
  My iOS 7 update was of 728MB.
  

  What I liked
  
  ~Premium Body
  
  ~Excellent Camera+Videos
  
  ~Touch
  
  ~iOS 7
  
  ~Assistive Touch
  

  What I disliked
  
  ~Heavy(160g)
  
  ~Slow OS relative to older
  
  ~16GB ain't enough for Heavy Gamers and camcorder. Strictly no 8GB until on Strict Budget.

column6: iPhone 6s - a wonder invention from Apple Inc.
column7:
The best ever phone i have owned till date. Starting from the unboxing till initial setup is something which thrilled me a lot, wonderful packaging and superb design of the box, oh waoh !! just awesome. And the first boot, the logo appears on my 16 gb space grey model, my god, it was glittering on the 4.7 inch retina display, and the first word 'Holla' impressed me in a way that took me to the cloud 9. Once the setup was done the home screen appeared. I directly went into the camera app and boy it's a camera that one like me can die for. Front cam is awesome, I shot a small slo mo [720p 240fps] video of a cat running on the edge of a building roof - it is so damn impressive that my friends started envying me for owning such a wonder device !! Am always a fan of iOS so no talks on the smoothness and performance of the iOS 9.2.1 paired with the fastest A9 processor 2GB RAM. Only concern is the 16gigs of space but i dont mind. That said the games are running seamlessly and I can say one thing - "opening" ringtone appeals to me so much ... so so.. much ... i love it !!! I love my phone a lot and am very happy with the beast yet a baby ... love u iPhone 6s and thanks to apple for making such a phenomenal device !!! cheers to all the iPhone 6s owners !!!

column6: Price drop so soon.. not encouraging for loyal Apple fans
column7:
The phone has been quite good so far except this one day when the phone just switched off and wont turn on.. then had to do a hard reset to switch it on but by the time i figured it out i was so upset.
  

  The screen quality is really good contrary to what i thought...the daylight visibility is actually much better than the samsung super amoled screens, although the color contrast may not be as good as a super amoled screen, it is useable. I use the phone for whatsapp, browsing and calls and till now havent experienced any slowness. The back camera is decent but the front camera is just excellent.
  

  The price drop which happened so soon is a major disappointment, Now i would think twice before buying any apple product close to release date
 
 

   READ MORE

Stop thinking twice if you're planning to buy and buy this over any Samsung or Sony. It's absolutely worth every penny.
  

  Pros:
  
  - Closest to Android in features
  
  - 3D touch will change the way you use your phone. A great utility for checking emails without opening them among others. Give the app developers some time.
  
  - Camera is simply amazing
  
  - Amazing battery life
  
  - Works like a hot knife on butter (super smooth)..haven't closed a app since I started using it and it shows no signs of sweat..:P :P
  
  - Siri is better than its Android counterpart.
  
  - Display is bright even in direct sunlight and colors are a delight to the eyes
  
  - It's by no means quiet. The ringer is loud enough even in noisy environments.
  
  - And if I forgot, I forgot whats like unlocking your phone. Its just your fingerprint on the home button..:D :D and its blazing fast and accurate too.
  
  - Data is lightning fast. Din't realize Airtel offers actual 21 Mbps before using the iPhone.
  

  Cons-
  
  - Mobile network reception is average but it does hold on to the network pretty well.
  

  All in all you will not regret buying this. And after all Apple doesn't make you feel old. It will get software for years too come unlike Androids like Samsung and LG who forget you or delay the upgrade.
 
 

   READ MORE

column6: Service is extremely pathetic.Please don't choose to buy
column7:
The service from FlipKart is extreamly pathetic. Flipkart is only concerned about closing the issue ticket not concerned about solving the customer issues. I will not choose and not recommend Flipkart to any of my friends or relatives. I don't find negative rating(-1) above hence giving 1 star. Without contacting the customers, you yourself imagine and close the issues.
  

  I had booked an iPhone 6s plus and received with 1 day delay in the delivery. More interesting part is its a defective one and raised a replacement request.
  

  One person called from customer care after 1 and half day to understand the issue and promised me to arrange a Tech visit in a day. Again the Tech visit took 1 and half day. The technician understood the problem in the device and given me a written copy of Service call report with all his findings.
  

  He replied me that he has updated to customer care but it will take another 24 hrs to get updated in  flipkart customer care database. I waited a day and called to the customer care and asking for the status. The response from customer care is that they have not received any update from the Technician. I kept calling to the customer care everyday for the status. I had received the same response "No update from Technician".
  

  I had mailed the scan copy of Service call report which technician had given me to the Flipkart customer care. When i called to the customer care, the response is we haven't received any mail from you and disconnected the call.
  

  After 1 hr, i received a message surprisingly the ticket is closed with the Technician resolution.
  


  How come the issue is resolved with the Tech visit but he had given me a copy of Service call report with all his findings and he couldn't resolve it. ?
  

  Guys, think hundred times before buying.
 
 

   READ MORE

column6: Steve's APPLE + Bansal's Delivery - Thumbs Up
column7:
For me mobile phone is a kind of an investment, which I have to use for next 4-5 years. I upgraded from Nokia C7 to Apple iPhone 5s. For this decision I contemplated over 3 months since the price was huge, but after using it for last one week, I am more than convinced & satisfied that I have got a very good & unique product.
  

  UI - Very beautiful & User friendly
  
  Speed - Butter Smooth
  
  Design - Awesome & Elegant
  
  Touch Sensitivity & Usage - Brilliant
  
  OS - Smart
  

  I think iPhone is an experience & it inspires you to explore more.
  

  About Flipkart - They came to deliver the product the same day I ordered, which is terrific customer centricity.
 
 

   READ MORE

No one can beat apple
  
  The iPhone 5S: a phone that looks like the iPhone 5, but goes so much further under the hood. Is that going to be enough to impress the baying hordes?
  

  We've been here before: the iPhone 'S' conundrum. The new phone comes along, taking the shell of the previous model, adds some new bits and pieces, and then claims to be an entirely new phone.
  
  Scores in depth
  
  Design
  
  Features
  
  Performance
  
  Usability
  
  Value
  

  Which it is, of course. But also it isn't. Well, mostly is. To be sure, it's the kind of move that only Apple can pull off with any kind of conviction: the notion that it can take the same chassis, have a little tinker, throw in a new CPU, slightly better battery and camera, and call it an all-conquering device.
 
 

   READ MORE

column6: Expensive but you won't regret it
column7:
First of all, I don't believe any phone is worth more than 40k but due to credit card cashback offers I thought its a deal as I was looking for a new phone. It was 47.5k for me and I felt guilty the next morning with the feeling what have I done. I spent 48k on a phone!!! When I opened the box of gold iPhone, I hated it(again 48k) and tempted to return it but then I started to like it. It feels super premium. It's Apple at its best. Gold looks so cool. It's super smooth and Camera is simply amazing specially low light conditions or total dark. TouchID works everytime. Speaker is awesome and same goes with 3G connection(Most of the people have issues with 3G in this particular part of Gurgaon where I live). You will think why I am not talking about all the wow stuffs (that other phones can do) but Camera, battery life, network, build quality, customer service(it's apple so no worry... I have more exp with them than most of the people out there), and speaker, Security, Syncing with my iPad and Mac are more important for me than any useless gesture. and then apps where I need not say anything as iOS apps are obviously of higher quality compared to same apps in android. Other phones will give you gimmicks and when it comes to things that matter, this is the beast.
 
 

   READ MORE

Bought it the day of its launch. Now after 1.5 months of using it, I can definitely say I love it so much. iOS7 can be a little buggy sometimes, but the phone is an absolute joy to use. Great battery life as well, easily lasts a day and if i am careful by not playing heavy games then lasts more than a day. My previous phone was an Xperia S with pathetic battery life. The camera is amazing as well and the touch ID really works. The only problem with touch ID I encounter is when my hands are dirty or sweaty. It doesn't work then. I have to wipe the home button with my finger, then try again. It works then.
 
 

   READ MORE

column6: I LIVE ONLY TO LOVE APPLE
column7:
The iPhone 5s is the best smartphone Apple has ever made and the fastest smartphone on the planet. If you are a speed junkie or a fitness buff, ditch your iPhone 5 for the iPhone 5s. It's well worth it. It's also worth it for the camera improvements if you enjoy taking lots of pics with your iPhone.
  

  But don't buy the iPhone 5s just for its flagship feature: Touch ID. Yes, it's nice, but it has very limited use at present. But given that it would simply take software updates to make it more useful, that could change quickly. Apple no doubt has big plans for this feature.
  

  Thinking about the iPhone 5c? Skip it if you can spend the extra money. For less than  90 more you'll get twice the phone going up to the iPhone 5s    and you'll be future-proof when Apple decides to add more features relating to its Touch ID.
  

  As for Samsung, they should be very worried. Yes, the company said the next Galaxy will have a 64-bit chip, but until they learn that software optimization is as important for performance as raw hardware power is, Apple's iPhone's will always get more power from less hardware. Such is the bonus of owning both the hardware are the software that powers it.
 
 

   READ MORE

Everything about this phone is perfect. Have been using it for the past month or so. Apart from a couple of random reboots and some UI lags, its nearly perfect. A couple of times, it stopped responding when someone was trying to call me thus making me unable to receive the particular call. Otherwise everything's great.

column6: Simplicity is the ultimate sophistication - Leonardo da Vinci
column7:
Stop comparing this to S4 and HTC one. First of all, this phone is the most beautiful smartphones i have ever owned. I have Galaxy S4, Note 2 and iPhone 4s also. I find this to be the best of smartphone of all the above. S4 feels very cheap. Nearly all features advertised are just gimmicks. A person buys a phone of above 30K for the premium feel of the phone. Galaxy series look almost alike. A person asked me if the phone i had was Galaxy Grand (it was a galaxy s4). Same goes for note 2. iPhone 4s was the most selling phone last year whereas iPhone 5 was 3rd most selling but that doesnt mean 4s is any way more value for money than this.
  
  To everyone complaining about the price, just stop it. Apple is not forcing people to buy this phone. Those who have enough money, buy this. Just because a person can not afford a Maybach or Rolls Royce doesn't mean the car is bad. Its that they want it bad but dont have enough money and thus they start saying people who own it just want to show off.
 
 

   READ MORE

column6: Have you used this product?...Would love to but...
column7:
I had admired Steve Jobs ingenuity in packaging existing technology in a way that defines beauty and stood out as an amazing experience for human beings...not for "A People". I believe Jobs would have loved people to experience his ideas without being overtly imposing or pushing it down their throat...in short if you like it then take it or else don't...your choice.
  

  Sadly the current pricing for the legacy left behind by him is simply violating it all. Ordinary people who do have the tenacity and inkling for appreciating his products are being kept away from this experience. Apple is just catering to those who can afford...the premium class !
  

  Jobs legacy is gradually being converted to what Bill Gates left behind. Nice turn Mr. Timothy D. Cook (Dick). Atleast Gates has changed course to becoming more affordable albeit still not totally giving up his hegemonistic monetary dreams. Jobs too wanted to reach everyone but not the Gates way...rather in a more dignified, ethical and respectful way.
  

  In a retail market pricing rules ... but within reason. There is no shame in still being sold like hot cakes amongst the masses. It does not reduce it's premium brand image. Apple is careless here as its pricing is simply mocking the masses by calling them poor and ignorant.
  

  Apple needs to decide what it wants. Does it want retail market or does it want to be honest in keeping Job's ideas alive?
  

  In short I don't want to pay premium for an Apple experience built on cheap Chinese plastics. There are equally good products available in the world now which give more genuine experiences including better visual aesthetics.
 
 

   READ MORE

column6: Finally - made the switch to iOS and quite comfortable with it
column7:
First things first - the delivery was prompt and it was from AAA deals (had opted for in-a-day delivery). The phone is very sleek and thin - might need a case if you have slippery hands. The build quality is excellent. Below review is from my own experience of switching from Galaxy S3 to this iphone 6+.
  

  The cons:
  
  1. The phone is big - if you have small hands/prefer smaller phones in general, this is not for you (especially existing iphone users - consider iphone 6 maybe). Existing Galaxy/Note series/Nexus 6 fans however might find it easy enough to get used to but..
  
  2. iOS
  
  Being an Android user myself till now, I think the features offered by iOS are nowhere a match for Android.. Power users will have to get used iOS a little. And most features that are in built into Android/Cyanogen are offered by paid apps in case of iOS.
  
  3. Data
  
  Although this is related to point 2 (iOS) rather than the phone itself, found it that big a deal to mention it separately.. iOS gobbles up data like mad, incremental upgrades aren't as efficient as Android (OS updates) and even regular apps are way heavier.. For e.g. consider this, Google sheets, that's 30-40 MB on android, is more than 110 MB in iOS. Considering android has to support more resolutions and phone models than iphone, I think this is gross inefficiency..
  
  The pros:
  
  The advantages now:
  
  1. Battery:
  
  The phone lasts 1.5-2 days easily with both location and background app refresh (sync) on all the time. My phone still has 9% despite 8 hours of usage and 32 hours of standby (after plugged out of full charge yesterday morning). That's a good 40 hours of usage. On the other hand, I'm yet to hear about an android phone that lasts more than a day with Sync, Google now and location set to on - even the nexus 6 would barely last a few hours more than a day.. This is not an understatement - this is easily the best phone in terms of battery life today (To be fair, worthy competitors in android are Note 4, Oneplus One, Nexus 6 & Moto Turbo - all of them come close but not quite matching up to this)
  
  2. Camera:
  
  The camera is still 8 MP, but has digital and optical image stabilization. Shoots fast and quite good - functions so smoothly. Low light photography works great. The only better phone cameras out there (in Android) are Galaxy s6 and LG G4. And considering this is just 8 MP but still matches up with the best cameras out there, the file size difference is quite an advantage..
  
  3. iOS:
  
  Although it has its pains, iOS still has its advantages - the entire OS feels very smooth and lag free (can't stress this enough - even the best of the Android phones starts lagging after six months or so). Even other minor features - the passbook, Stocks, Apple health all of them have equivalent Android apps, but the tight integration with the core OS is much better here. Also - iTunes sync - a lot of people might hate it, but this is still the best software to sync playlists and songs. To give you an example, you can even set a track to play only between the start of minute 2 and 3 on your desktop, and the same will get synced on to your iphone/ipod (tried removing preludes in a song anyone?)
  
  So yes, this phone has its advantages and disadvantages - but at the end of the day if you just want a smartphone to last long, shoot great photos and are ready to experiment with iOS a little, I think this is for you. Considering the best android phones are almost the same price (S6/S6 edge) and given that they run Touchwiz, this decision was a no-brainer after all :)
 
 

   READ MORE

column6: Am i sure that i want to continue with IOS !!!!!!!
column7:
I think this is the right time for the purchased product to be reviewed. I am writing my review after 10months of my purchase. I bought my iphone 6plus after 2 years it was launched, because i couldnt afford the launch price offcourse!! Anyways coming to the product, after using it for almost 10 months i believe its not how it was when i bought it. In these 10 months i had to reset the iphone once because of some issues(network suddenly vanishes). The best part of the phone is its battery, camera performance is good, night shots could have been better.1GB ram handles the apps flawlessly. Anyways i bought the 16GB version as i couldnt afford the 64GB one. Later i realised i had to use the iphone only for mails and few daily apps.
  

  Coming from android(asus zenfone2) where i had internal 32GB and external 32GB memory card then settling to a limited 16GB device was lots of sacrifice. Reason for switching to iphone: wanted to explore the ios and its eco system. IOS is cool. Its apps dosent lag, too bad the size of the apps are bigger and also better.
  
  BUT!!!
  
  I feel some functionality in the apps are much more better in android than IOS and i say this without any biasness. Some apps in IOS do have better features and options than android. But overall i think its a win for android.

After being on Android since 2009 (had an iphone 2G prior to 09), when my Note 2 died due to Sudden Death Syndrome (google it), the choice was between upgrading to a Note 5 (best hardware) or to an iphone 6S+ which came highly recommended by all friends. After lot of research decided that the Note 5, while being a powerhouse, will give me the same Samsung Touchwiz droid experience (albeit on steroids) that I have been using since the Galaxy S1 to my Note 2. Wanted a change in UI and experience and hence decided to go for the Apple despite a higher than Note 5 pricetag (considerably).
  

  Found out that flipkart rates for the product were lower than the Apple store by a decent margin so decided to take a leap of faith and ordered from flipkart. Delivery service as always was superb and the phone was in my hands within 10 hours of placing the order. Brilliant I say !
  
  The product as expected is exemplary on every count. From build quality to retina display to the sorted OS, everything reeks of class and quality. Comparing this to the world of the premium Droids is like comparing a Mercedes Benz to a Toyota. The feel of this phone in your hand will immediately make you realize why you paid a premium for this over the Note 5 or the S6. The camera and battery life are brilliant to say the least and the phone is lightning fast, I kid you not !
  
  Cons?? Well I am still used to the Back and App keys on my droid and subconsciously keep hunting for them at times on the iphone. The single Home key button layout and the GUI will take some more time for me to get used to. Plus the accessories are priced sky high as well. A pity that folks in India pay a solid price premium for apple products over the pricing in US or Europe or Singapore.
  

  Overall, I am absolutely in love with the piece. It is just WOW. I think I am hooked onto Apple for a long time to come.
 
 

   READ MORE

I am using this phone for last few months after windows and Android phone. Very smooth operation, occassional feel much faster than used to be in android and windows phone. The  S  releases of the iPhone have never been the ones consumers raved about. Maybe it was the fact that it was harder to tell what had changed, a fact owing nicely to the idea that the body stayed the same, and that the features were more incremental than anything else.
  

  + Very well built, Performance is top notch, Battery can get two days, Camera upgrades are worth checking out and make the phone highly competitive against other flagships, 3D Touch adds an extra level of control, allowing one handed operation, Fingerprint scanner is even faster than before
  

  - Expensive, No way of getting 4K video off the phone and over to a 4K TV easily, No upgradeable storage ( Have to go for 64GB+ )as is typical with Apple

column6: The Most Powerful Small Phone in the Market
column7:
The Apple iPhone SE is the undoubtedly the most powerful small phone in the market today. Its 12 MP rear camera produces truly best in class photos. Many people had shown concerns regarding the 1.2 MP front camera. But believe me, folks, it is really good! The performance is superb and absolutely flawless. No lag whatsoever. Siri is good (they need to build a better AI engine for Siri, and Cortana is the winner here). If you're not into games then the battery will last for at least 30 hours. If you're shooting 4K videos then the phone starts to heat up a bit and battery starts to drain. In short, it's a great device. And did I mention that I'm a first time iOS user?

column6: A Tale of an Amazing deal.
column7:
An Amazing deal.
  

  I purchased this phone between 18-25 December for a totally discounted rate of 21,800 (Exchanged my oneplus one for 7000, 2 year old). So far i had a wonderful deal, And i opted for ios after years of android and cyanogen .
  
  Received the product within 3 days (nice). Initial thoughts, perfectly packaged , love the overall  user interface, considering the amount of my usage battery is seriously rocking of mild usage, Youtube, browsing , not much of games etc. It also charges really fast.
  
  Display is gorgeous, camera is way better than what i used to deal with. The screen size however is still taking some time, Considering the 5.5 inch of my oneplus one.
  
  Touch ID in my eyes is working flawless even though its an older generation, Also the OPO didn't have one.
  

  I've got an amazing upgrade for nearly the same price as my previous phone, I find it pretty amazing!

column6: Quality is good but not value for money
column7:
I was at first wowed by this phone. Small and cute, I had actually ordered this as a birthday gift for my mom to replace her aging  Nokia Lumia 920. However, since she was not at all enthu on using this phone, I started using it as a temporary fill in. My initial love for this phone turned into irritation and finally frustration. Although the build quality is superb, there are 2 major issues
  

  1) Small screen size - the cuteness came back to haunt me. Once you are used to 5" screens, going to back to sub 4" just doesn't cut the cake. I don't enjoy watching even the whatsapp video forwards on this phone anymore!
  
  2) 16 GB space is criminal! - in less than 2 months I have started getting 'space almost full' messages! And I have deleted all mp3s and never stored any mp4s on the phone anyways!
  

  Just not worth the price of 30K when you get a 6GB Ram, 64 GB One Plus 3T for the same price!!!
 
 

   READ MORE

column6: Counterfiet earpods/Headphones with iPhone SE 16GB Gold
column7:
I bought this iPhone SE 16GB Gold from Flipkart on July 20th 2016. Recieved the product well on time no issues with that. However, when I received the product it was in perfect packing condition sealed from what I observed and showed no signs of tampering.When I unboxed the item saw the iPhone, charger along with the cable and these earpods which looked suspicious to me. When I opened the earpod box it seemed like it was used and one of the earplugs had some sort of wax on it. I still tried using it. Used it on several calls but the other party on the other side side of the phone does not seems to hera me properly and when I was tweaking the headphone jack it made static noise. Tried with another heasdet it was working fine.
  
  Then I took it to Authorized apple service center in my area wherein immediatley seeing these earpods they declared it as counterfiet. As the original earpods had printed lable on it deisgned by apple made in vietnam. Which this earpods never had. I took it in writing from Apple service center and then mailed Flipkart then they apologized and gave me rs 2000 voucher waller cash but still did not give cash refund for this product, Now I have seem there are so many diuplicate apple headphones floating around flipkart. Than God atleast my phone was original which I confirmed from service center. I am surprised how on earth in a sealed package they are supplying counterfiet products..
  
  Please be aware while doing business with this sepcific vendor named Bestbuygadgets M/s. Bhajanlal Commercial Pvt ltd Kolkatta. I would give 0 rating to them...
  

  Very dissapointed...
 
 

   READ MORE

I got this phone on price Rs 16570/- only by exchanging my old one. This review is after 12days usage of my phone....The good thing of this phone is its battery capacity..It takes 14-16 hours on regular usage like net surfing and social net working..
  

  Pros-
  
  * Good Battery Back up(16 hrs with regular and 37-38 hours in normal calling)
  
  * Good back camera quality
  
  * Great Display
  
  * Size is very handy
  
  * Overall cashing looks premium class
  
  * ios 11 update
  

  Cons-
  
  * The worst thing is heating issue
  
  * 32 gb storage is not sufficient as its apps come at-least 100mb each
  
  * Signal detection quality is very poor as in my room it catches 3g network where other android device catch 4g network in same network provider
  
  * This phone is not meant for Rough & Top  usage
  
  * Front camera is not good as compare to same price range

To have peace and happiness in life, a person requires a powerful, trust worthy, reliable and sexy partner.
  
  This phone surely is the one.
  

  Powerful - This phone's processor is enough for a person who has a pretty normal to medium high usage.
  
  The speakers produce very crisp sound.
  
  Also don't feel bad about the less megapixels this phone's camera is having. Trust me unless u r a DSLR user the front as well as back
  
  camera are more than enough. (I have compared it to One plus3T and results were nearly the same)
  

  Reliable- The battery lasts for 1full day in normal usage. And it is powered by IOS so there is no question of Lag.
  

  Sexy- Many people are going for Iphone SE but let me tell u 'Bade acche lagte hai' applies to the screen too. 4.7" screen is perfect for someone
  
  having either small or large hand. Trust me u don't want smaller screen than this.
  

  Also u get something which u don't get in Android.. SIRI. She is mindblowing, Works very well and she is the one u need for a hassle free mobile use.
  

  So go for it even without thinking for a second and your life will become peaceful and happy!

column6: Apple, you've got one more loyal customer :D
column7:
The phone is a piece of art! Great sleek design, very stylish look.
  

  Camera is too good as its Apple's own ;) RAM management is pretty cool, doesnt feel like its 1 GB. Overall UI experience is smooth, in love with it! This is my first iPhone and within 11 days of use I can say that I will never go back to android now! Its worth every penny at this price I got (24k) Thanks to flipkart for their timely delivery.

column6: Awesome product, flipkart delivery policy sucks
column7:
Review about product:
  
  Awesome product!
  
  This is my first Apple product, and I really like it. Coming from Android background I found only a couple of points which could be improved upon.
  
  1. The keyboard doesn't support gestures.
  
  2. To do a touch unlock, you have to press the home button, it's not touch sensitive.
  

  Review about delivery experience:
  
  1. Very very poor experience
  
  2. Card machine not working
  
  3. Flipkart removed the option to pay after ordering by COD
  
  4. Called Flipkart customer care, no one picked, the call was cut after IVRS respose that "we'll call you in 5-10 mins", what happens when there is an emergency?
  
  5. After 3 hours received a text message from Flipkart saying it was sorry it could not call me.
  
  5. No callback was ever received from flipkart.
 
 

   READ MORE

column6: Defective piece and bad service from flipkart
column7:
If you want an IPhone, don't get it from flipkart because if they provide you with a defective piece they'll just wash their hands off and ask you to visit the Apple Store. Why need this middle men when they won't help with post purchase? Better to just directly purchase it from the store and get it in the same day instead of waiting for a week after you've paid the entire amount. I have never faced any issues with IPhone till I purchased it from flipkart. Bad,late and unhelpful service from flipkart, especially while dealing with products like this.

The product I am using since 2 months. Its quite good for Iphone lover having some pros and cons.
  

  Some Pros are :
  
  1- Handy and Good looking
  
  2- Good interface
  
  3- No lagging
  
  4- Finger print sensor is very good
  
  5- Display is good
  
  6- Battery life is good but not for gamer
  
  7- Both Cameras are quite good (No extra effect and beauty mode in fault camera, if you are selfie lover then install Retrica and other apps )
  
  8- Quick charge ( 15% to 100% within 75-85 mins )
  
  9- Processor is too good as we can't compare it with snapdragons latest ones
  
  10- Audio is awesome on headphone
  

  Some Cons are :
  
  1- No wake up only on touch sensor (you have to press power or home button first to wake up home screen with print sensor)
  
  2- Lil bit slippery to metallic body
  
  3- Apps are heavy in size as compare to Android apps
  
  4- All media store in ""All Photo Albums" like whatsapp, Camera, Hike etc. (also store in individual album)
  
  5- No extra mode on default camera.
  
  6- Downloading apps from Apple store is quite slow having 10mbps speed but its not major issue.
  


  Over all Phone is awesome for iphone lover. I m happy with this phone and also Flipkart service and seller: SuperComNet
  
  Thank you SuperComNet seller and Flipkart for sale. I purchased this phone @ 20999 at the time of sale.

First of all, I like to thank flipkart for it's amazing deliver on time. The packing was ok.
  

  It has totally a different look than earlier models of Iphone. It really gives a awesome feel while using. Touch sensitivity. Metal finishing is really good. Camera quality is really fine.You can feel it only after using it.
  

  For the product, its so far the best by apple
  


  Pros:
  
  1. Amazing interface - Apple has always kept it clean
  
  2. Outstanding camera
  
  3. Outstanding premium looks
  
  4. Amazing ecosystem, in case you also have a Mac/iPad these devices interconnect seamlessly through iCloud
  
  5. Awesome screen (All that Gorilla Glass and so on fade away against the vibrancy of this phone's screen - Don't understand the gimmick of having to play Full-HD videos on phone, the screen's too small to make out the difference)
  

  Cons:
  
  as per me no Cons

column6: Used this for couple months and phone is dead now
column7:
I bought this in June, phone was working well, smooth transition, less memory usage but it stopped working now. Iphone is not booting up at all and yeah is was not in the sleep mode. Went to the Apple store and they took a day to replace the dead phone with a new Iphone.
  

  If this would have been other brand then they would have repaired the same phone and would have taken days to rectify the problem.
  
  So overall a good experience from Apple support but didnt expected an Iphone to be dead after using the same for 2 months
 
 

   READ MORE

Ordered this product on 23th Apr and was confirmed the delivery date of 25th Apr.
  

  Kept tracking the order for 2 days but the green dot didn't move. Called their customer care. They had no clue first of all but the 2nd time was told that the seller is out of stock.
  
  That's not what i wanted to hear after spending freaking 50k on a phone.
  

  Anyway, was given another delivery date of 29th but to my surprise the product got delivered on 27th. Packing was good. It had to be good because considering the way the delivery person was handling all the products, i would not have seen my phone in one piece.
  

  Just 2 days into my phone... So far so good.... Will post if i encounter any problem..

column6: Great phone but flipkart delivery was a let down
column7:
What an amazing phone this iphone is indeed. The only concern however is the battery life. Indeed its terrible, specially  if you are a samsung note series user like me. Samsung Note beats iPhone in battery life hands down.
  

  Besides a great phone overall. I am loving the experience of switching to an iPhone after so many years on Android.
  

  Oh and flipkart delivery was a big let down. I paid Rs. 90 extra for same day delivery which actually was a day after. Even then I received flipkart message that order was out for delivery but the usual delivery guy's number was not there. I had asked for the delivery at my work and had to leave the same day at 6 for a week long travel and when the delivery guy didn't show up I called the customer care to see if they could provide his number or give me a confirmation if this would be delivered before 6. But to my surprise that arrogant lady on the phone says you have to wait till 9pm and bangs down the phone on me.
  

  Really? Is this what Flipkart is transforming into? Becoming arrogant as their valuations increase?
 
 

   READ MORE

column6: Excellent product with On time delivery by Flipkart
column7:
Recently i bought IPHONE 6. Thank to flipkart for it's amazing delivery.
  
  This is my first apple iphone and i am much satisfied with the product actually i am loving it.
  
  Lets talk about the pros and cons.
  
  Pros:
  
  1) Camera is the highlight of this phone . Its captured very good image (capture all the ultra pixel.)
  
  2) Best Display with awesome viewing angles!
  
  3) battery is pretty good compared with old Android phone.
  
  4) Multitasking is more easier if we compared with Android phones.Which i personally faced.
  
  5)The  design of the phone is very slim, its look rich.
  
  6) Retina display is much better than super amoled hd display.
  
  Cons:
  
  1) Only one problem which i faced is data sharing with the other mobile.
  
  Overall It's the best smart phone. Don't compare with Android phones. IOS is way beyond that. Use it then only you can make the difference.
  
  IF you planning to buy the IPHONE then its a best device to buy.
 
 

   READ MORE

column6: Not satisfied from the flipkart and product.
column7:
I am buying stuff from the flipkart from last many years but now flipkart is not the same as it used to be. I have bought three products in this year and I had to return them back for quality & defective issues.
  

  Well, Lets talk about Iphone 6,
  

  Recently I have bought this phone, it looks good, slim and very light weight. UI/UX of iphone is wonderful and yes being the owner of the Iphone will take you to the different level.
  

  I was testing its all features and found the following .
  

  Camera: Supern
  
  Battery life: NIce and its charger is also works really good within 1hr you will see 100% battery on your phone.
  
  Speed: Super fast.
  
  Overall its wonderful phone.
  

  Now I have checked with WIFI Connectivity.
  

  I have found that phone has some issues with the WIFI connectivity and its not working properly specially with Apple store.
  

  Then I had tested calls on speaker but its not working while I putting my call on speakers.
  

  I have check the downloading speed in WIFI  for downloading apps but believe me, for downloading whats app it took me 40 min however, same thing i have done in my android phone and its took just 1 min to download.
  

  I called flipkart and got the replaced product but I faced the same issues with the other product as well.
  

  So, kindly check all the features on the phone like speakers on calls, Connectivity issues with wifi, downloading issue etc..
  

  Overall I am very much disappoint with the flipkart and its products quality and as I said this is not first time I am experiencing poor and defective quality of products from the flipkart.
  

  I am sorry flipkart but you are loosing your one genius buyer after this experience.
 
 

   READ MORE

I doubt wether its a genuine I phone or not.
  

  Battery dies down suddenly, hangs too often. is there a way to verify wether is original or Assembled in Gaffar market ??

column6: "Yup, if you don't have an iPhone, well, you don't have an iPhone" and Thank you Flipkart and MobTab
column7:
(Review: 7 days after delivery)
  

  I am very much complimented by the online shopping experience with Flipkart and thank MobTab seller.
  

  Product is awesome and delivery was quick. Delivery was projected by 23 July 2015 but delivered on 19 July 2015. Packaging was good. iphone exceeds expectation!! No comparison with user interface and experience
  

  Probably, I gave a fair chance to Flipkart to server better with a second chance
  
  Although, my first attempt while purchase of Apple iphone 6 gave a bad experience through Flipkart and VTMSLP seller. The website showed the product is in stock and when the transaction completed within a few minutes of amount deduction, Flipkart comes back with order cancellation mail  we've just been informed that Apple iPhone 6 in your order XXXXXXXX number is unavailable with the seller   VTMSLP 
  

  Not to take offensive guys either VTMSLP or Flipkart, there is a scope for improvement in service delivery, this will destroy WOW factor from customer experience. However, I got refund after 5 working days or so, but spoiled the first buying experience and had to wait till refund to happen for repeat order.
  

  No hard feelings but expect improvement, being a happy-go-lucky customer will definitely look forward for repeat purchase..
  

  BTW, I haven't received soft copy of invoice yet, its 7 days past and please act upon
  


  Best Regards
  
  Preetham

column6: Worst idea to buy from flipkart
column7:
The product is definitely good as reviewed by many. But here my review is about the experience with flipkart purchase. While ordering the product had opted for exchange offer and after a weeks time when the product finally arrived the iphone was taken back by the executive due to issue with old mobile being exchanged. That's fine but the issue started just after that. The delivery executive said "Am taking back the product and you will get the refund". Believe me have followed up multiple times and still did not get the refund amount back and its almost two weeks that am being harassed. Have called customer care and have sent emails but nothing conclusive. So here am stuck with no iphone and no refund. They seem to have the worst customer support. Please be careful while purchasing on flipkart.
 
 

   READ MORE

I bought my iphone about 4 months back and by that time there was nothing wrong with the phone. But about a few days earlier the phone's battery began to drain very quickly (even on standby) and there were charging issues.So I took the phone to the service center and they told me that the charging cable was not apple authorized and has damaged the phone. Luckily I faced this issue when my phone was within warranty.The cable was the default one which is shipped with the new phone . The service center people refused to give me an exchange as it was a non apple product and it seems flipkart isn't much interested in this issue.Very disappointed . Because of this i had to go about 40 km (nearest center being in noida) just because flipkart couldn't get a stupid cable right in the first place.
 
 

   READ MORE

column6: Stop Buying IPhone6 from WS Retails(Flipkart)
column7:
Guys,
  

  I bought IPhone6 by exchanging my well working Galaxy S3 phone, but they shipped defect IPhone6 and when I ask for replacement they said they do not have it in stock..!, which seems very funny and strange to hear from such a established organization and they are not even giving my old phone which seems to be a big open scam/trap from Flipkart to sell their defected products to our old well working goods. Well, It is my suggestion not to avail this exchange facility of Flipkart as it seems a scam/trapping technique.
  

  It is my sincere suggestion not to go with Flipkart to but IPhone6 and stop using this exchange business of Flipkart.
  

  I have decided to reach out consumer court on the same and take things up legally..!
 
 

   READ MORE

I always believe in shopping offline as I can touch and feel the product, However few of friends regularly buy products from flipkart and they said flipkart is providing awesome service and deliveries the products as promised and all the products are genuine, Trusting them I order I phone 6 as the product value was less in flipkart comparing to outside market.
  


  Let me tell u the purpose of buying this phone.
  


  It was my parents 50th wedding anniversary and they are not staying here with me in Bangalore, Hence I invited them to come to bangalore so we all together can celebrate there 50th wedding anniversary and my mom was already using a I phone 5s and she wanted to upgrade it hence i ordered I phone 6 through flipkart for gifting her and selected for next day delivery as the wedding anniversary was on 24th-08-2015. As my friends said I got the product delivered on time.
  


  Here comes the shocking and the saddest part, In the evening with my parents while celebrating their wedding anniversary I gifted I phone 6 to my parents which was completely sealed with flipkart package, After opening the flipkart packaging we found  that the box was already opened and sealed again with a gum tape after opening the box found a plastic bubble sheet which was completely squeezed and was in a very bad condition and all the bubbles were blown after removing the plastic bubble sheet we found that box of the phone was not sealed we could find few scratches and small holes on the box and my mom opened the box & found that the product is missing and everyone started starring at me it was so embarrassing in front my parents  and my friends I felt so bad that I gifted a phone to my mom and phone itself is missing my mom was very disappointed. Hope you can understand what my mom & myself have gone through after seeing the empty box. I have been saving money from last 5months to buy this phone to my mom and I only have one request now plz give me my money back & ill never shop again with flipkart. My parents said to file an FIR against flipkart in police station and lodge a complaint in consumer forum. Before doing that I want to know what action will be taken from flipkart regarding to my issue.
  


  I have paid Rs: 44089/- and I want all the money to be refunded.
  


  I am sure the delivery person has done something with the product.  Please do further investigation on courier team.
 
 

   READ MORE

I was skeptic about the seller (SuperCom Net) because I read the reviews here on Flipkart and people mentioned that they'd received fake phones. However, I trust Flipkart and this product had the assured badge so there shouldn't be any need to worry.
  
  The phone arrived in perfect condition and I had requested one day delivery which I got.
  
  As far as the performance is concerned, this is my second iPhone and I'm glad to have made the choice. The camera is good. Low light photography is okay ish but otherwise it's aperture is wide so it clicks really good photographs.
  
  This is the "S" variant so its processor is faster. The phone won't hang even if you fill up most of its storage. It'll just inform you that the storage is full.
  
  Bluetooth now connects to non Apple devices which is a relief!
  
  The battery life is also okay. I wouldn't say it is perfect but it is good.
  
  The build is obviously amazing.
  
  The phone and Flipkart's service are both at par.

column6: iPhone 6s, the better buy in front of 7
column7:
I bought the 6s space grey 32gb recently and am completely satisfied with the phone.here are a few pointers-
  
  1 great colour reproduction (don't think this thing can't produce a nice video experience as I think this is a much more efficient display compared to Samsung,etc
  
  And eats less battery too)
  
  2 the phone provides a beast of a processor( The A9 though a year old is still faster than everyone except though iPhone 7 is faster)
  
  3 costs reasonably lesser than the 7 and there aren't a lot many differences other than colour ,OIS  and processor so overall this might just be the iPhone for you if you are looking for one
  
  So go for it.
  
  I say buy the 32 gb one as its a reasonable amount of storage and wait for the next year's model which is supposed to be a big upgrade on account of iPhone's 10th birthday.
  
  So rather than spending the big buck and going for 7 buy a better priced 6s with all the features available and go for next years iPhone .
  
  Go for it

column6: Really Bad Experience buying IPhone from Flipkart
column7:
Really bad experience with Flipkart this time as I have received a used product. I was really happy that I am going to receive my IPhone 6s on the very day of Diwali. But all my excitement and Happiness got vanished once I took the phone to get it checked at Apple Service Center. I was really shocked listening to particular Apple associate that only 300 days of Warranty is remaining. However The brand gives a warranty of 1 year. According to which 2 months of Warranty = 60 days Warranty was missing. I have never faced any issues buying Mobile phones from Flipkart. But this time Flipkart has disappointed me. I immediately called customer service and what they said was that we are escalating your issue to concerned team and they will resolve your problem. But at such moment the action has to be taken quickly so not good customer service.

Received the product right in 2 working days!
  
  In absolute love with the iPhone 7.
 
 

   READ MORE

What's up everyone, got my phone last week after ordering from Amazon earlier. As usual I was worried about Supercom seller but the phone arrived brand new although there was no seal. There is no way to know if anyone had a look at he phone and put it back into the packing and kept it back. But phone appears pretty new.
  

  Coming to the phones performance I think most people have covered what they like about it. I personally don't think the phone has evolved at all in the last 5 years. I found the iPhone 4 pretty much the same as this one , only smaller. Don't believe me? Watch the 7 plus tips and tricks video on YouTube and you'll realise there's nothing new whatsoever. It's the same old wine in the same old bottle.
  

  The 7 plus is a huge phone and there are many people including myself who have bought it to get a premium experience, whatever that's supposed to mean. I had a one plus two for 16 months which I think was a really fine phone for the price.
  

  I consider getting blown on a penthouse terrace under full moonlight a premium experience. If you think being able to fluidly scroll the screen with your ugly fingers on a mobile phone is a premium experience then you really have a few miles to go before understanding what an experience really means.
  

  Two cameras are not something anyone ought to be paying 70k for , neither is the rest of the specs which is less than par with other leading smartphones.
  

  I think most people buy 7 plus because of an identity crisis that they don't know how else to spend their money. A 60-70k phone to look at the same damn Whatsapp, instagram, Facebook or YouTube all day long doesn't seem to justify the price. oh you need it to shoot 4K videos? I would rather shoot you in the face.
  

  Before you buy the phone, think hard about these things:
  

  Will it change the way your face appears in the mirror every morning?
  

  Will you be suddenly more talented, funny or attractive because you have an iPhone?
  

  Will it make up for your small prick and does having an iPhone make it seem like it's larger?
  

  Do you want to spend 60-70k on a phone that has a display that looks as prehistoric as a Nokia , a keyboard that's outdated, a design that's redundant and a headphone jack that doesn't exist or would you rather save that money for a trip to Ladakh, Spiti  or hell even Nepal or Tibet?
  

  Although one has to say that not having a headphone jack is not a huge issue as the buyer can always use the jack from the jackass he becomes when he buys an iPhone.
  

  The charm of a new phone fades in one month. What after that? You'll still be stuck at the same desk at work, in the same boring marriage or relationship,  driving to the same old restaurants. An expensive phone will not buy back your self esteem. Please think.
  

  Instead choose to buy an experience. Buy a flight ticket to Sri Lanka or Lakshadweep , Thailand, Ladakh or even Australia. Their return fares are much cheaper than an iPhone.
  

  Also whoever says if you don't have an iPhone, you don't have an iPhone, needs to have his eyes gauged out and suspended upside down over a pool of hungry crocodiles.
  

  There are also people who say "so what if it's expensive, I can afford it because it offers a premium experience." These people also need to be repeatedly stabbed in the chest with an ice picker.
  

  I am in the business of app testing so I at least have an excuse although not a very good one. Whatever your excuse is , is wrong.
 
 

   READ MORE

column6: iPhone 7 Plus & Flipkart: A Match Made in Heaven!
column7:
There are companies that make phones for the sake of making them and "cornering, the market, and then there is A company that makes phones out of sheer passion for engineering and technology. That company is undoubtedly: Apple. I have been using iPhones ever since the first one released in 2007 and all along the way up to 2016, I have bought no less that 15 Android phones of various sizes, shapes and brands, just to see what I could be missing out on. Turns out I wasn't missing out on anything...significant! Adding silly features just because you can be 'one up' worsens the experience of ownership, which is why I ended up selling every Android phone I bought within a month of owning it and clutched on to my iPhone.
  

  If, as a customer, you can rise above a spec-sheet and so-called feature list, the iPhone is what you need for a beautiful experience of owning and using a phone. From its superb quality, to its packaging, to the ecosystem...to its long - very long - life with regular OS & security updates, iPhone is worth the extra cash over its competitors; every single extra penny!
  

  As for the iPhone 7 Plus, Apple has done something spectacular with the display, cameras, home button, processor and user experience (thanks to iOS 10). Yes, while many were hoping for a "new" design, I'm quite satisfied with the present one and would rather "err" on the side of having a good overall phone than flaunt a fancy-looking one with nothing else to it! The Matte Black looks awesome, the Taptic Engine does its job well, as do the Cameras. Speed is instantly noticeable in real-time...rather than on a spec-sheet, and the colours from the wide-gamut display are rich and real. Everything runs buttery-smooth, for which you DON'T REQUIRE 6GB RAM! On the other hand, Android phones NEED at least 8GB, if you ask me, because the OS stutters and staggers otherwise. So it's not a feature as Android brands would claim, it's a basic requirement! To sum it up, please don't ponder over numbers, figures and "features". If you're in the market for a superlative phone that is very able and capable of providing you a superb user experience, without any hassles or headaches, the iPhone 7 is what you should be buying. And if the hands could go a little deeper into your pockets, think no further and get yourself the iPhone 7 Plus. It's cool, it's svelte, it's suave, it's reliable, it's dependable, it's durable...it's iPhone!
  

  Coming to Flipkart: this e-commerce site amazes me! I cannot tell you how impressed and happy I was to have my phone delivered at 2030hrs, when it was released only at 1900hrs (on October 7th)!! I saved money, time and the hassle of having to queue up hours in advance at a store, all of which would have brought me home well after 4-5 hours. Flipkart was easier and quicker! Add to it all, the delivery personnel seemed as eager and enthusiastic to deliver the iPhone 7 Plus, as I was to receive it! They beamed a broad smile, congratulated me and shook me by the hand. Then came another pleasant surprise - the packaging. The phone was wrapped in this nice, sturdy box that read: "This is the _____. You know what it is". It made not only me smile, but the entire household! I was also happy to avail the Cash-Back offer that Citibank offered through Flipkart. It did sweeten the deal. The exchange offer was also a sensible choice when I booked another iPhone for a friend.
  

  What I appreciate about Flipkart is the deep sense of Morals & Ethics it has as a company. When the sale suffered from glitches a few years back, the company was quick enough to place a full page apology in leading newspapers. It promptly thanks its customers after every big sale. These thoughts may seem small, but they are huge in the larger scope of things and will certainly take Flipkart a long way up! I have been buying stuff from Flipkart since the company began and the experience just keeps getting better...and better. To fulfil millions of wishes in the festive season, especially by delivering on time, is not a joke! Kudos to all of you at Flipkart - you should be proud to work for such a company! I, on my part, am proud of being a customer of an Indian e-commerce site that puts many foreign ones to shame. This is a company with a conscience - and I strongly recommend it!
 
 

   READ MORE

column6: Excellent device which digs a hole in your pocket
column7:
Waited so long to get my hands on Black version due to shortage in stock. Over the years I have been using premium Android mobiles till now. This year with the Note 7 out of the race, I was looking for an alternate option and narrowed down to Galaxy S7 Edge, Google Pixel XL and IPhone 7 Plus. All of them have their own pros and cons but this time I went ahead with Apple to give a try. It didn't disappoint me till now. One of the best battery backup in a premium phone. Camera is top notch and performance is amazing. Even though the mobile is huge it feels solid in your hands. This shows how great the build quality is with the even distribution of weight. Apple delivered what they have promised during the launch. Certain things can only be experienced when using the mobile as a daily driver.
  

  Battery charges slow compared to Quick charge capable mobiles but it's not a big deal as the battery will definitely last the entire day even high high usage. No heat or stutter whatsoever. It feels as if I'm moving my fingers over water. Such fluidity combined with rock solid performance is hard to get.
  

  Yes the phone is definitely expensive but given that Google matching the price of IPhone will only benefit Apple as the price to feature ratio is better in IPhone. Some notable differences are IP68 Dust and Water Resistant, stereo speakers, VOLTE support, consistent battery, durability. IPhone covers a wide range of network brands which is often ignored by most users. This is a vital feature for people travelling to various countries.
  

  Coming from Nexus 6P, I was happy with the move except for the price I had to shell out.
  

  So overall it's a great device if you can afford. Else Galaxy S7 Edge is a solid alternative at around 50k for its design, display and camera. Further down Oneplus 3 is the best option at around 28k.
  

  If you want an IPhone equivalent in Android ecosystem, then Pixel XL is a good option considering its unlimited photos and videos storage in Google Drive and for the Google Assistant.
  

  This is purely a review from my personal preference for the flagships. It's up to the individual to pick up which suits best to their needs. Options are limitless. At the end of the day, the satisfaction is what matters irrespective of how good or bad the mobile is.
  

  One man's trash is other man's treasure
  

  One small advice to all who are looking to buy a premium device. Do a detailed research before choosing your preferred mobile. Smartphones are an expense and doesn't give much resale value.
 
 

   READ MORE

column6: iPhone 7 is a beauty but iPhone 7 plus is a Beast.
column7:
First of all iPhone 7 plus is a beast . In terms of performance there is no match. The camera is too awesome and I love the Bokeh effect which iPhone 7 plus delivers because of the dual camera.I got my iPhone 7 plus black 128 gb on 11th Nov . I was little bit scared because of the negative reviews given by people for Supercomnet. But I have to admit the packaging was great and the product was genuine.
  

  Thank you Supercomnet and Flipkart.
 
 

   READ MORE

First of all let me start by giving Kudos to Flipkart for the awesome service. Of late I have been disappointed with Flipkarts service standards but the experience they provided with the delivery of the iPhone 7 Plus makes me hopeful that all isn't lost.
  

  Full marks for delivering the product on the launch day itself. Brownie points for the nice touch of using a black gift box. I personally like it a lot as it color matched with my phone.
  

  I ordered this phone after cancelling my pre order for the note 7 due to the indefinite delay. I was using a iPhone 6s 64gb and compared to it this phone is truly an upgrade. Those 6s users who are waiting for the iPhone 8 thinking that the 7 is not much of an upgrade, well you are right as well as wrong. The 7 is a sidegrade in all honesty but the 7 plus is definitely an upgrade. For the first time since the launch of the plus variant, it's the bigger iPhone that is the most obvious choice.
  

  I haven't played around with the phone much so can't comment on the quality control of the phone as I always had issues with my previous iphones in terms of quality control and build defects.
  
  However that being said this phone definitely seems better put together and better finished than the 6s.
  

  The first thing you will notice right of the bat is the much improved display. Though it's doesn't even come close to the S7 edge display but it's by far the best LCD display ever on a smartphone or tablet. This thing is bright, vibrant, with accurate Colors to boot. A lot of people coming from older iphones will find the display too warm or yellowish as this display is calibrated much closer to 6500k white point than previous iphones which were in the ball park of 7000k white point. That made them a little bluish and the whites a little cooler. A lot of people will think that as the correct white but let me tell you the 7 plus has the most accurate white point of any phone on the market. This display is so accurate that you can actually edit photos on it without an issue. Also for the first time I find the display truly useable outdoors due to the extremely low reflectance.
  

  So the display gets a 9.5/10
  

  Coming to the next big ticket item, the dual camera set up. Well the primary camera is miles better than the 6s camera in artificial and low light where the 6s camera failed miserably. The zoom lens is a great add-on and doesn't feel gimmicky however it's totally useless in any situation other than bright day light. The video quality has always been the best in iphones and it holds true for the 7 plus too. However apple seriously needs to introduce stereo sound capture for the video as the audio is just too tinny and lackluster.
  

  So the camera gets a 8.5/10
  

  Coming to performance, the phone scorches all the benchmarks with ease however u will be hard pressed to notice tangible difference between the 6s and this phone in day to day usage. That being said iOS 10.02 is buggy as hell and there are a few stutters and freezes here and there. Also the battery life could be improved. On iOS 10.02 the standby battery drain is quite high and with moderate usage u will get around 7-9 hours of usage with around 32-36 hours of standby.
  

  So performance and battery gets a 8.5/10
  

  Overall this is the best iPhone and the plus is the only iPhone worth considering. It is very close to being the best phone on the market but misses out on that title due to the recycled design. I mean you need to buy the plus in black or jet black for people to know that its the 7 plus and not the 6 or the 6s plus.
  

  Will update the review with further use of the phone
 
 

   READ MORE

Firstly a big shout out to flipkart. The pre-order delivery felt extremely premium.  I didn't expect a bang on "launch day" time delivery and classic packaging.
  

  The iPhone 7 plus is pure class and oozes refinement in every department.  I was skeptical about the screen , but believe me you will spot the difference from a 6s plus screen. That said It's not as best smartphone display but it's right right up there.
  

  Let's dive in
  

  Things you will love
  
  1. Experience- yes the prime reason you buying an apple iPhone is for the experience
  
  2. Lightening fast in everything it does
  
  3. New screen
  
  4. Impressive dual camera's
  
  5. Ultra premium feel in the hand ( I am looking at you, Chinese oems)
  
  6. New home button
  
  7. Haptic's everywhere
  
  8. Speakers
  
  9. Water resistance which is quite close to being actually water proof

  Things you won't love

  2. No "in the box" included wireless option ( if you want to push us to a wireless future, keep part of the package and do not charge us 16000 extra for it - I'm looking at you apple )

  All said and done, you need to remember that this your not just buying a phone but your buying an experience and this as close as it gets to a world class smart phone experience

Ever since my pre-order for the iPhone 7 Plus was done, it had been an eager wait. I was pleasantly surprised when at 7PM on 7th Oct, exactly when Apple started selling the new iPhone in India, I got a call from Flipkart saying that my order would be delivered in the next 3 hours. And they did deliver. I opened the packaging and there was a black box. The box said - This is _______ (You know what it is). And inadvertently I was smiling. Opening it, out came the box and the iPhone. Its been less than a day using the phone, so detailed reviews will come later. But overall it was an experience to remember and cherish!
 
 

   READ MORE

Firstly, Thank You Flipkart for delivering this before hand and that too on Launch Day in just an hour of the launch. While people were standing in long queues to wait for their turn to see if they can get their desiered phones which was doubtful depending on inventory, Flipkart users were lucky ones to definitely get the booked devices sitting comfortably at Home.
  

  Lets get into review now, I will admit that am a hardcore Apple Fan and I use everything Apple. Since user buying this will see lots of reviews & videos online, am going to highlight few best features which am loving since last 12 hrs !
  

  1. Camera - super awesome stuff team Apple. The camera setup is dual lense on iPhone 7 Plus and zoom feature is really very good. 2x works beautifully well and digital zoom till 5x gives good results too. Low light performance have really improved with f/1.8 aperture and I can clearly see difference while comparing pictures on my iPhone 6 / 6S+.
  

  2. Display - Wowwww ! New Retina Display with wide colour gamut. Technically whatever they call it, in simple life I just can say it looks beautiful. I mean my pictures taken earlier on iPhone when seen on display of this new device looks so beautiful. Text looks so crisp on this new display.
  

  3. Speakers - Stereo speakers on iPhone finally. Yea, there's a catch that one speaker is on bottom gril and the earpiece is other so its not front dual speaker but as far as output goes, really really beautiful. It does feel like surround sound. And I am enjoying music and my calls over loud speakers completely.
  

  4. New Home Button - the new solid state home button is not a button in real. It doesn't go down but gives an haptic feedback which makes you feel like its button you pressing just like new MacBook if you would have used it. I liked it a lot cause it feels better than clicking slightly reminding you of old button feel. And its great cause most of us switch to Assistive Touch as to save our button.
  

  5. Design & Color - Okay, I agree Apple has kept same design as iPhone 6's but there's a lot of difference starting from Home Button change to color and weight of the phone. I have been using 6S Plus and I can feel that reduction of few grams in hand while using. Further if you are going with Black or Jet Black, its a truly new experience as the antenna lines are now just invisible. Phone looks really premium and feels great in hand.
  

  6. Headphone Jack - Lastly let me talk about headphone jack, which is become a big deal and people everywhere are talking about it. Its not at all bothering me. I was earlier using JBL Reflect Aware with my 6s+ and what I like about using headphone over lighting is the power you get and the quality of output you receive is awesome. Its just too good ! Also they do provide a converter and it works just as good. I never charge and plug in earphone as I think that's anyway risky to plug something in while its drawing power. So am completely okay about it and will say this wont be an issue as anyway the device has a day long battery life.
  

  7. Performance - 10/10 the new processor handles tasks really well. Yet to try heavy games but so far, phone has been really smooth. I downloaded my backup in just 20 mins with all my apps restored in full. There's no Hisssing in my iPhone so far. Also the wifi is faster on this as compared to my earlier versions.
  

  So overall, I am really happy with device and would recommend it to people who are planning to buy a premium phone. If you want a phone which is great in performance and look, awesome or rather best in Camera and allowed on all flights across world, go for it my friends.
 
 

   READ MORE

column6: Ordered it twice to reach to me
column7:
I had ordered the same phone a week earlier but it got cancelled due to no courier available on my location. After hours and hours of calling to customer  service only one outcome came out of it, that I will have to place another order. The only thing I was promised was the extra quick shipping on my next order that would be charged will be added to my Flipkart Wallet. Now when I have placed another other that I received in a days time, but Flipkart isn't ready to provide me what was promised to me. Saying "there isn't any proof of that in our system". Rs 90 wouldn't make a big difference to me but if Flipkart provides it to me, I will be satisfied that they care for there customers.
  
  Iphone 7plus 128 gb that I ordered is perfectly fine with fully sealed package. Delivery was quick within 30 hrs. Thats the reason i have given 4 stars.. if this incident wouldn't happen this service deserves a 5 star.

column6: Pre-Order on Flipkart and the product - 5 stars
column7:
First of all great job by Flipkart , delivering the product on 7th night itself. You have redefined the term online shopping made easy. As for the phone , it feels great in the hand and is not as slippery as the matte versions.
  
  Yes a cover might be required in the long run but till then the phone is durable enough that all finger prints can be wiped clean.
  
  Overall Awesome experience.
 
 

   READ MORE

I pre ordered the phone and tinny surprise the delivery boy was at my door step sharp at 7 pm. Felt really special and appreciate the service what Flipkart has to offer.
  

  About the phone- well what can I say it's a beauty the jet black version. Just feels so majestic in your hands. Yes it does leave you finger prints all over the back which many may not like. But I have used a transparent cover which helps in showing the beauty of the phone and also protecting it from finger prints. Switching from 16 gb 6s to 128 gb is a good move as you get ample amount of storage and won't have to worry much about space left on your phone. FINAL VERDICT- Go for it as the best quality and service is only offered by Apple
 
 

   READ MORE

Pathetic....Flipkart and this seller is making fool of people who r buying such expensive things online. I had order iPhone 7 128gb in jet black colour and when I received the phone today I was shocked to see that they have delivered a fake product to me. Box is of Jet black colour but inside it was matte black with so many scratches on the handset and the worst part is that this fraud seller & flipkart has got the display replaced to the local one from the original and the colour of the display is 'white' and the phone is not getting on also. There is a gap between the body & the screen because of this local screen which they have replaced. Screws of this iphone are looking used too. Clearly they are doing fraud with the people in a day light. Hand free is also missing from the box & there was not any seal even. I have raised the issue with flipkart customer care now let's see what will they do...I have requested them for a refund, if they don't provide me a refund than for sure I'll take this fraud ahead legally and would file a FIR against both this seller 'supercomnet' & 'flipkart'....so guys please think 1k times before buying some product from flipkart & this seller.
 
 

   READ MORE

Hi,
