First to Flipkart delivery service - Thanks a lot, I received it earlier than promised. I also received a chocolate from you guys, it felt really nice. Multiplied my joys of receiving my new phone.
  

  Now to the iPhone.
  

  Packaging - As always - neat & superior!
  

  The phone - It feels great. I personally chose the iPhone 7 over 7+ because of the size. Moving from iPhone 5 to 7 was absolutely no downer in terms of size, the size suited me well. Specifications wise - still exploring. ;)
  

  What's evidently different - the home button (the number 3 pressure press feels quite weird. Chose number 1 option) and yes of course the no-audio jack. So you do receive wired earphones better known as lightning compatible earphones. The end of your wired earphones connect to the slot of the lightning connector.

column6: This is 7. But doesn't live upto expectations.
column7:
iPhone 7 - 32GB Black
  

  Pros :
  
  - Superfast A10 Processor
  
  - Improved Home button (Haptic Feedback)
  
  - Excellent Low light camera with Image stabilisation
  
  - 32GB Storage from base models
  
  - Improved Stereo sound from speakers
  
  - Great battery life. Almost lasts for a day with a full charge. Significantly better than the predecessor.
  
  - Most importantly, this time it is waterproof.
  

  Cons :
  
  - I had the iPhone 6S (16GB), I haven't noticed much difference and the aesthetics of the phone just feels the same. Not worth upgrading from an iPhone 6 / 6S.
  
  - No headphone jack. Have to insert the adaptor in order to use any external headphones with 3.5mm jack.
  
  - Screen quality is the same.
  

  Verdict : I feel the phone was overhyped while the phone is a very good buy for new iPhone users or anyone upgrading from 5S and below.
 
 

   READ MORE

You Fraud Flipkart
  
  The Iphone displaying in ur app as delivered was never delivered to me. Although it was COD but still you did not fulfill your promise of delivering the phone on Sale Price of 39,999/-
  
  Flipkart is Fraud. Will never order anything from flipkart anymore.
 
 

   READ MORE

It would be presumptuous to not acknowledge that all those who pre-ordered this device, myself included, have done it simply for the allure of the latest iPhone. Even as I say this, I wasnt entirely convinced of the iPhone 7 when I watched the livestream of the Apple Keynote. However, a timely launch in India, less exorbitant pricing and a hefty cashback was what finally swung me in favour of it.
  

  While Apple might have not made much headway in design for 3 generations now, I take some solace in the fact that I got the Black variant which sets it apart from the earlier generations. Having said that, the accumulation of the incremental updates is what makes this a significant step up from the 6s - IP67 protection, cleaning up of antenna lines, camera with better low light performance and OIS, stereo speakers, brighter screen with wider colour gamut, 40% faster quad core CPU, hexa core GPU and the bigger 1960 mAh battery. However, the focus will be more on what has been lost, namely, the headphone jack and the physical Home button. Coming from Android phones with capacitive only buttons, the latter doesn't matter at all, especially since it is now a multi-function button that does a lot more than the physical one. However, I must admit that pressing it felt odd initially and I mistook the vibration as flexing of the case in which my phone was encased. The loss of the former however will not be an easy one. It may have been a courageous move but also a bit impractical. I use a Sony SBH54 Bluetooth headset and the audio quality is still some way off to justify using it all the time. It is even more antagonizing when you have invested a significant amount in purchasing high-end 3.5mm jack headphones. At least, there is the headphone adapter which comes only in white and goes very well (not!) with the Black variant. I guess that is a compromise I have to live with and really hope that Apple has made the Lightning port a lot sturdier. I can somehow accept this decision if indeed, as Apple has stated, it was a price to pay for a larger battery, water resistance and stereo speakers without ruining the dimensions, even though I can accept an additional 2mm of thickness any day. Apart from the device itself, you buy yourself in to a large repertoire of accessories that simply dont exist for other devices.
  

  As far as iOS is concerned, Apple has been more forthright about picking up whats good in others (as has Android) which means a more accelerated rate of iOS progression compared to an approach of deterrence through suing. Also, Apples walled garden now has a pet door with overtures to developers to utilize aspects of iOS that were previously, preciously locked away. iOS also continues to be the platform of choice for innovative app developers who are not simply targeting income through baited ad clicks. Even Google and Microsoft continue to offer an incredible experience on iOS which is inexplicably better than what they offer on their own platform. It is perhaps not contestable that iOS offers the best security, privacy, optimization and consistency of any phone, even though most of it comes from Apples control of every aspect of the device. Also, the exclusivity of the OS has some appeal to it at a time when Android can be experienced on any PC. To sum it up, you cannot go wrong with buying the iPhone, unless you had to take out a mortgage to finance one.
  

  P.S. I received my iPhone at around 8 p.m., about an hour after the launch and really loved the custom packaging. Enjoyed purchasing something from Flipkart after a long time.
 
 

   READ MORE

iPhone 7 was launched at 7 PM IST on October 7 in India. I received an SMS at 7 PM that the delivery boy is out and I will be getting the product. I received my product at 8 PM, within one hour of the launch. With great excitement I open the packing that said priority. Upon opening I found a flipkart exclusive black box designed for iPhone 7. This packing is elegant and a surprise. Kudos to flipkart for the packing and delivery.
  

  Coming to the phone:
  
  1) The colour is elegant. Even though the design is nearly the same except for the 3.5mm earphones jack, the colour is something which makes it different and gorgeous. The touch is awesome and the phone setup is easy.
  
  2) The speakers are louder than the previous versions of the phone. But I am not sure if it is 2 times the sound of previous phones.
  
  3) 4G reception is good. I tried Airtel 4G and Reliance Jio.
  
  4) The camera is good.
  
  5) I absolutely love the customisable home button which gives me feeling that I am pressing a button which is against the feeling of using most android phones.
  
  6) More storage is a delight.
  

  Cons:
  
  1) The battery backup is not great. It is draining quite fast even at minimal YouTube and internet usage with no new apps installed and running in the background.
  
  2) The display satisfies my eyes but it could have been better when it comes to resolution. But I love what I am seeing.
  

  The phone is gorgeously simple. Thanks to flipkart and Apple.
 
 

   READ MORE

This thing is wow!!!!!!!
  
  First of all thanks to flipkart and big billion days.
  
  You people rock everytime.
  
  Always had a good deal with flipkart.
  
  This time they crossed the limits of delivering authenticity as they delivered only in mere 2 days, flipkart is the best online shopping destination.
  
  Great experience!!
  
  Now about the phone
  
  The phone was in excellent condition. Though packed with little bubble wrap which is not up to make for this kind of expensive smart phone but it was ok.
  
  The phone was really good.
  
  The camera, 3d touch, matte black color, new home button was impressive.
  
  Though I noticed that when I got phone and I started using on that very time for almost 4 hrs, it got a heated a little bit. But later on there was no such kind a issue. Do order a cover for it cox it's fingerprint magnet as if it's thirsty for fingerprints.
  
  Battery is as usual typical iPhone battery. Older user will be knowing that. But what's interesting is iPhone is now waterproof and that too under 1m for about 30 mins as claimed by company.
  
  Though its waterproof, everything looks great after we dip it in water but a small very small change is noticed in its speaker. The sound then is a little awkward. Camera is impressive and clear. 3d home button feels to another level. Actually feels something premium in hand.
  
  In the box contents are same as usual the charging adapter and the lightening cable of same length, no change in that. But what's differnt is new lightening earpods. Yaa they now use lightening ports to insert earpods and they do give a lightening to headphone jack 3.0 which makes all headphones compatible with it. But that's really funny to carry adapters for earphones these days and always remain on brim of loosing. Also you can't charge and use the earpods on the same port because there is only single port now for both stuff's.
  

  Final verdict :: IPhone come with this kind of technology you can't customize them. They do what they like and we have to walk with the trend. Moreover the phone feels very permiuim and stuff like waterproof, camera, 3d touch ( which no one uses in India), 3d home button are good

column6: Good phone, comes with it's own pros and cons!
column7:
After the Nokia era, I was a hardcore android user. In fact not exactly a user but a hardcore android promotor.
  

  It's been a month and a half I have switched completely to iOS and now I have my very own list of pros and cons in compare to any android device.
  

  Pros:
  
  1. The touch is as smooth as possible. There are less / no chances that while typing you miss on any alphabet or any icon
  
  2. Processor speed is faster in compare to same configuration in any android. Closing and opening application time is less
  
  3. It hangs (yes it does hang) but occasionally. For instance mine has hanged once in last 1.5 months
  
  4. Screen brightness is better than android. If you browse through FB or watch YouTube, you will get to know the difference
  
  5. Its camera is better for sure if you don't zoom-in the images too much. Good for macro photography
  

  Cons:
  
  1. There is no LED notification feature, so you have to check it to see if you have got any message or WhatsApp
  
  2. You just can't download any PDF file from any website while browsing. You have to take screenshots of it. However, you get the PDF if you receive it through WhatsApp, but then you have to go to that conversation again and again to access that PDF. It doesn't save it in your gallery or in files section
  
  3. Initially you will miss the back button. As there is no back button, you have to use the only button which is given for everything which increases the number of steps to switch to different app or to access any other thing on the device
  
  4. If you have taken your WhatsApp backup on google drive, it will not work here. If your WhatsApp backup is not on iCloud, be ready to loose all your WhatsApp conversations on android
  
  5. iCloud gives you 5 GB of free data, whereas google drive gives you 15 GB of free data (3 times higher). You may sync your images and videos on google photos but for WhatsApp backup, you have to user iCloud and if you exceed the limit of 5 GB, you have to buy the space from Apple on monthly or on annual basis
  

  Conclusion:
  

  Overall, if you have been an android user, I would recommend you to switch to iPhone due to durability. I have seen people using same iPhone for five or more years but I have hardly seen any android user using the same phone for more than 2-3 years.
  

  Also, I was a one plus phones fan (I am still a fan of one plus in android) before switching to iPhone. But after using one plus one for almost two years, it started giving issues like heating, slow, battery used to discharge after frequent intervals etc., so I thought to switch to something where I don't need to move for at least next 4-5 years.
 
 

   READ MORE

This is my first iOS Phone and am very grateful to use such a premium device from Apple. Have already used Microsoft and Android phones before, all I can tell that iPhone 7 Plus is a beautiful experience. It is so simple to use the phone and reportedly the phone has good RAM management for all apps. The camera is out of the world, you can shoot extraordinary photos. I bought this phone when iPhone 8 plus got already released, I bought at an okay price. People deserve to use Apple products, however the prices are pathetic for newer models (iPhone X could cost two kidneys) :v Apple should not forget the people for whom they are today, may be they should consider the price affordable for people.
 
 

   READ MORE

Excellent phone, super smooth, great camera, high quality audio and the wide colour gamut screen definitely packs a punch. Great discount given on Flipkart but the delivery was very slow and Flipkart missed the promised delivery date. 5stars for the product, 3 stars for Flipkart delivery!
 
 

   READ MORE

column6: My Experience with iPhone 7 Plus matte black color
column7:
I had pre-ordered and received iPhone 7 plus 32 gb black. I am a fan of Apple iPhone. First I would like to say about delivery of the product. It was delivered by Flipkart with excellent pack over original apple pack. I had very impressed with beautiful gift pack of Flipkart. My experience was with iPhone 7 plus is amazing. I had used iPhone earlier but it is very very advanced. I had like the camera very much in this new iPhone because of photos are like DSLR standard photos in lowlight and crystal clear distinguishing the colours. Regarding home button is very sensitive and liked very much. Regarding speed A10 chip is very fast. The brightness of the phone is amazing. The first facing camera for selfies is impressive. The calling voice over 4G is very good. The battery is not exhausted much on 4G browning and the browsing is very fast. Regarding new colour I.e. Matte black is "WOW feel". The overall performance of iPhone is very good in terms of camera, speed, design/look and colour. I am very much impressed with specification of dust and water resistant. I had synced the data from mac to iPhone.The data was transferred very fast. I also much impressed with live wall papers.The price is high but worth it for features given by apple and thanks to apple for awesome product.The touch sensitivity and feel of iPhone features of IOS 10.0.3 is awesome. I recommend apple fans to go for this iPhone 7 plus with new color matte black. I am feeling now why I should not purchased 128 GB ? Because we need more space for Photos and videos. My recommendation is one should go for 128 GB at least instead of 32 GB. Finally thanks to Flipkart for good delivery with gift pack. My feeling is iPhone 7 plus is one of best iPhone in current period.
 
 

   READ MORE

column6: Best Smartphone in the Market period.
column7:
Design
  

  This is the best looking iPhone yet in my mind. First off the antenna lines on the rear of the phone are moved more to the top and bottom of the phone and blend in more than they did on the iPhone 6/6S. Even better, if you have the black or jet black versions, they dont really show up at all. Overall, it looks similar to the 6/6S, but feels like the final, evolved version of the design. The size feels great and overall, it is just a beautiful phone.
  

  Camera
  

  The rear camera is stronger than ever on the iPhone 7. It has an improved 12MP camera that takes excellent pictures. The regular version of the iPhone finally has OIS (optical image stabilization) just like its big brothers, the Plus series. The pictures it takes are clear, capture a great amount of light, and due to the OIS, rarely come out blurry. The camera loads lightning fast and is overall just a spectacular camera.
  

  The front camera also took another bump up to 7MP. The combination of the improved resolution, consistent retina flash (front flash), and speed are excellent on the front camera. I still wish it had a wider field of vision, but other than that, I have no complaints about the front camera.
  

  Display
  

  The Retina display is the same as it has been since the iPhone 4. 326 pixels per inch is a good looking display. It certainly does not compete with some other phones and their higher resolution screens, but for now, the screen still gets the job done. I would like to see them improve this in the next installment, but it is still a pleasing screen to view at 4.7 inches.
  

  The brightness is outstanding and it also drops very low too, which is a benefit if you are trying to read something in a dark room. According to Apple the brightness is better than ever, but I have not noticed any discernible difference in that area.
  

  Audio
  

  The audio is excellent. It finally has stereo speakers where sound comes out the bottom right speaker grill and the top speaker on the front of the screen. Having stereo speakers, along with a front facing one makes such a difference when listening to music or watching a video. It sounds great and just makes the listening experience so much more enjoyable. This is certainly one of the biggest improvement areas over last year. Also, in terms of the big headphone jack controversy, it does actually come with a lightning to 3.5mm converter, so you can still use headphones with it.
  

  Battery
  

  Battery life has improved over the 6S and SE. On daily use, I have gotten a couple more hours of use per day. I would still welcome faster charging options, but this is a nice step up from previous generations. It has increased to 1,960 mAh battery which makes a difference.
  

  Functionality
  

  This is the pinnacle of the IOS software experience. The 2GB of RAM, the A10 processor, and the implementation of IOS 10 is great. Everything runs well and quickly. Also, the fact that the storage sizes have all doubled to 32GB, 128GB, and 256GB is fantastic, as 16GB is a very antiquated notion. Expandable storage would be welcome, but due to how IOS is more locked down and for monetary reasons, I understand why that wont most likely be a feature in the near future.
 
 

   READ MORE

It is my first experience with an iPhone, but am not satisfied fully for the money I spent, previously I was using Xperia Z(4 yrs*) it works still without any major issues the performance I got from one of the premium brand forced me to go for Apple.
  

  iPhone 7 plus Pros:
  
  Battery :- I loved the way it performs far better than my old
  
  Camera:- I told my previous mobile was Sony, so it's just ok, other than slow motion video and depths effect
  
  Siri :- Siri and me are great friends XD
  
  Heating :- common issue nowadays with all smart phones but comparing to Xperia it's very less
  

  Cons:-
  
  Big screen size :- difficult to handle
  
  Design :- black iPhone with cover makes it looks like some cheap phones.
  
  Resolution :- not impressed, my last phone resolution was same but still am not feeling that I gets from Sony
  

  Conclusion:- Yes! The phone is bit over priced
  
  With lots of restrictions. Two rear cameras are useful only for one photo mode.

In 7days the volume button got stuck, Flipkart has denied the replacement (even if it is under 10days replacement policy); according to the customer service they will take back only defective piece; so defective piece means a "broken piece" for Flipkart.
  

  There will be always "trap" when you go for  huge discounts; I believe in this 10yr celebration sale they have pushed all damaged/slightly damaged pieces and blaming the manufacturer.
  

  Just reading reviews about this seller they got huge negative reviews and they got "Flipkart Assured" badge as well. Awesome Flipkart; no quality check.
  

  Lost the trust on Flipkart and this will be the last buy from my side & my family.
  

  Tip: if you want peace of mind then hit the next local store and spend 9-10K extra (talking about online discounts), it's actually worth because according to me heading to Apple Care and wait for another 1week to get a replacement is not making any sense.
  

  Rest assured FlipKart customer care is the worst one who left always without answers. Sellers and Flipkart can be playing a lobby as well.
  

  Well; Flipkart 10 year sale forced me to be a non customer for life long.
  

  Thanks

  - Certain small tweaks are absent which were important. For eg Call recording and Vibration alert when the call is connected so u have to stick it to your ears.
  
  -No fast charging.
  
  -Can't access all the files.
  
  As an Android user I could store any type of file on my phone. .rar .zip .exe any format of file could me stored and accessed when ever needed.
  
  But on an I phone u can Store and Access only Pics Mp3s Videos Pdfs and other .doc files. Other than that u can't access all other file types from files from a file manger.
  
  - Has an Higher level of SAR as compared to other smart phones.

I was a bit skeptical before ordering an iphone online because i have seen many negative reviews about people getting damaged products or fake products. So i sent a mail as a pre-order enquiry to Flipkart. They have assured me that i will be receiving a genuine product. So i just ordered an iphone 6s 32gb and i received it today. I request buyers to make a video while unboxing the product so that they would have a proof if the product turns out to be fake. I got an original product from Flipkart and im thankful to them for that and for making it available at such a low price compared to retail market.
  

  Now coming to the phone itself, what can i say.... its an iphone after all l. No company can match apple's build quality and after sales support.
  
  Everything is great about this mini beast. The one thing that attracted me towards this phone is its form factor. It feels great in hand.
  
  Camera is great.... ram management is superb..... display is comparable to other Android flagships but will not match amoled screens..... the storage u get out of the box is around 22gb so keep that in mind.... havent installed any high end games yet but im sure that it can run any game smoothly as i have seen in all the reviews.
  
  Switching from Android to ios is a bit of a hassle. I have been an Android user for the past 4 years and i think that if u want ios like optimization then only Google's nexus and currently pixel devices offer that. But i didnt get a pixel because the after sales service is poor. Hopefully the next pixel comes with collaboration of LG rather than HTC.
  

  In this price range there are only 2 good devices and they are oneplus 5 and iphone 6s.
  
  If u want a larger screen then go for oneplus5 or else i would recommend iphone 6s... it is a great device overall and im loving every bit of using it.
  

  Just go for it u won't regret ur choice!!!

column6: Still one of the greatest phone by Apple.
column7:
First of all, great service by Flipkart for delivering it in just one day. Well the iphone 6s is a remarkable smartphone by apple. Was introduced in 2015 but still outperforms many flagships of this year too.
  
  Now coming to Pros:
  
  1. Performance: No lag at all. Use any application and it just flows easily.
  
  2. IOS: Sweet, simple and intuitive. Great animations and great user interface.
  
  3. Camera: Iphone is still one of the fastest pic capturing camera in any light. Flawless pics in any light source.
  

  Now coming to some cons:
  
  1. Less functionalities: IOS has some user restrictions like no external downloading from internet. Still some apps can be used. Music can be downloaded via wynk music or savnn but can't be just added from computer. You got to use itunes for that which is a bit lenghty process.
  
  2.Battery: Some might say battery life of iphone is very less but for my use it is just enough for the day.
  
  3.Other features like Dual sim and microsd slot are missing.
  
  Overall a great phone to buy if you have to use for a year or more and you are ok with one sim only.

column6: Old Flagship or new mid ranger ???
column7:
I have got it via an excellent deal in Flipkart in recent days but does it worth in late 2017 read out my review to know that.
  
  As you can get a good mid ranger from Android at the same price point I have pitted it again them and let you decide-
  
  1-Performance is above average as par with new midrangers from Android but iPhone is constant and reliable.
  
  2- camera is still good enough but lacks portrait mode as per the recent generation even some mid rangers have good portrait cameras think of this before you buy.Low light performance is however excellent in iPhone.
  
  3- as per the recent standards the battery life is average I would say does not compete even with Android midrangers.
  
  4- I have some issues with fingerprint sensor (touch id) even some mid rangers have better sensors than this.
  
  5-when it comes to updates and security there is no match definitely it's a winner.
  
  6-selfie camera is good and even better than competition.
  
  7-built and form factor is best in class there is no competition in this regard.
  
  8-speaker and audio output is excellent even via headphones Jack so no competition here.
  
  8-its single Sim phone do note that before you buy !!!
  
  So I think you should now be clear enough to take a decision before you buy. But wait for a excellent deal then only go for it.
 
 

   READ MORE

column6: Average Phone with hang issue on high price..
column7:
Hallo All, I have bought this phone from Flipkart with a big hope and making a royal image that I am buying Apple IPhone 6s. I am a first user. Delivery from Flipkart is good. Few points I want to clear here -
  

  1. Battery back is average. Not good. It's 1750mah battery.
  

  2. I am feeling now that my phone is being hang some times after 15 days use. Going to Apple service care to meet them.
  

  3. It's head phone is malfunctioning some time. Have to visit for that also.
  

  4. Being a first user of IPhone, was having a big brand and quality image. But this is average, some time I feel that I have spent much more for apple, I can buy some other good Android phones in half of its current price.
  

  5. Some software issue also, about transfering the pics from IPhone to my laptop.
  

  Summary - average phone with a big brand name.

column6: A power packed phone with no power lasting capacit
column7:
After a long usage for about 4 months i am writing this review. The name iphone itself is a brand . which means no other phone will be on par with this. As u might have read many reviews by now i just want to give one and only one major review point i.e, CHARGING.
  
  Iphone 6s charging - it really sucks you. you need to charge it definitely for 2 to 3 times a day. With the update of ios 11 it screws much deeper, making me to charge the phone 3 times a day in normal usage with out playing games with regular wifi on.
  
  I simply say this 6S as a beast with no life expectancy. if you are annoyed of charging for 2 to 3 times a day u definitely dont go for it. instead go for 7 its far better than this. And one more update till now i heard that iphones wont hang , but my phone hung for once after the ios11 update may be i think its due to ios 11(i felt like throwing the phone from 2 nd floor when it hanged) .

column6: Just go for it if price is not an issue!
column7:
Probably the best smartphone available next to iphone 7/7+ right now!
  
  Performance wise... not much difference between 6s and the 7.
  
  Brilliant and buttery smooth UI.
  
  One of the best smartphone cameras in the market as of now.
  
  Good battery back-up due to Apple's brilliantly optimised iOS.
  
  Crystal clear display (even if it's not qHD).
  
  One of the fastest fingerprint reader on a smartphone.
  
  Has far more to offer than android devices and the most important factor- seamless updates across all Apple devices at once.
  
  Overall, the best smarphone i have used till date!
  
  The only downside was the lack of external card slot which is not much of a problem if you buy the 64gb variant or the higher ones.
 
 

   READ MORE

I got iPhone 6s 32 GB space grey for Rs 40,560/- in exchange of redmi 2 (Rs 4150/-) and other cashback offer. Secondly, I purchased this handset on interest free EMI. The tag price for this handset was Rs 48000/- on flipkart and Rs 50000/- in istore. This was the best price I got for this handset. And in the process I got rid of redmi2 which I purchased for 5000/- a year and half back.
  
  Flipkart shipped the handset before  a day before stipulated time, the courier boy confirmed EMIE no. thoroughly and after getting convinced handed over iPhone.
  
  This was my first iPhone and I am really mesmerised by its overall quality. Quality is reflected in all the departments.
  
  It took a while to get acquainted with the OS. The logo carries lot of weightage and is a head turner.
  
  Thanks deep down my heart to flipkart.

column6: No 10 days replacement if your phone has any issues!!
column7:
Received a phone which has got a lot of heating issues. Requested for a replacement within 2 days, but Flipkart denied it.
  
  As per Flipkart, for Apple products they are not liable to any kind of refund or replacement for any issues, they simply tell you to visit the nearest apple service centre. They have carefully worded this, in their terms and conditions section, beside the 10 days replacement sign.
  
  It is really disappointing to pay so much and get a flawed phone.
  
  If you are buying from Flipkart and get a good piece, lucky you. But if you get a phone with issues, Flipkart will not help you. You have been warned!!
 
 

   READ MORE

column6: Replacement policy is Fake. It's a myth
column7:
Bought this 32gb last week and after 3 days of use found out almost handful of issues with my device. Headphone jacks of my device are faulty and when I receive a call with headphones it makes an irritating sound and we cant answer calls. There are many issues related to phone speaker while answering calls. When contacted with Flipkart customer care, there came the most horrifying reply from them that they will not replace the device and instead asked me to go to authorised showroom as only they can help me.
  
  Thankfully Apex people were good enough to help me out by repairing the phone . But this was the first bad experience for me with Flipkart and it was so bad that I'm not using Flipkart again.

column6: Worth a buy even being pricy !
column7:
Finally, after using Google Nexus 4 for 4 years I moved to Apple iPhone7 and I am totally happy with it.
  
  It gives that premium feel and with seamless apple feature list, the phone is really easy to handle.
  
  I won't go into deep comparison between Android and iOS as currently it's a matter of choice which operating system you prefer and what brand is your comfort zone.
  

  iPhone 7 is worth a buy even being pricy.
 
 

   READ MORE

First iPhone this. And i am loving it. I am using it for last 6 months. No complaints. I used Asus zenfone 5 before this. Thats a good phone as well with a lot of ui customization options. But i am not missing any of it with iPhone. The default iOs ui is so sleek and fast and sauve who needs customisation. It reduces the unnecessary chore of playing around with your ui. I also have a series 2 watch. With that combination i could have not asked for better. Supet awesome user experience. Just go for it.

column6: Upgraded from the iPhone 6 to iphone 7
column7:
Firstly flipkart did a good job on delivering the phone on next day. Overall iPhone 7 is a nice upgrade from iPhone 6 as I got 3D touch, Live photos, better camera, aA10  processor, Stereo speakers and it's water proof.
  
  Working very fast, good battery life, excellent touch experience on taptic engine.
  
  But in normal usage phone gets over heating when using camera internet browsing & chatting phone gets very very heat.
 
 

   READ MORE

Pros
  
  1) elegant design
  
  2) rose gold is simply superb
  
  3) stereo speakers--i must say it's the loudest iPhone i ever used
  
  4)call quality 10/10
  
  5) Signal reception excellent
  
  6) Battery life needs to be tested. Because its only few hours since i am using it. But battery drain is too slow. So i am sure battery life will also be very good.
  
  7)Performance wise it's a beast. very much impressed
  
  8) Memory starts now at 32gb!!! Sigh of relief
  
  9)water proofing---dint test it
  
  10) Camera 9/10 --- s7 and Google pixel has better camera. Will test it soon.
  

  Cons
  
  1) i miss home button. because the fingerprint sensor is embedded in the display and won't get a natural feeling of using home button
  
  2) lack of audio jack.
  

  Lastly i want to thank flipkart for delivering the phone on 7th October 2016. Thanks a lot. Overall very happy with iPhone 7.
 
 

   READ MORE

Excellent product. Though used for only about 10 days,  Pros and Cons as per my experience
  

  Pros
  
  1) Used couple of other brands like Samsung, Honor BUT the touch of iPhone is superior than both of them.
  
  2) Migration from Android to iOS was smooth. Clear Instructions.
  
  3) Liked the external switch for 'Silent' mode..Very convenient in office.
  

  Cons
  
  1) Apple Id stores the card details, Which would mean I would have less/no control on PAID apps being downloaded.
  
  (This has happened earlier and Mobile Service provider charged me .. Pathetic..)
  
  2) Battery backup is less.. Phone gets discharged in a day ( with Full charge and moderate usage). May be my expectation was high.

column6: Not eligible for Single Star.Never buy anything frm flipkart
column7:
I ordered iPhone 6s from Flipkart on the 22nd May from seller SuperComNet and got the phone on 23rd May. After using the phone only just for 1 day, volume up and ring/silent buttons stop working properly.I tried exchanging the phone but I was told by flipkart that exchanging is not applicable which is very disturbing to me.They told me to contact the Authorized Apple store. I contacted the Authorized Apple service store Unicorn Solutions Pvt Ltd, DLF CyberHub Gurugram for repairing/replacing it as there is no replace policy for Iphone on the Flipkart . Service store while checking the internal inspection, found Iphone liquid damage. As per their guidelines, they didn't cover it under warranty.They are asking me to replace the device under exchange price of 23200/-. I was very shocked to hear this. One contacting again with Flipkart, they said me that quality checked was done by the Flipkart at Box level and they can't replace it and you have to take the paid service from the Apple service store. How anyone in this world can do the quality check without open the box.I don't know whether they did the quality check or not, but they sold me the damage/re fabricated phone. It looks like it become they business model to sell the damage or re fabricated phone to customer to ear more and more profit.The 10 day replacement guarantee is a BIG FAT LIE. The Amazing Flipkart doesn't even care about customers. Never buy anything from here.They are selling refurnished phone. Its really very hard to believe Flipkart is doing such type of cheap things to earn more profit.Purchasing the Iphone from Flikart now become the mental trauma to me. I recommend all people, please don't any product from Flipkart.They are not honest to their customer anymore. They are not trusted e-commerce site anymore.I have lost my hard earned money to Flipkart.
 
 

   READ MORE

I bought iPhone 6S from Flipkart based on my past experience with Flipkart. But to my utter surprise the product delivered was faulty. There are pixel burns in the screen, it is very much visible while scrolling a page. I never imagined such negligence from Flipkart. There is no quality control at all.

column6: It's Good, Better Wait For iPhone 7 Prices To Fall
column7:
I bought this during big billion days. Actually I own iPhone 5s and some other apple products also but I can tell that the finish of anodized aluminum on the product I received is not the same as on other apple products I own. Maybe this issue is particular to the handset I received. I even verified it on Apple Verify and product is genuine. I really miss that slippery feel on iPhone back. In this one, even those cuts which house Apple logo have some burs and sharp feeling.
  

  Except above issue, the phone runs fantastic. Best part is battery backup. With ios 11, cellular data toggle in control center, I can easily use it for 1.5 days. Camera is good but as compared to iPhone 5s, I don't experience that kind of upgrade, may be iPhone 7 is better upgrade with even wider aperture and OIS.
  

  For my issue, I called flipkart, but I got to know that Flipkart replaces iPhone only if it is damaged. For other issues, I should visit Apple Store.
 
 

   READ MORE

Great phone with good camera, nice battery backup especially standby backup, which is a life saver when you need to preserve battery for almost 2 days. Android is poor at this. If I sparingly use the phone, I can go upto third day with as much as 25% battery. Screen size is perfect. I bought this phone mostly for its screen size only. Small size makes it strong and sturdy too. Sound quality is awesome, call quality is good too. There is a little issue though, when sometimes other person at call gets very feeble voice, which warrants speaking directly into the speaker. This is a big letdown, otherwise call quality is good. It is easy to use, but you have to be aware of iOS ecosystem. Nice investment if you want a nice and dependable phone which will go long. Put your primary SIM in this phone and be relaxed. But most important reason I love having this phone is because I have another android phone, which is used when I require to do some technical work, as most of the real world things are not possible to be done with iOS, like sharing music or downloading a filetype thats not known to apple, like rar or zip. So I dont need this phone for use as mini PC, rather as a calling phone that is only as much smart as apple wants.
 
 

   READ MORE

its been 3 weeks since i got my iPhone SE, one word - EXCELLENT, beyond Expectations.
  

  PRO's
  
  -> Fantastic battery Life, upto 16+ hours with 3G data always ON, and above 19 hours with Wifi.
  
  -> Superb photos, compared this camera with OnePlus 5 and trust me, it beats OnePlus 5, I got crispy photos, and my friend who has OnePlus 5 got jealous. :P
  
  -> extremely comfortable, can use it with hand without any issues and irritation. texting is great experience with 1 hand.
  
  -> CPU and performance - its a beast, playing Asphalt 8 by listening to songs in SAAVN without any lag, and replying to whatsapp texts via notifications.
  

  CON's
  
  -> I dont see any cons as long as am happy with 4 inch display.
  
  -> If i really need to say something in this section, then it will be its Front camera, 1.2 MP front camera is very bad. not good selfies, but usefull for Skype.
  

  Fantastic phone , I got this in diwali festival. Thanks Flipkart. one of the best phones available out there.

Well, what can I say... iPhone is awesome as expected. Added the prompt delivery from Flipkart with great packaging. Truly satisfied...

Received Iphone 7 on the very same day when it was launched.
  
  Thank you Flipkart for super super fast delivery and an excellent packing of Iphone 7.
  

  Recently switched from android to IOS. So my review will be based on that.
  
  Pros :
  
  Performance: which is really amazing and that what it makes it worth for as compared to other phones apart from looks, light weight etc.
  
  While playing high end graphics game, the phone do get little bit heat up however as compared to android  you will not observe too much of power drainage and also it  cools down very quickly.
  
  Played two three high end graphics game alternatively/ switching alternatively and i didn`t saw any lag.

I highly recommend this phone if you have the buck!!
  
  However some issues seen by me which could get addressed with software updates.
  
  1. Face ID does not work properly in direct sunlight. And few times acted wonky. So not perfect like Touch ID.
  
  2. RAM management is little bad compared to earlier iPhones on iOS 11.1.
  
  3. True Tone makes the display more warm / yellow for this phone. Looks better without it.
  
  4. Dont quite like the control center gesture position.
  
  5. Provided charger is not a fast charger. This is a bummer by Apple
  
  6. Glass on front and back could be risky if not handled properly.
  
  7. Very Costly for a piece of tech whose value deteriorates over time.
  

  Whats nice:
  
  1. Good and big screen.
  
  2. Speaker Sound is loud enough for a mobile
  
  3. Wireless capability (only its too slow to charge)
  
  4. Fast charging via MacBook Pro charger
  
  5. India unlocked unit is based on a Qualcomm chipset which makes it a universal phone
  
  6. Good looks and nice to hold. Not too large like iPhone Plus models.
  
  7. Good cameras

column6: Early Impressions of World's Most Awaited Device - iPhone X
column7:
Okay, so here it is... iPhone X (it's 10 - TEN and not 'Ex' or 'X'). Before I jump to iPhone X, let me quickly comment on Flipkart's service. They delivered before the date committed (6th Nov was scheduled date whereas product received on 5th Nov itself). While delivery was scheduled for 6th Nov, fans/early adopters do expect launch day delivery and thus it would be appreciated if Flipkart can plan the same accordingly to reach all the pre-order on launch day or a day later than 2 days+. Also, the customer care team is trained to give you rhetorical answers and that can be improved.
  

  Alright, coming back to business, iPhone X is definitely a few years ahead of the competition. The Face ID is so damn good, accurate and reliable. Works like magic. The front notch doesn't bother me and new gestures become familiar in just a few hrs as the base of iOS remains same. The camera is so damn good, that people would want you to click their pictures to be used for display pics on social media. The Design is amazing and feels premium. The glass and steel just combine edge to edge to give you a singular unibody design. Super Retina Display is so damn amazing, the contrast ratio is far far far better than previous iPhone and the black is so deep that it gives you color perfection while looking at it. Am still getting used to the True Tone display, however, you do have a facility to turn the same off. The Processor is so fast, you don't even have to wait for apps to load anymore. Even last year's iPhone (7 series) feels slower in front of A11 Bionic Processor.
  

  Am keeping this really short. If you want it, can afford it, just go for it, cause you don't know if there is a better tomorrow. If you have any other queries or questions and need specific answers, do drop me a note on my twitter @purav_mehta
 
 

   READ MORE

column6: iPhone X Show completely satisfied the fans
column7:
1. Excellent display and I never saw this kind of display quality in any other Mobiles. The display itself phone
  
  2. The FaceID functionality is nice and the way it deals with the notifications is excellent. Notifications will be shown only if  it identifies ur face. Apple didnt tell much about this in their demos. But this is an excellent feature.
  
  3.Battery backup is decent and it will be further improved with the future software updates.
  
  4. Excellent camera and sometimes u will get a feeling that the photos and videos taken from this camera will match the DSLR standards.
  
  5. I thought the top notch in the display will be a problem while viewing the content but in reality it was not the case and I didnt feel that while watching the videos as well. Very minimal
  
  6. Also I thought that screen will be much smaller but because of the full edge to edge display I never got that feeling and infact I am seeing more content on my display and which is excellent.

column6: Finally a refreshed iPhone experience in years!!
column7:
The phone reached me as promised on the launch day by flipkart. So full marks to flipkart for speedy delivery.
  

  As far as the phone is concerned, I would say its a great phone. I have been an iPhone user since the time of iPhone 4 and have bought every iPhone since then. This time Apple has bought something new as compared to the iPhones in the past.
  
  The iterations of iPhones were becoming boring and no revolutionary feature was being added by the company, iPhone X definitely changes it. So its  not a boring iPhone like the other ones.
  

  Starting with my experience:
  

  The display is the main highlight here. Its sharp and gorgeous to look at. You will definitely be happy with it. The chin on top is unnoticeable after few minutes of using the phone.
  

  The battery life is insane. Heavy users can expect a full day battery and for light users, it can last upto 2 days! Its  Definitely better than iPhone 8 plus for that matter.
  

  FaceId also works really well and I dont miss the TouchId.
  

  Performance is brisk without any lag as expected. No issues there
  

  Camera performance is also great, especially the new studio light effects and front camera portrait mode feature! I would say you wont Be disappointed from the camera of this phone. Although its similar to the camera of iPhone 8 plus upto a large extent.
  

  Finally to conclude in brief, overall iPhone X is a great phone. The only issue is: Price of the phone is on a higher side which could have been much less in my opinion(compared to the pricing in other countries). Otherwise its the phone to buy, instead of the iPhone 8 or 8 plus if you want to upgrade from older iPhones or if you just dont want a boring old iPhone platform. I think it is worth it over the iPhone 8 plus at least.
  
  I hope this short review helps you in deciding your purchase of this device. Cheers!!
  
  P.S: Go for the silver colour. I think it pops more. Grey looks more generic and unrecognisable as a iPhone X.. xD
 
 

   READ MORE

column6: Finally a refreshed iPhone experience in years!!
column7:
The phone reached me as promised on the launch day by flipkart. So full marks to flipkart for speedy delivery.
  

  As far as the phone is concerned, I would say its a great phone. I have been an iPhone user since the time of iPhone 4 and have bought every iPhone since then. This time Apple has bought something new as compared to the iPhones in the past.
  
  The iterations of iPhones were becoming boring and no revolutionary feature was being added by the company, iPhone X definitely changes it. So its  not a boring iPhone like the other ones.
  

  Starting with my experience:
  

  The display is the main highlight here. Its sharp and gorgeous to look at. You will definitely be happy with it. The chin on top is unnoticeable after few minutes of using the phone.
  

  The battery life is insane. Heavy users can expect a full day battery and for light users, it can last upto 2 days! Its  Definitely better than iPhone 8 plus for that matter.
  

  FaceId also works really well and I dont miss the TouchId.
  

  Performance is brisk without any lag as expected. No issues there
  

  Camera performance is also great, especially the new studio light effects and front camera portrait mode feature! I would say you wont Be disappointed from the camera of this phone. Although its similar to the camera of iPhone 8 plus upto a large extent.
  

  Finally to conclude in brief, overall iPhone X is a great phone. The only issue is: Price of the phone is on a higher side which could have been much less in my opinion(compared to the pricing in other countries). Otherwise its the phone to buy, instead of the iPhone 8 or 8 plus if you want to upgrade from older iPhones or if you just dont want a boring old iPhone platform. I think it is worth it over the iPhone 8 plus at least.
  
  I hope this short review helps you in deciding your purchase of this device. Cheers!!
  
  P.S: Go for the silver colour. I think it pops more. Grey looks more generic and unrecognisable as a iPhone X.. xD
 
 

   READ MORE

column6: Early Impressions of World's Most Awaited Device - iPhone X
column7:
Okay, so here it is... iPhone X (it's 10 - TEN and not 'Ex' or 'X'). Before I jump to iPhone X, let me quickly comment on Flipkart's service. They delivered before the date committed (6th Nov was scheduled date whereas product received on 5th Nov itself). While delivery was scheduled for 6th Nov, fans/early adopters do expect launch day delivery and thus it would be appreciated if Flipkart can plan the same accordingly to reach all the pre-order on launch day or a day later than 2 days+. Also, the customer care team is trained to give you rhetorical answers and that can be improved.
  

  Alright, coming back to business, iPhone X is definitely a few years ahead of the competition. The Face ID is so damn good, accurate and reliable. Works like magic. The front notch doesn't bother me and new gestures become familiar in just a few hrs as the base of iOS remains same. The camera is so damn good, that people would want you to click their pictures to be used for display pics on social media. The Design is amazing and feels premium. The glass and steel just combine edge to edge to give you a singular unibody design. Super Retina Display is so damn amazing, the contrast ratio is far far far better than previous iPhone and the black is so deep that it gives you color perfection while looking at it. Am still getting used to the True Tone display, however, you do have a facility to turn the same off. The Processor is so fast, you don't even have to wait for apps to load anymore. Even last year's iPhone (7 series) feels slower in front of A11 Bionic Processor.
  

  Am keeping this really short. If you want it, can afford it, just go for it, cause you don't know if there is a better tomorrow. If you have any other queries or questions and need specific answers, do drop me a note on my twitter @purav_mehta
 
 

   READ MORE

I highly recommend this phone if you have the buck!!
  
  However some issues seen by me which could get addressed with software updates.
  
  1. Face ID does not work properly in direct sunlight. And few times acted wonky. So not perfect like Touch ID.
  
  2. RAM management is little bad compared to earlier iPhones on iOS 11.1.
  
  3. True Tone makes the display more warm / yellow for this phone. Looks better without it.
  
  4. Dont quite like the control center gesture position.
  
  5. Provided charger is not a fast charger. This is a bummer by Apple
  
  6. Glass on front and back could be risky if not handled properly.
  
  7. Very Costly for a piece of tech whose value deteriorates over time.
  

  Whats nice:
  
  1. Good and big screen.
  
  2. Speaker Sound is loud enough for a mobile
  
  3. Wireless capability (only its too slow to charge)
  
  4. Fast charging via MacBook Pro charger
  
  5. India unlocked unit is based on a Qualcomm chipset which makes it a universal phone
  
  6. Good looks and nice to hold. Not too large like iPhone Plus models.
  
  7. Good cameras

column6: Early Impressions of World's Most Awaited Device - iPhone X
column7:
Okay, so here it is... iPhone X (it's 10 - TEN and not 'Ex' or 'X'). Before I jump to iPhone X, let me quickly comment on Flipkart's service. They delivered before the date committed (6th Nov was scheduled date whereas product received on 5th Nov itself). While delivery was scheduled for 6th Nov, fans/early adopters do expect launch day delivery and thus it would be appreciated if Flipkart can plan the same accordingly to reach all the pre-order on launch day or a day later than 2 days+. Also, the customer care team is trained to give you rhetorical answers and that can be improved.
  

  Alright, coming back to business, iPhone X is definitely a few years ahead of the competition. The Face ID is so damn good, accurate and reliable. Works like magic. The front notch doesn't bother me and new gestures become familiar in just a few hrs as the base of iOS remains same. The camera is so damn good, that people would want you to click their pictures to be used for display pics on social media. The Design is amazing and feels premium. The glass and steel just combine edge to edge to give you a singular unibody design. Super Retina Display is so damn amazing, the contrast ratio is far far far better than previous iPhone and the black is so deep that it gives you color perfection while looking at it. Am still getting used to the True Tone display, however, you do have a facility to turn the same off. The Processor is so fast, you don't even have to wait for apps to load anymore. Even last year's iPhone (7 series) feels slower in front of A11 Bionic Processor.
  

  Am keeping this really short. If you want it, can afford it, just go for it, cause you don't know if there is a better tomorrow. If you have any other queries or questions and need specific answers, do drop me a note on my twitter @purav_mehta
 
 

   READ MORE

column6: iPhone X Show completely satisfied the fans
column7:
1. Excellent display and I never saw this kind of display quality in any other Mobiles. The display itself phone

column6: Finally a refreshed iPhone experience in years!!
column7:
The phone reached me as promised on the launch day by flipkart. So full marks to flipkart for speedy delivery.
  

  As far as the phone is concerned, I would say its a great phone. I have been an iPhone user since the time of iPhone 4 and have bought every iPhone since then. This time Apple has bought something new as compared to the iPhones in the past.
  
  The iterations of iPhones were becoming boring and no revolutionary feature was being added by the company, iPhone X definitely changes it. So its  not a boring iPhone like the other ones.
  

  Starting with my experience:
  

  The display is the main highlight here. Its sharp and gorgeous to look at. You will definitely be happy with it. The chin on top is unnoticeable after few minutes of using the phone.
  

  The battery life is insane. Heavy users can expect a full day battery and for light users, it can last upto 2 days! Its  Definitely better than iPhone 8 plus for that matter.
  

  FaceId also works really well and I dont miss the TouchId.
  

  Performance is brisk without any lag as expected. No issues there
  

  Camera performance is also great, especially the new studio light effects and front camera portrait mode feature! I would say you wont Be disappointed from the camera of this phone. Although its similar to the camera of iPhone 8 plus upto a large extent.
  

  Finally to conclude in brief, overall iPhone X is a great phone. The only issue is: Price of the phone is on a higher side which could have been much less in my opinion(compared to the pricing in other countries). Otherwise its the phone to buy, instead of the iPhone 8 or 8 plus if you want to upgrade from older iPhones or if you just dont want a boring old iPhone platform. I think it is worth it over the iPhone 8 plus at least.
  
  I hope this short review helps you in deciding your purchase of this device. Cheers!!
  
  P.S: Go for the silver colour. I think it pops more. Grey looks more generic and unrecognisable as a iPhone X.. xD

I am the 1st Desi in Pune to hold iphone 8 Plus.
  

  If anyone is interested to know how the 8 Plus performs compared to the iphone 7.
  

  Camera is a little better and you notice it for sure. It is a lot better in low lights conditions.
  

  SPEED, I was using a 7 and I notice a much snappier Safari and iMessage screens. Part of it may be IOS 11 but pages pop really fast. It is way faster than the original 7.
  

  Gold (Pink-gold) looks awesome!!! But is so slick. There are no lines and it looks like a solid 1 piece product. Most people will use a case which hides the back anyway so maybe color is not that important. Mainly if you want a white front or black.
  

  Any case with a large camera cutout like the CM4 wallet case works with the 8. But most likely all other will not. But I promise you this phone is slippery when dry!!
  

  Overall I love it! Fastest & best device that I have ever used. I can out type the 7 sometimes on reviews but thiamine keep up no problem.
  
  56 gb is perfect in size for most everyone. Hardcore photo and video people may want the 256gb.
  

  The adapter sounds fine with my expensive headphones. It's not really that large either. The lightning headphones sound really good to me. I tested the same song with the same headphone using a 7 and the 8 with the adapter and I cannot tell the difference. In some ways the 8 with the adapter sounded cleaner and had a little less aliasing hiss from the analog to digital conversion process. So beside have a little while cable sticking out I think the 8 audio is fine.
  

  IPhone 4,5, 5s, SE, 6 and 6s users will feel a huge speed increase. The 7 is not far off speed wise but it is noticeable to me.
  

  No matter how you split up the payment or go with a upgrade contract price, you'll pay full price for any of the phones. It is all just creative math by the vendors. I bought mine outright and got point on my credit card, enough to reduce my price by INR 6092 pm for whole 1 year. I also heard the gold maybe high in demand.
  

  Thanks to Flipkart for such a great service.
  

  Hope this helps :)
 
 

   READ MORE

I switched from iPhone 5s to iPhone 8 plus, and believe me its worth it.
  

  Well I din't feel to upgrade from iPhone 5s earlier as you know the kind of quality Apple iPhones have that you don't have to upgrade unless you just can't resist from the new features of latest devices.
  

  I know the price wise its too much to spend on just a phone, but you know if you are here and reading my review this means you do want one. I couldn't have bought one if Citibank wouldn't have given Rs 10K flat cash-back and Flipkart wouldn't have given No Cost EMI option. I guess now anyone who is coming to this page to look around, can buy this phone by paying Rs 6334 per month for 12 month and fulfill  their desire to own the industry's best hardware and software and feel good about it. And Flipkart's delivery system is at best for iPhone, they delivered on its launched day itself and by evening I was already playing out with it, plus there was surprise gift for my work desk, nice wooden app icons to attract your colleagues eyes :).
  

  Now coming onto iPhone 8 plus features, it has tons of upgrades, Wireless charging, Augmented Reality capability, high stability with battery backup, nearly unlimited space for a phone (256 gb), iOS 11, at the current time, these are the best features for a mobile phone, I can't say for next couple of years. Speaking of future, iPhone X is also coming next month, you might be thinking why to buy iPhone 8 plus when bezel less phone will come in almost same price, thats true, but I guess its based on choice and requirements.
  

  Personally I feel, mobile phone should have bezels other wise its quite hard to operate them, try out some android device, which you can't hold it at bottom, otherwise either you will land to home screen, or previous screen or app lists screen, you know what I am talking about. Quite difficult to hold phones only in corners and then operate it.
  

  So who ever reading this review, I highly recommend you to own this phone, if you have phones older than 7, 6s, then definitely get upgraded, you will really feel that you were missing a lot..
  

  And for those who wants to try out new tech, then why not wait for another month, I am sure iPhone X will be the best in its segment, compared to its competitors phones..
 
 

   READ MORE

column6: lightning 3.5mm headphone jack adapter missing from box.
column7:
In this box i have not received lightning 3.5mm headphone jack adapter and when i called customer care to enquire on this, they were not ready to connect with seller rather than refunded only 1000 rs for the same which i felt not worth of it. Because that adapter will not come in tht price if you are ready to take nalla adapter.Also this 1000 rs will not be refunded in our bank account , it will show as a gift card in flipkart wallet which we need to utilize in 1 year and if not then it will go in waste.
  
  Overall the solution which i was expecting from flipkart customer care not at all convinced me because buying a such expensive phone that too online i am very much disappointed. No doubt handset is working fine but specially that main adapter is missing from box.
  
  Guys, who ever will purchase any phone , please look behind the contents / accessories included and if not found in box immediately raise an incident request. See what answers you all will get.

I am the 1st Desi in Pune to hold iphone 8 Plus.
  

  If anyone is interested to know how the 8 Plus performs compared to the iphone 7.
  

  Camera is a little better and you notice it for sure. It is a lot better in low lights conditions.
  

  SPEED, I was using a 7 and I notice a much snappier Safari and iMessage screens. Part of it may be IOS 11 but pages pop really fast. It is way faster than the original 7.
  

  Gold (Pink-gold) looks awesome!!! But is so slick. There are no lines and it looks like a solid 1 piece product. Most people will use a case which hides the back anyway so maybe color is not that important. Mainly if you want a white front or black.
  

  Any case with a large camera cutout like the CM4 wallet case works with the 8. But most likely all other will not. But I promise you this phone is slippery when dry!!
  

  Overall I love it! Fastest & best device that I have ever used. I can out type the 7 sometimes on reviews but thiamine keep up no problem.
  
  56 gb is perfect in size for most everyone. Hardcore photo and video people may want the 256gb.
  

  The adapter sounds fine with my expensive headphones. It's not really that large either. The lightning headphones sound really good to me. I tested the same song with the same headphone using a 7 and the 8 with the adapter and I cannot tell the difference. In some ways the 8 with the adapter sounded cleaner and had a little less aliasing hiss from the analog to digital conversion process. So beside have a little while cable sticking out I think the 8 audio is fine.
  

  IPhone 4,5, 5s, SE, 6 and 6s users will feel a huge speed increase. The 7 is not far off speed wise but it is noticeable to me.
  

  No matter how you split up the payment or go with a upgrade contract price, you'll pay full price for any of the phones. It is all just creative math by the vendors. I bought mine outright and got point on my credit card, enough to reduce my price by INR 6092 pm for whole 1 year. I also heard the gold maybe high in demand.
  

  Thanks to Flipkart for such a great service.
  

  Hope this helps :)

Hence if u r using iOS 11 already on your old phone than u feel u r using ur old phone in spite of spending about 73000/- .
  
  So I feel it is not a worth upgrade unless u r die hard fan of apple.
  
  I suggest just wait till nov. invest more 16000 and go for iPhone X As in that at least u get some new look, new screen (bezel less). Or go and get 7P if u get any deal.
 
 

   READ MORE

I switched from iPhone 5s to iPhone 8 plus, and believe me its worth it.
  

  Well I din't feel to upgrade from iPhone 5s earlier as you know the kind of quality Apple iPhones have that you don't have to upgrade unless you just can't resist from the new features of latest devices.
  

  I know the price wise its too much to spend on just a phone, but you know if you are here and reading my review this means you do want one. I couldn't have bought one if Citibank wouldn't have given Rs 10K flat cash-back and Flipkart wouldn't have given No Cost EMI option. I guess now anyone who is coming to this page to look around, can buy this phone by paying Rs 6334 per month for 12 month and fulfill  their desire to own the industry's best hardware and software and feel good about it. And Flipkart's delivery system is at best for iPhone, they delivered on its launched day itself and by evening I was already playing out with it, plus there was surprise gift for my work desk, nice wooden app icons to attract your colleagues eyes :).
  

  Now coming onto iPhone 8 plus features, it has tons of upgrades, Wireless charging, Augmented Reality capability, high stability with battery backup, nearly unlimited space for a phone (256 gb), iOS 11, at the current time, these are the best features for a mobile phone, I can't say for next couple of years. Speaking of future, iPhone X is also coming next month, you might be thinking why to buy iPhone 8 plus when bezel less phone will come in almost same price, thats true, but I guess its based on choice and requirements.
  

  Personally I feel, mobile phone should have bezels other wise its quite hard to operate them, try out some android device, which you can't hold it at bottom, otherwise either you will land to home screen, or previous screen or app lists screen, you know what I am talking about. Quite difficult to hold phones only in corners and then operate it.
  

  So who ever reading this review, I highly recommend you to own this phone, if you have phones older than 7, 6s, then definitely get upgraded, you will really feel that you were missing a lot..
  

  And for those who wants to try out new tech, then why not wait for another month, I am sure iPhone X will be the best in its segment, compared to its competitors phones..
 
 

   READ MORE

column6: lightning 3.5mm headphone jack adapter missing from box.
column7:
In this box i have not received lightning 3.5mm headphone jack adapter and when i called customer care to enquire on this, they were not ready to connect with seller rather than refunded only 1000 rs for the same which i felt not worth of it. Because that adapter will not come in tht price if you are ready to take nalla adapter.Also this 1000 rs will not be refunded in our bank account , it will show as a gift card in flipkart wallet which we need to utilize in 1 year and if not then it will go in waste.
  
  Overall the solution which i was expecting from flipkart customer care not at all convinced me because buying a such expensive phone that too online i am very much disappointed. No doubt handset is working fine but specially that main adapter is missing from box.
  
  Guys, who ever will purchase any phone , please look behind the contents / accessories included and if not found in box immediately raise an incident request. See what answers you all will get.
 
 

   READ MORE

I switched from iPhone 5s to iPhone 8 plus, and believe me its worth it.
  

  Well I din't feel to upgrade from iPhone 5s earlier as you know the kind of quality Apple iPhones have that you don't have to upgrade unless you just can't resist from the new features of latest devices.
  

  I know the price wise its too much to spend on just a phone, but you know if you are here and reading my review this means you do want one. I couldn't have bought one if Citibank wouldn't have given Rs 10K flat cash-back and Flipkart wouldn't have given No Cost EMI option. I guess now anyone who is coming to this page to look around, can buy this phone by paying Rs 6334 per month for 12 month and fulfill  their desire to own the industry's best hardware and software and feel good about it. And Flipkart's delivery system is at best for iPhone, they delivered on its launched day itself and by evening I was already playing out with it, plus there was surprise gift for my work desk, nice wooden app icons to attract your colleagues eyes :).
  

  Now coming onto iPhone 8 plus features, it has tons of upgrades, Wireless charging, Augmented Reality capability, high stability with battery backup, nearly unlimited space for a phone (256 gb), iOS 11, at the current time, these are the best features for a mobile phone, I can't say for next couple of years. Speaking of future, iPhone X is also coming next month, you might be thinking why to buy iPhone 8 plus when bezel less phone will come in almost same price, thats true, but I guess its based on choice and requirements.
  

  Personally I feel, mobile phone should have bezels other wise its quite hard to operate them, try out some android device, which you can't hold it at bottom, otherwise either you will land to home screen, or previous screen or app lists screen, you know what I am talking about. Quite difficult to hold phones only in corners and then operate it.
  

  So who ever reading this review, I highly recommend you to own this phone, if you have phones older than 7, 6s, then definitely get upgraded, you will really feel that you were missing a lot..
  

  And for those who wants to try out new tech, then why not wait for another month, I am sure iPhone X will be the best in its segment, compared to its competitors phones..
 
 

   READ MORE

column6: lightning 3.5mm headphone jack adapter missing from box.
column7:
In this box i have not received lightning 3.5mm headphone jack adapter and when i called customer care to enquire on this, they were not ready to connect with seller rather than refunded only 1000 rs for the same which i felt not worth of it. Because that adapter will not come in tht price if you are ready to take nalla adapter.Also this 1000 rs will not be refunded in our bank account , it will show as a gift card in flipkart wallet which we need to utilize in 1 year and if not then it will go in waste.
  
  Overall the solution which i was expecting from flipkart customer care not at all convinced me because buying a such expensive phone that too online i am very much disappointed. No doubt handset is working fine but specially that main adapter is missing from box.
  
  Guys, who ever will purchase any phone , please look behind the contents / accessories included and if not found in box immediately raise an incident request. See what answers you all will get.
 
 

   READ MORE

Excellent service. Great product with superb packing and delivered the product before the promised time (i have requested the same and they acknowledged).

column6: Satisfied with the delivery but not with the phone
column7:
Thank you Flipkart for the delivery on the day of iPhone8 launch and a big thank you to your delivery boys Vivek Yadav and Shashikant as they waited for almost 1 hour for me to take the back up of my old phone and they opened the box for us just to ensure that there is no fake product from Flipkart. But the over all use of iPhone phone8 is exactly the same as I was using iPhone7 or iPhone6 (with some change in the universal button)
  

  Not at all expected from iPhone, no change no happiness, and the glass at the back made it more heavy and slippery.
  

  i am a Apple fan from Mac to iPad to iPhone to other products but now for the first time Im thinking to change myself to an android platform.
 
 

   READ MORE

People say, it is not worth to upgrade from iPhone 7 to 8, but there are a lot of reasons to upgrade. Battery life is huge improved. I had to charge my iPhone 7 every evening, but with iPhone 8 it last about 1.5 days ( mainly due to 10nm processor ) as there is no improvement on iPhone 7 running iOS 11.
  
  Also, low light photography has become so much better, with flash it is on another level ( slow sync flash ).
  
  True tone display is a delight, so soothing to look at. You notice and appreciate this one when the phone is put side by side with other phones.
  
  Stereo speakers are really louder than the iPhone 7. Simply the best on any phone in the world. Deep bass and crystal clear.
  
  After using it for 4 days, these are the only differences I have noticed. If these are important for you then upgrade ASAP.
 
 

   READ MORE

column6: Satisfied with the delivery but not with the phone
column7:
Thank you Flipkart for the delivery on the day of iPhone8 launch and a big thank you to your delivery boys Vivek Yadav and Shashikant as they waited for almost 1 hour for me to take the back up of my old phone and they opened the box for us just to ensure that there is no fake product from Flipkart. But the over all use of iPhone phone8 is exactly the same as I was using iPhone7 or iPhone6 (with some change in the universal button)
  

  Not at all expected from iPhone, no change no happiness, and the glass at the back made it more heavy and slippery.
  

  i am a Apple fan from Mac to iPad to iPhone to other products but now for the first time Im thinking to change myself to an android platform.
 
 

   READ MORE

People say, it is not worth to upgrade from iPhone 7 to 8, but there are a lot of reasons to upgrade. Battery life is huge improved. I had to charge my iPhone 7 every evening, but with iPhone 8 it last about 1.5 days ( mainly due to 10nm processor ) as there is no improvement on iPhone 7 running iOS 11.
  
  Also, low light photography has become so much better, with flash it is on another level ( slow sync flash ).
  
  True tone display is a delight, so soothing to look at. You notice and appreciate this one when the phone is put side by side with other phones.
  
  Stereo speakers are really louder than the iPhone 7. Simply the best on any phone in the world. Deep bass and crystal clear.
  
  After using it for 4 days, these are the only differences I have noticed. If these are important for you then upgrade ASAP.
 
 

   READ MORE

Delivered before the expected date on 29th. Courier service is good. Even in the heavy raid they delivered the product.
  
  Mobile is awesome, but it little bit heavier than iPhone 6s and 7.
 
 

   READ MORE

I am the 1st Desi in Pune to hold iphone 8 Plus.
  

  If anyone is interested to know how the 8 Plus performs compared to the iphone 7.
  

  Camera is a little better and you notice it for sure. It is a lot better in low lights conditions.
  

  SPEED, I was using a 7 and I notice a much snappier Safari and iMessage screens. Part of it may be IOS 11 but pages pop really fast. It is way faster than the original 7.
  

  Gold (Pink-gold) looks awesome!!! But is so slick. There are no lines and it looks like a solid 1 piece product. Most people will use a case which hides the back anyway so maybe color is not that important. Mainly if you want a white front or black.
  

  Any case with a large camera cutout like the CM4 wallet case works with the 8. But most likely all other will not. But I promise you this phone is slippery when dry!!
  

  Overall I love it! Fastest & best device that I have ever used. I can out type the 7 sometimes on reviews but thiamine keep up no problem.
  
  56 gb is perfect in size for most everyone. Hardcore photo and video people may want the 256gb.
  

  The adapter sounds fine with my expensive headphones. It's not really that large either. The lightning headphones sound really good to me. I tested the same song with the same headphone using a 7 and the 8 with the adapter and I cannot tell the difference. In some ways the 8 with the adapter sounded cleaner and had a little less aliasing hiss from the analog to digital conversion process. So beside have a little while cable sticking out I think the 8 audio is fine.
  

  IPhone 4,5, 5s, SE, 6 and 6s users will feel a huge speed increase. The 7 is not far off speed wise but it is noticeable to me.
  

  No matter how you split up the payment or go with a upgrade contract price, you'll pay full price for any of the phones. It is all just creative math by the vendors. I bought mine outright and got point on my credit card, enough to reduce my price by INR 6092 pm for whole 1 year. I also heard the gold maybe high in demand.
  

  Thanks to Flipkart for such a great service.
  

  Hope this helps :)
 
 

   READ MORE

I switched from iPhone 5s to iPhone 8 plus, and believe me its worth it.
  

  Well I din't feel to upgrade from iPhone 5s earlier as you know the kind of quality Apple iPhones have that you don't have to upgrade unless you just can't resist from the new features of latest devices.
  

  I know the price wise its too much to spend on just a phone, but you know if you are here and reading my review this means you do want one. I couldn't have bought one if Citibank wouldn't have given Rs 10K flat cash-back and Flipkart wouldn't have given No Cost EMI option. I guess now anyone who is coming to this page to look around, can buy this phone by paying Rs 6334 per month for 12 month and fulfill  their desire to own the industry's best hardware and software and feel good about it. And Flipkart's delivery system is at best for iPhone, they delivered on its launched day itself and by evening I was already playing out with it, plus there was surprise gift for my work desk, nice wooden app icons to attract your colleagues eyes :).
  

  Now coming onto iPhone 8 plus features, it has tons of upgrades, Wireless charging, Augmented Reality capability, high stability with battery backup, nearly unlimited space for a phone (256 gb), iOS 11, at the current time, these are the best features for a mobile phone, I can't say for next couple of years. Speaking of future, iPhone X is also coming next month, you might be thinking why to buy iPhone 8 plus when bezel less phone will come in almost same price, thats true, but I guess its based on choice and requirements.
  

  Personally I feel, mobile phone should have bezels other wise its quite hard to operate them, try out some android device, which you can't hold it at bottom, otherwise either you will land to home screen, or previous screen or app lists screen, you know what I am talking about. Quite difficult to hold phones only in corners and then operate it.
  

  So who ever reading this review, I highly recommend you to own this phone, if you have phones older than 7, 6s, then definitely get upgraded, you will really feel that you were missing a lot..
  

  And for those who wants to try out new tech, then why not wait for another month, I am sure iPhone X will be the best in its segment, compared to its competitors phones..
 
 

   READ MORE

column6: lightning 3.5mm headphone jack adapter missing from box.
column7:
In this box i have not received lightning 3.5mm headphone jack adapter and when i called customer care to enquire on this, they were not ready to connect with seller rather than refunded only 1000 rs for the same which i felt not worth of it. Because that adapter will not come in tht price if you are ready to take nalla adapter.Also this 1000 rs will not be refunded in our bank account , it will show as a gift card in flipkart wallet which we need to utilize in 1 year and if not then it will go in waste.
  
  Overall the solution which i was expecting from flipkart customer care not at all convinced me because buying a such expensive phone that too online i am very much disappointed. No doubt handset is working fine but specially that main adapter is missing from box.
  
  Guys, who ever will purchase any phone , please look behind the contents / accessories included and if not found in box immediately raise an incident request. See what answers you all will get.
